MESSAGE.JP: 覚める。
MESSAGE.EN: I woke up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I woke up.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ふあぁぁぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Faaah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Faaah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 日も頑張ろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I yawned and then decided to make today another good day.
MESSAGE.Translation: I yawned and then decided to make today another good day.

MESSAGE.JP: 覚める。
MESSAGE.EN: I woke up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I woke up.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ふあぁぁぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Faaah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Faaah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: つも通りの朝だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a normal morning.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a normal morning.

MESSAGE.JP: 日はお風呂も入らず、制服のまま寝てしまったけど、僕は襲われなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Yesterday I'd skipped my bath and fallen asleep in my uniform, but I hadn't been attacked.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yesterday I'd skipped my bath and fallen asleep in my uniform, but I hadn't been attacked.

MESSAGE.JP: 夢は一日で過ぎ去ったのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The nightmare was over.
MESSAGE.Translation: The nightmare was over.

MESSAGE.JP: んて心地のいい朝だろう。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a very relaxing morning.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a very relaxing morning.

MESSAGE.JP: やかな朝がこんなにも爽快だなんて！
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't know a quiet morning could feel this good!
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't know a quiet morning could feel this good!

MESSAGE.JP: り出したい気分だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt like dancing.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt like dancing.

MESSAGE.JP: さっ！　ささっ！　ささっ！
MESSAGE.EN: Yeah! Yeah! Yeah!
MESSAGE.Translation: Yeah! Yeah! Yeah!

MESSAGE.JP: 意味に反復横跳びをしてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Without thinking, I started dancing back and forth.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without thinking, I started dancing back and forth.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやっほぅ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yahoo!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yahoo!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「すげぇ元気だな、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You sure are in a good mood, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You sure are in a good mood, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: わぁ、見られていた！
MESSAGE.EN: Crap, someone saw me!
MESSAGE.Translation: Crap, someone saw me!

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「い、いや…さほどは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝N-no, not particularly...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝N-no, not particularly...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そうか？　反復横跳びまでして、すげぇテンションだったぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Really? You were really pumped up and even dancing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Really? You were really pumped up and even dancing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ま、いいや。顔洗って飯いくかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Whatever. Wash your face so we can go eat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Whatever. Wash your face so we can go eat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: つもの顔ぶれが朝食の場に揃う。
MESSAGE.EN: We gathered up in the cafeteria, as usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: We gathered up in the cafeteria, as usual.

MESSAGE.JP: んな、黙々と食事をとっている。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone was having their breakfast in silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone was having their breakfast in silence.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「こらこら、おまえら無視するな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hey now, say something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hey now, say something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ーブルの中心には、鈴が作った掃除当番表の小さい版が置かれている。
MESSAGE.EN: In the very center of the table, there was a small cleaning roster board Rin had made herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the very center of the table, there was a small cleaning roster board Rin had made herself.

MESSAGE.JP: 掃除当番』と『表』の間に『↑リーダー』と書き足してある。
MESSAGE.EN: I found the word ❛Leader❜ added between ❛Cleaning Duty❜ and ❛Chart❜ on the board.
MESSAGE.Translation: I found the word ❛Leader❜ added between ❛Cleaning Duty❜ and ❛Chart❜ on the board.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「文句のある奴は今言え」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝If you have any complaints, speak up now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝If you have any complaints, speak up now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「言ったら、当番はずしてくれるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝If I do, are you going to count me out of the job?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝If I do, are you going to count me out of the job?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「増やす」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You'll get more to do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You'll get more to do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんでだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝How come!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝How come!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「一年間真人」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Masato, one year of duty.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Masato, one year of duty.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「こらこら、なにも言ってねぇよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Wait up now, I didn't say anything yet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Wait up now, I didn't say anything yet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: はぐるりと僕たちの顔を見渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin looked around at our faces.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin looked around at our faces.

MESSAGE.JP: を合わさないようにと顔を逸らす恭介。
MESSAGE.EN: Trying to avoid eye contact, Kyousuke averted his face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Trying to avoid eye contact, Kyousuke averted his face.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「文句ありそうな顔だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That face looks like it wants to complain.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That face looks like it wants to complain.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「一年間恭介」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Kyousuke, one year.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Kyousuke, one year.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「判定、厳しいな!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The verdict is too harsh!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The verdict is too harsh!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「容赦なしだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝She has no mercy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝She has no mercy...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「謙吾はどうだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What do you think, Kengo?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What do you think, Kengo?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ーブルに乗っかるようにして、ずいと顔を寄せる。
MESSAGE.EN: Leaning over the table, she peered at him intently.
MESSAGE.Translation: Leaning over the table, she peered at him intently.

MESSAGE.JP: すが謙吾。まったく動じず澄まし顔で鈴を見返す。
MESSAGE.EN: That's our Kengo. He was gazing back at her without twitching a brow.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's our Kengo. He was gazing back at her without twitching a brow.

MESSAGE.JP: 人がその脇に手を伸ばす。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato stretched out his arms toward Kengo's armpits.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato stretched out his arms toward Kengo's armpits.

MESSAGE.JP: すぐる。
MESSAGE.EN: Then he tickled him.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then he tickled him.

MESSAGE.JP: える。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo was putting up with it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo was putting up with it.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…すげぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...Wow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...Wow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ウィンナーを鼻に詰めてみよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Let's jam this sausage into his nose.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Let's jam this sausage into his nose.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「やるな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Pretty cool.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Pretty cool.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「両方に詰めてみよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Let's insert one more.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Let's insert one more.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…こんなん耐えれるかああぁぁぁーーーーーーーっっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Can't stand it anymore!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Can't stand it anymore!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: いに怒った。
MESSAGE.EN: Finally he got angry.
MESSAGE.Translation: Finally he got angry.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「一年間謙吾」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Kengo, one year.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Kengo, one year.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「判定おかしいぃぃーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That verdict is ridiculous!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That verdict is ridiculous!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「真面目な話をしてるのに、ふざけた顔をしていた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I was talking seriously, but you were just making a funny face.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I was talking seriously, but you were just making a funny face.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「こいつらのせいだろっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It's their fault!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It's their fault!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「しばらく放っておいたじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Blame yourself for not stopping them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Blame yourself for not stopping them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「くそぅ…無念だ…耐えたのが仇となったか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Damn it... how mortifying... All my efforts, for naught...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Damn it... how mortifying... All my efforts, for naught...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「普通、あそこでは耐えんだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I don't understand why you even put up with it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I don't understand why you even put up with it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Me neither.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Me neither.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「では、みんなこれでいいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Good then, everybody's agreed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Good then, everybody's agreed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんで、理樹は試さないんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Why aren't you asking Riki as well?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Why aren't you asking Riki as well?❞

MESSAGE.JP: がまとめようとしたところで、真人が至極まっとうな不服を口にする。
MESSAGE.EN: Just as Rin was about to wrap it all up, Masato expressed his dissatisfaction.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just as Rin was about to wrap it all up, Masato expressed his dissatisfaction.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹はいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I don't need to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I don't need to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「どうして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝How come?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝How come?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 発案者だからだ、とも言えず鈴は言葉に詰まる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Of course she couldn't say that I was the one who had proposed that; she was stumped for words.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Of course she couldn't say that I was the one who had proposed that; she was stumped for words.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「発案者だからだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Because it's his plan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Because it's his plan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: も考えず言っていた！
MESSAGE.EN: She answered so easily!
MESSAGE.Translation: She answered so easily!

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだよ、これ、理樹の入れ知恵かよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What was that, Riki, it was your idea?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What was that, Riki, it was your idea?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、アドバイスはしたけど、発起人は鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well yeah, but it was her idea originally, I was just giving her advice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well yeah, but it was her idea originally, I was just giving her advice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: てて、そう説明する。
MESSAGE.EN: I was rushed to an explanation.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was rushed to an explanation.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ね、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right, Rin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right, Rin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: りん、と頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: 人が白い目で僕と鈴を交互に見る。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato gave Rin and me cold looks.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato gave Rin and me cold looks.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おまえら、なんか…最近やけに仲良くねぇか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You guys... aren't you somehow getting along awfully well these days?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You guys... aren't you somehow getting along awfully well these days?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それはいいことじゃない、ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Isn't that a good thing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Isn't that a good thing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 茶を濁すようにそう言って、僕は苦笑いを浮かべる。
MESSAGE.EN: I forced a smile as I fudged my answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: I forced a smile as I fudged my answer.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだ、なんか隠してるな、おまえら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Ok, what are you two hiding from us?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Ok, what are you two hiding from us?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おまえには言わん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm not telling you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm not telling you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「くそぅ、なんだよ、気になるなっ、ちょっと蹴らしてやるから教えろよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What the hell!? I'll let you kick me, so just tell me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What the hell!? I'll let you kick me, so just tell me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うっさい、やじゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No way! Shut up!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No way! Shut up!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ものすごいプライドのなさだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝He's completely lost his pride...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝He's completely lost his pride...❞

MESSAGE.JP: が相談しているのは僕だけなんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I am the only one whom Rin is now relying on.
MESSAGE.Translation: I am the only one whom Rin is now relying on.

MESSAGE.JP: 更そのことに気付く。
MESSAGE.EN: I've finally realized it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I've finally realized it.

MESSAGE.JP: れは、あの時、たまたま僕がそばにいたからだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: But I wonder, why did she choose me? Was it simply because I happened to be with her at that time?
MESSAGE.Translation: But I wonder, why did she choose me? Was it simply because I happened to be with her at that time?

MESSAGE.JP: こに真人か謙吾がいたら、そのどちらかに相談していただろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: If Masato or Kengo had been there instead, would she have asked them for advice?
MESSAGE.Translation: If Masato or Kengo had been there instead, would she have asked them for advice?

MESSAGE.JP: 相談していただろうな。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I guess she would've.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I guess she would've.

MESSAGE.JP: の時、真人と僕の今の立場は逆転していたはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Then I'd be the one becoming curious about what Rin was hiding, just like Masato now was.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then I'd be the one becoming curious about what Rin was hiding, just like Masato now was.

MESSAGE.JP: たぶん。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Maybe.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Maybe.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…ふわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...hah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...hah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだ理樹。眠いのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's up Riki? You tired?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's up Riki? You tired?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、ちょっとね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, a little...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, a little...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「いいぜ、寝て」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Go ahead and sleep.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Go ahead and sleep.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、授業いかなきゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I need to go to class.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I need to go to class.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「教室まで運んでやるって言ってんだよ。オレの筋肉に包まれて少し眠りな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'll carry you to class. Take a nap wrapped up in my muscles.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'll carry you to class. Take a nap wrapped up in my muscles.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやいや、気持ち悪いから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No way, that's creepy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No way, that's creepy...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そうか。まあいつでも言ってくれよな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh. Well the offer's always open.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh. Well the offer's always open.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやいや…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm fine...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm fine...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...huh?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...huh?)

MESSAGE.JP: の前にある掲示板。
MESSAGE.EN: The bulletin board in front of the dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: The bulletin board in front of the dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: つもどおり乱雑になっているそこに、やけに目立つ緋色の紙があるぞ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a complete mess as usual, but there was a bright red paper that stood out.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a complete mess as usual, but there was a bright red paper that stood out.

MESSAGE.JP: んだ、この存在感は…。気になって仕方がない。
MESSAGE.EN: This presence... I can't help but take interest.
MESSAGE.Translation: This presence... I can't help but take interest.

MESSAGE.JP: 剣道部新人戦のお知らせ』の下から緋色の紙を抜き取る。
MESSAGE.EN: I took the scarlet paper that was under the ❛Notice of New Kendo Members Bouts❜ poster.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took the scarlet paper that was under the ❛Notice of New Kendo Members Bouts❜ poster.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「んー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: りたたまれている。
MESSAGE.EN: It was folded up.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was folded up.

MESSAGE.JP: くとこぶし大のその紙には…。
MESSAGE.EN: When I opened it...
MESSAGE.Translation: When I opened it...

MESSAGE.JP: 休み時間、裏庭で待つ　Ｔ』とだけあった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...the paper in my hand simply read ❛I'll be waiting in the backyard during break. - T❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ...the paper in my hand simply read ❛I'll be waiting in the backyard during break. - T❜

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（朱鷺戸さん…かな？）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Is it from Tokido-san...?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Is it from Tokido-san...?)

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだ、理樹？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's up, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's up, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ううん、なんでもないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「どうした、ラブレターでも受け取ったか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What's wrong, did you get a love letter?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What's wrong, did you get a love letter?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そそそ、そんなわけはないよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W-w-what? No way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W-w-what? No way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「いいから見せろよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Come on, lemme see it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Come on, lemme see it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、真人っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の手元を覗きこんだ真人がひょい、と紙片を取り上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato peeked into my hand and suddenly yanked part of the paper out.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato peeked into my hand and suddenly yanked part of the paper out.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「んー？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hmmm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hmmm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人と謙吾が同時に覗き込む。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato and Kengo both peeked at it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato and Kengo both peeked at it.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…なんだ、何も書いてねぇじゃねぇか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...huh, there's nothing written on it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...huh, there's nothing written on it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「なんだ、ラブレターではなかったか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝So it wasn't a love letter...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝So it wasn't a love letter...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「てっきり、食券かと思ったぜ。焼き肉食い放題的なよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I thought it was definitely a meal ticket. I was gonna have all-you-can-eat grilled meat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I thought it was definitely a meal ticket. I was gonna have all-you-can-eat grilled meat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「理樹。おまえのロマンスなら、俺は応援するぞ。いつでも相談にこい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Riki. I fully support your romantic endeavors. You can ask me for advice anytime.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Riki. I fully support your romantic endeavors. You can ask me for advice anytime.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、いいからっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, that's okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, that's okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「食い放題のほうなら、オレに相談にこいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You can come to me anytime if it's related to all-you-can-eat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You can come to me anytime if it's related to all-you-can-eat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「う、うん（混ぜてほしいだけじゃん！）」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝S-sure. (You just want to get in on it!)❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝S-sure. (You just want to get in on it!)❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「絶対だぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That's a promise.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That's a promise.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、わかったよ…（念まで押されたよ…）」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, promise... (You aren't leaving me much choice...)❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, promise... (You aren't leaving me much choice...)❞

MESSAGE.JP: えながら紙片を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at the paper as I answered.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at the paper as I answered.

MESSAGE.JP: 当に白紙になっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: It really was plain white paper.
MESSAGE.Translation: It really was plain white paper.

MESSAGE.JP: かに文字が書いてあったのに、どうして消えたんだろう…？
MESSAGE.EN: There were definitely words written on it, so why did they disappear...?
MESSAGE.Translation: There were definitely words written on it, so why did they disappear...?

MESSAGE.JP: 鷺戸さんのことだ、なにかからくりがあるのかも。
MESSAGE.EN: It's probably some trick that Tokido-san used.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's probably some trick that Tokido-san used.

MESSAGE.JP: にかく、次の休み時間に行ったときついでに訊いてみよう。
MESSAGE.EN: At any rate, I can ask her when I go meet her during the next break.
MESSAGE.Translation: At any rate, I can ask her when I go meet her during the next break.

MESSAGE.JP: 見るからに怪しいので取らないでおこう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It's clearly something suspicious, so I'll just leave it be.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It's clearly something suspicious, so I'll just leave it be.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「真人、行こう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato, let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato, let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うっしゃ、今日も力いっぱい遊ぶか！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Alright, let's play hardcore again today!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Alright, let's play hardcore again today!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちゃんと勉強しようね、真人」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You need to study, Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You need to study, Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: もあまりひとのことは言えないけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Though I'm not exactly one to talk.
MESSAGE.Translation: Though I'm not exactly one to talk.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おい、こら宿題写させろぉ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, let me copy your homework.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, let me copy your homework.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「前みたく、宇宙人がノートをビームで焼き払っていきました、とか言い逃れすればいいだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Why not use that excuse again? A space alien came and burned your homework with a beam of light.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Why not use that excuse again? A space alien came and burned your homework with a beam of light.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そいつは二度も通用する技じゃねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That won't work a second time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That won't work a second time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そんなに頻繁に宇宙人が現れたら、どう考えても不自然だろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's definitely unnatural to meet aliens that often.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's definitely unnatural to meet aliens that often.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「その一度目も教師は何も聞かなかったことにしていたがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Even at the very first time, the teacher pretended he didn't hear you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Even at the very first time, the teacher pretended he didn't hear you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだよ、通用してねぇみたいに言うなよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝C'mon, stop talking as if I failed...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝C'mon, stop talking as if I failed...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「宇宙人を$K43関西$K0人にでもしてみたらどうだ？　よっぽど自然だろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Why not change the alien into a $K43Kansai$K0 man? I guess it'd be more natural.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Why not change the alien into a $K43Kansai$K0 man? I guess it'd be more natural.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なるほど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That makes sense...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That makes sense...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「関西人がノートをビームで焼き払っていきました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝A Kansai man came and burned off my notebook with a beam of light.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝A Kansai man came and burned off my notebook with a beam of light.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「すげぇなオレ。関西を敵に回しているのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Doesn't that mean I've made enemies of all Kansai people? Wow, even I'm impressed with my bravery.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Doesn't that mean I've made enemies of all Kansai people? Wow, even I'm impressed with my bravery.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「しかしなんでオレが関西人にそんな恨みを買っているんだ？という話になんねぇか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝But wouldn't people question what on earth I could have done to earn such hatred from them? That's the problem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝But wouldn't people question what on earth I could have done to earn such hatred from them? That's the problem.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「その前に、ビームで焼き払うという設定を見直せ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Before that, you'd better realize the ❛beam of light❜ will be a much bigger problem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Before that, you'd better realize the ❛beam of light❜ will be a much bigger problem.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「馬鹿だな、こいつら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Aren't they stupid.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Aren't they stupid.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は話に加わっていない恭介の腕を引っ張って、みんなから少し離れてもらった。
MESSAGE.EN: I grabbed Kyousuke's right arm and pulled him a little away from the others.
MESSAGE.Translation: I grabbed Kyousuke's right arm and pulled him a little away from the others.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「どうした？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What's up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What's up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介は知ってるの？　鈴がやってること」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke, do you know about what Rin is doing now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke, do you know about what Rin is doing now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「え？　なんかやってんのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No. Is she doing something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No. Is she doing something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何か隠してるのは、恭介だってわかってるんでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You must've already realized she's hiding something from you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You must've already realized she's hiding something from you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「なんのことを言いたいのかよくわからないが、そんなのいつものことだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I don't know what you're talking about, but isn't it always like this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I don't know what you're talking about, but isn't it always like this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「あいつが何をしたいか、そんなことはわからない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I have no idea what she wants to do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I have no idea what she wants to do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「だって、あいつ自身わかってないんだろうからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I mean, she doesn't even know that herself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I mean, she doesn't even know that herself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まぁ、鈴はそんな節はあるっぽいけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, you may have a point there...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, you may have a point there...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ただ、俺は明確な目的を持つ日まで、見守ってやってるだけさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All I can do is watch over her until the day she finds a clear purpose of her own.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All I can do is watch over her until the day she finds a clear purpose of her own.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: の鈴は、おかしな謎解きに挑戦している。
MESSAGE.EN: Right now, Rin's delving into some deep mysteries.
MESSAGE.Translation: Right now, Rin's delving into some deep mysteries.

MESSAGE.JP: れは明確な目的なのだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Does she have a clear purpose in doing so?
MESSAGE.Translation: Does she have a clear purpose in doing so?

MESSAGE.JP: うだろうな。
MESSAGE.EN: Probably not.
MESSAGE.Translation: Probably not.

MESSAGE.JP: は目の前にぶらさがっている、ふさふさした不思議なものを猫のように追っかけているだけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She is just going after what's immediately in front of her eyes, like a cat chasing after every strange thing.
MESSAGE.Translation: She is just going after what's immediately in front of her eyes, like a cat chasing after every strange thing.

MESSAGE.JP: だ始業前のＨＲには時間がある。
MESSAGE.EN: There was still a few minutes until homeroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was still a few minutes until homeroom.

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんは…、と僕は教室を見渡した。
MESSAGE.EN: I scanned around the classroom, looking for Kurugaya-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I scanned around the classroom, looking for Kurugaya-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 人居るクラスメイトたちは教科書を広げたり、あるいは友達と雑談などをしている。
MESSAGE.EN: There were some classmates reading their textbooks, while others were nonchalantly chatting.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were some classmates reading their textbooks, while others were nonchalantly chatting.

MESSAGE.JP: 室のドアに手をかけた僕は足を止めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I paused with my hand on the door handle.
MESSAGE.Translation: I paused with my hand on the door handle.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…ん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Hm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Hm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わぷっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wapu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wapu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ン、と背中に何かがぶつかる感触。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt something softly hit my back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt something softly hit my back.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「っと、っと？　クド？　おはよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, it's you, Kud. Morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, it's you, Kud. Morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わふっ、おはようございまふ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafu, good morning to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafu, good morning to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の背中に当たった鼻を押さえながらクドが答えた。
MESSAGE.EN: She answered, covering her nose with her hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She answered, covering her nose with her hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごめん、いきなり立ち止まって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, I made a sudden stop.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, I made a sudden stop.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ふぃふぇ、ふぁんふぁふぁふぉー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Fife, fanfafafa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Fife, fanfafafa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 手で自分の鼻をおさえながら、ぱたぱたとクドはもう一方の手を振って何か言ってるが、よくわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: She said something while waving her free hand, but I had no idea what it was.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said something while waving her free hand, but I had no idea what it was.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「大丈夫？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…ふぁい、だいじょうぶれふ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Fyes, I'm fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Fyes, I'm fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そういえばクド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝By the way, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝By the way, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「来ヶ谷さんっていつも窓際にいるよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san always stays near the window, doesn't she?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san always stays near the window, doesn't she?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ご自分の席が窓側だからだと思いますけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I think that's because her desk is there...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I think that's because her desk is there...❞

MESSAGE.JP: は窓際でなんだか分厚い本に視線を落としている来ヶ谷さんを見ながら言った。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked her when I saw Kurugaya-san, who was reading a thick book by the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked her when I saw Kurugaya-san, who was reading a thick book by the window.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、そういうことじゃなくって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, that's not what I meant...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, that's not what I meant...❞

MESSAGE.JP: んだろう。少し違和感を僕は覚えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt something was a little off.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt something was a little off.

MESSAGE.JP: もそれだけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: But that was all.
MESSAGE.Translation: But that was all.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、なんでもないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Forget about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Forget about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんはページをめくるのを止めて、外を眺めている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san had stopped reading and was now looking out the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san had stopped reading and was now looking out the window.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「何の本を読んでいるんでしょうね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I wonder what kind of book she's reading.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I wonder what kind of book she's reading.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「多分、難しい本なんじゃないかと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess a difficult one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess a difficult one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「へぇ～。すごいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wow, she's amazing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wow, she's amazing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは感心して頷いている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud looked at Kurugaya-san with eyes shining with admiration.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud looked at Kurugaya-san with eyes shining with admiration.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ふむふむ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hm hum.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hm hum.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…帯にはなんか難しい文字が書いてあるなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...The text on the cover is written with difficult characters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...The text on the cover is written with difficult characters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: こからではちょっとわかりづらい。
MESSAGE.EN: I could only understand bits of it from this distance.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could only understand bits of it from this distance.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドにはわかるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud, can you read it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, can you read it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わかりませんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝No, I can't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝No, I can't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 顔でクドは答える。
MESSAGE.EN: She answered with a smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: She answered with a smile.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「わかんないのに頷いてるんだ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why are you looking so impressed about it!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why are you looking so impressed about it!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「難しい本に違いありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That must be a very difficult book.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That must be a very difficult book.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは、ぽん、と両手を合わせながら言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She clapped her hands together as she answered.
MESSAGE.Translation: She clapped her hands together as she answered.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それ、さっきの僕の台詞だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's what I just said.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's what I just said.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 室の中の来ヶ谷さんはちょっと話しかけづらい。
MESSAGE.EN: I was hesitant to talk to Kurugaya-san in the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was hesitant to talk to Kurugaya-san in the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: の教室は段々生徒が増えてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: The number of students in the room was gradually increasing.
MESSAGE.Translation: The number of students in the room was gradually increasing.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「休み時間にしようか。ここに突っ立ってるのも邪魔だし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, let's talk again next recess. We're getting in the way, standing here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, let's talk again next recess. We're getting in the way, standing here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい、それに予習もしなくてはいけません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yeah. And besides, we have to prepare.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yeah. And besides, we have to prepare.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今日、何かあったっけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝For what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝For what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「数学のミニテストがあるはずです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝We have a math test today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝We have a math test today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…うわっ、忘れてた。じゃ、テスト終わってからにしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Ugh! I forgot all about it. Okay, we'll chat after that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Ugh! I forgot all about it. Okay, we'll chat after that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: とクドはそれぞれの席に座るため別れた。
MESSAGE.EN: We headed back to our respective desks.
MESSAGE.Translation: We headed back to our respective desks.

MESSAGE.JP: のＨＲが終わると、すぐ隣の真人が僕の机に張りついてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: As soon as morning homeroom ended, Masato came over to my desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: As soon as morning homeroom ended, Masato came over to my desk.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「悪い、理樹っ、ノート交換してくれっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Sorry to trouble you, but can you lend me your notebook?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Sorry to trouble you, but can you lend me your notebook?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、本当に悪いよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That'd be a problem for me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That'd be a problem for me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おまえ普段ちゃんとしてきてるから、たまに忘れても大丈夫だって！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Your behavior is usually fine in class, so the teacher won't mind even if you make a mistake sometimes!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Your behavior is usually fine in class, so the teacher won't mind even if you make a mistake sometimes!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いつもの宇宙人ネタでかわしてよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Use your space alien excuse...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Use your space alien excuse...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そんなに頻繁に宇宙人きてることにしたら、やばいって！　頭おかしい奴じゃねぇかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝If I use it too often, he'll think I'm crazy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝If I use it too often, he'll think I'm crazy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「一度でもおかしいからさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He already thinks you're crazy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He already thinks you're crazy...❞

MESSAGE.JP: しゃん！　と教室の扉が開けられる音にクラスメイトがぎょっとする。
MESSAGE.EN: The other classmates tensed up when they heard the front door open.
MESSAGE.Translation: The other classmates tensed up when they heard the front door open.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「やー、おはよー、おはよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Ya～, mornin', morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Ya～, mornin', morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was Saigusa-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Saigusa-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 師ではないとわかるとクラスメイトたちはため息をつく。
MESSAGE.EN: Having noticed that it was not the teacher, they heaved sighs of relief.
MESSAGE.Translation: Having noticed that it was not the teacher, they heaved sighs of relief.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「おはよう、三枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Morning, Saigusa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Morning, Saigusa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 室は反対方向みたいなのに、次の授業大丈夫なのだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Since her classroom was a bit far from here, I wondered if she was going to make it there in time.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since her classroom was a bit far from here, I wondered if she was going to make it there in time.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだよ、おまえ割り込むなよ、オレのほうが先に理樹に助けてもらうんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey you, don't cut in line. Riki'll be helping me out first.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey you, don't cut in line. Riki'll be helping me out first.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「そうなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Is that so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Is that so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、大丈夫。見限ったから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, it's fine. Forget about him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, it's fine. Forget about him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「理樹様ああぁぁあぁぁーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Riki-samaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Riki-samaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うるさいから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Shut up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Shut up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「で、今日は何？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, what is it today?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, what is it today?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「えーとね、$K10筆ペン$K0貸して欲しいんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Well, may I borrow your $K10calligraphy pen$K0?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Well, may I borrow your $K10calligraphy pen$K0?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「筆ペン!?　あったかなぁ、そんなの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Calligraphy pen!? I wonder if I have it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Calligraphy pen!? I wonder if I have it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「赤色の筆ペンがいいんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I need a red one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I need a red one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんで赤？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Red? Why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Red? Why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「昨日の夜、『門限守りましょう』の張り紙が破けちゃったから書き直そうかと思って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Last night I found one of the ❛Get Back by Curfew❜ posters torn up, so I need to make a new one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Last night I found one of the ❛Get Back by Curfew❜ posters torn up, so I need to make a new one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「購買部に売ってなかった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why not go and pick one up at the school store?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why not go and pick one up at the school store?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「購買部で買うとバレちゃうでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝If I use the store, wouldn't they find out?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝If I use the store, wouldn't they find out?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…まさか、破ったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Wait, was it you who tore it down?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Wait, was it you who tore it down?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「破けちゃったの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝It was torn.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝It was torn.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 枝さんは真面目な顔で繰り返した。
MESSAGE.EN: Saigusa-san said in a serious tone.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saigusa-san said in a serious tone.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「張り紙はきちんとしなくっちゃねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝The posters are very important.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝The posters are very important.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「破ったんだね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It was, wasn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It was, wasn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「きちんとしなくっちゃねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝...Very important.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝...Very important.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…破ったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You did it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You did it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「しなくっちゃねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝...Important.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝...Important.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「……破りました？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝......Did you do it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝......Did you do it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ダメだなぁ理樹くん。破っちゃダメだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝That's no good, Riki-kun. You mustn't tear up posters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝That's no good, Riki-kun. You mustn't tear up posters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんで僕が注意されるかなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And why are you blaming it on me!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And why are you blaming it on me!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…あ、机の中にあった。なんでだろ。まぁいいや。はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Oh, found it. Here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Oh, found it. Here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「ありがと、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Thank you, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Thank you, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どういたしまして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're welcome.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're welcome.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「じゃ、バイバイ、理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Bye-bye, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Bye-bye, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は三枝さんが教室を出て行くのを見送った。
MESSAGE.EN: I saw her off.
MESSAGE.Translation: I saw her off.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「てめぇ、別のクラスの女の頼み事は聞けて、幼なじみであるオレのは聞けねぇってのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What, you listen to the request of a girl from another class, but don't help out your good childhood friend!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What, you listen to the request of a girl from another class, but don't help out your good childhood friend!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、依存度のレベルがぜんぜん違うから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's because your request is on a completely different level...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's because your request is on a completely different level...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あと、数学の時間、ミニテストもあるからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And besides, we have a math test today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And besides, we have a math test today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「目から蜂いぃぃーーーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Bees from my eyes!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Bees from my eyes!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、出てくるの？　すごいね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What, they flew out? Amazing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What, they flew out? Amazing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 段使わないし、多分持ってないだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I usually don't use it, so I guess I wouldn't have it with me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I usually don't use it, so I guess I wouldn't have it with me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごめん、ないと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, I don't think I have it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, I don't think I have it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「まー、そっかー。しょうがないね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Ah well, can't be helped then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Ah well, can't be helped then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「じゃー他の人に借りてくるよ。ありがと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I'll ask somebody else, then. Thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I'll ask somebody else, then. Thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「姉御ー、スミマセンちょっといいですかー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Anego, could you do me a favor?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Anego, could you do me a favor?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝さんは去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Saigusa-san took off.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Saigusa-san took off.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ごめん…僕は僕より強い奴と戦うために、さすらうよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, I must go wandering around in order to fight stronger guys...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, I must go wandering around in order to fight stronger guys...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「まー、そっかー。しょうがないね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Ah well, can't be helped then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Ah well, can't be helped then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「じゃー他の人に借りてくるよ。ありがと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I'll ask somebody else, then. Thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I'll ask somebody else, then. Thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@「姉御ー、スミマセンちょっといいですかー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Anego, could you do me a favor?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Anego, could you do me a favor?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝さんは去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Saigusa-san took off.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Saigusa-san took off.

MESSAGE.JP: 学の後、教室にはいなかった来ヶ谷さんを探す。
MESSAGE.EN: After the math class, I went looking for Kurugaya-san, who had disappeared from the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: After the math class, I went looking for Kurugaya-san, who had disappeared from the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「来ヶ谷さん、ちょっといいかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san, can you spare me a moment?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san, can you spare me a moment?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 下にいた来ヶ谷さんを僕は呼び止めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I stopped her walking down the hallway.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stopped her walking down the hallway.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ん？　私か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hm? Me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hm? Me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「次は教室移動だと思うが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I guess, but we have to get to the next class.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I guess, but we have to get to the next class.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、そうじゃなくって、ちょっと相談が」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I know. But I've got to ask you about something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I know. But I've got to ask you about something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「相談？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Is that so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Is that so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんは一瞬考え込んで、それからさりげなく廊下の窓側脇に寄った。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san deliberated on that for a moment and moved to the window side of the hallway.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san deliberated on that for a moment and moved to the window side of the hallway.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わ、わ、みなさん、押さない、で、わっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wah, wah, everyone, please don't push me, waah～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wah, wah, everyone, please don't push me, waah～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 室から他のクラスメイトに押し出されるようにクドが出てくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Stuck in a current of other classmates, I saw Kud get pushed out of the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Stuck in a current of other classmates, I saw Kud get pushed out of the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: んのめったクドをひょい、と来ヶ谷さんは襟足を掴んで静止させた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san seized Kud by the collar and stopped her in place.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san seized Kud by the collar and stopped her in place.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あ、どうもありがとうございます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Thank you very much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Thank you very much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: こ、とクドが頭を下げる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud bowed her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud bowed her head.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「移動教室はどちらでしたか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Do you know where the next class is?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Do you know where the next class is?❞

MESSAGE.JP: やがやと教室を出ていくクラスメイトを見送りながらクドが尋ねた。
MESSAGE.EN: Seeing off the other classmates, Kud asked me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seeing off the other classmates, Kud asked me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「物理室だよ、それはともかく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝In the physics classroom. But before that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝In the physics classroom. But before that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドの部屋のことなんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It concerns Kud's room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It concerns Kud's room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「部屋？　女子寮のか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Room? You mean in the girls' dorm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Room? You mean in the girls' dorm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「…彼女の引越しは無事終わったぞ。そんなに荷物もなかったしな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝She didn't have much baggage, so her move-in was finished quickly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝She didn't have much baggage, so her move-in was finished quickly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「まだ整理は済んでませんけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝But I haven't sorted them out yet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝But I haven't sorted them out yet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、そうなんだ…それで、来ヶ谷さんはひとりだよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Really? ...Well, Kurugaya-san, you don't have a roommate, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Really? ...Well, Kurugaya-san, you don't have a roommate, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「うむ、そうだがそれが何か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah. But what are you trying to say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah. But what are you trying to say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「女の子たちは時々ルームメイト募集をするみたいだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I heard girls sometimes look for a roommate.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I heard girls sometimes look for a roommate.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「来ヶ谷さんはしたことある？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Have you ever done this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Have you ever done this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「私自身は特にないが…なんだ、一人寝は寂しいのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I personally haven't... What is it, are you feeling lonely sleeping alone?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I personally haven't... What is it, are you feeling lonely sleeping alone?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「おねーさんはいつでもウェルカムだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Onee-san will always welcome you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Onee-san will always welcome you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんは両手を広げてクドを抱え込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She spread her arms out wide and hugged Kud tightly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She spread her arms out wide and hugged Kud tightly.

MESSAGE.JP: たばた。じたばた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud started squirming in Kurugaya-san's arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud started squirming in Kurugaya-san's arms.

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんから比べれば全然上背がないクドは、すっぽり腕に収められてジタバタしている。
MESSAGE.EN: But there was no escape since she was so much smaller than Kurugaya-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: But there was no escape since she was so much smaller than Kurugaya-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ありゃ、ないのか。鈴からそういう話を聞いたことがあるんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You haven't? Rin told me something like that, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You haven't? Rin told me something like that, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「…ん？　ふむ。私自身はないが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Hm? Yes, I personally haven't, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Hm? Yes, I personally haven't, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんはクドの体を離すと、今度はくるくる回してぎゅーという動作を繰り返す。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san loosened her hold on Kud. But, this time, she started spinning her around.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san loosened her hold on Kud. But, this time, she started spinning her around.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「手伝ったことならあるぞ。上級生と一緒になりたいとかそういうのは少し難しいが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝But it's true I've assisted some of them. It'd be difficult if you end up sharing a room with an older girl, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝But it's true I've assisted some of them. It'd be difficult if you end up sharing a room with an older girl, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「相性もあるし、のべつまくなしにやると嫌われるからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝There's compatibility to consider too. If you keep changing your roommate, you'll end up being hated.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝There's compatibility to consider too. If you keep changing your roommate, you'll end up being hated.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「作法というか手続きは確かにある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝And there are certainly some procedures and formalities to go through.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝And there are certainly some procedures and formalities to go through.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「よかったらクドにそれを教えてあげてくれないかな…って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm wondering if you could instruct Kud on what she needs to do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm wondering if you could instruct Kud on what she needs to do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「来ヶ谷さん、クドが目を回してる回してる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san, Kud must be feeling dizzy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san, Kud must be feeling dizzy.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Uuyuu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Uuyuu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「おっと、つい夢中になってしまった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Oops, I got a bit carried away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Oops, I got a bit carried away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「クドリャフカ君は斜め４５度が一番抱き心地がいいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Kudryavka-kun, I like hugging you from a 45-degree angle.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Kudryavka-kun, I like hugging you from a 45-degree angle.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「大丈夫かね能美女史」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Are you all right, Miss Noumi?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Are you all right, Miss Noumi?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「……わふ？」
ドは来ヶ谷さんの胸の中でぐったりともたれかかっている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud was leaning against Kurugaya-san's chest wearily.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud was leaning against Kurugaya-san's chest wearily.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「そういうことなら、手伝ってもいい。寮長に話をつけるところからだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Very well, I'll help you. We'll have to visit the dorm head first.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Very well, I'll help you. We'll have to visit the dorm head first.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それは女子寮長にって、ことかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You mean the head of the girls' dorm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You mean the head of the girls' dorm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「そうだな、寮長継承がまだだから三年生だったと思うが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝That's right. This year's selection isn't finished yet, so she's a third year.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝That's right. This year's selection isn't finished yet, so she's a third year.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「確か鈴君の知り合いでもあったはずだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝And if I'm not mistaken, she's an acquaintance of Rin-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝And if I'm not mistaken, she's an acquaintance of Rin-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「鈴君に話を通してもらったほうがスムーズかもしれんな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝If Rin-kun puts in a good word for her, things will likely go smoothly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝If Rin-kun puts in a good word for her, things will likely go smoothly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんで鈴が寮長と？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why would they know each other?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why would they know each other?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「今の寮長も猫好きだからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Because the dorm head likes cats as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Because the dorm head likes cats as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あぁ、なるほど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, now I get it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, now I get it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: I nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「あとで鈴君に話しておこう。それから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'll talk with Rin-kun later. And besides.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'll talk with Rin-kun later. And besides.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…なにかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「授業に遅れるぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝We'll be late for class.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝We'll be late for class.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れだけ言って来ヶ谷さんはくるりと背を向け、歩き出した。
MESSAGE.EN: She said, as she turned her back to me and walked away.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said, as she turned her back to me and walked away.

MESSAGE.JP: 業が終わり、休み時間になる。
MESSAGE.EN: During recess.
MESSAGE.Translation: During recess.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「てめえーっ、謙吾ぉーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You...! Kengo!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You...! Kengo!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: きなり真人が謙吾に突っかかりに行っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: All of a sudden Masato screamed angrily.
MESSAGE.Translation: All of a sudden Masato screamed angrily.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「何だ、騒々しい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What is it, you're being noisy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What is it, you're being noisy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちょ、どうしたのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, what happened?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, what happened?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ゴッサムだよ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Gotham!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Gotham!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、意味が全然わからない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What are you talking about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What are you talking about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ああ…話せば長くなるが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's a long story...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's a long story...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「えーと…極めるに寒い、で…なんて読むんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, how do you read the kanji for ❛extremely cold❜?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, how do you read the kanji for ❛extremely cold❜?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえはゴッサムとでも読んでおけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It's ❛Gotham.❜ That's enough for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It's ❛Gotham.❜ That's enough for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「へー、そうなのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Eh, is that so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Eh, is that so...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「今年の冬はゴッサムだねえ、とか言うのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I can use it like ❛This winter is so Gotham,❜ right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I can use it like ❛This winter is so Gotham,❜ right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「よし、今年の冬に早速使ってみるぜっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Okay, I'll give it a try this winter.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Okay, I'll give it a try this winter.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ということがあったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That's what happened...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That's what happened...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ッサム…。
MESSAGE.EN: Gotham...
MESSAGE.Translation: Gotham...

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「だが、さっきの時間に国語辞典を眺めていたら、これは『ごっかん』と読むらしいじゃねえか!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝But I've just found that my Japanese dictionary says it's ❛gokkan❜!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝But I've just found that my Japanese dictionary says it's ❛gokkan❜!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「オレは危うくこいつのせいで『今年の冬はゴッサムだねえ』と言っちまうところだったんだっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I almost made an embarrassing mistake thanks to this guy!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I almost made an embarrassing mistake thanks to this guy!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ふん…そんな漢字も読めんやつが悪い」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hmph... it's your fault if you couldn't read such a simple character.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hmph... it's your fault if you couldn't read such a simple character.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ああ？　てめぇだって中坊の頃、美術の粘土細工の時間に『鞄』と『靴』を間違えてひとりで靴を作ってたことがあっただろうがっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Do you remember the time you misread the kanji for ❛basket❜ as ❛shoe❜ and were the only one who made shoes in art class when we were in junior high?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Do you remember the time you misread the kanji for ❛basket❜ as ❛shoe❜ and were the only one who made shoes in art class when we were in junior high?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あん時のクラス中を笑いに包んだおまえの姿が未だに忘れられねえぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I still can't forget how all the classmates were laughing at you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I still can't forget how all the classmates were laughing at you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「だからなんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What of it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What of it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「てめえの方が馬鹿だってことだ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I mean, you're much stupider than me!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I mean, you're much stupider than me!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: そのセリフを聞いた瞬間。
MESSAGE.EN: ...As soon as Kengo heard that line.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...As soon as Kengo heard that line.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…なんだとぅ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...What!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...What!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吾がキレた!!
MESSAGE.EN: He lost his temper!!
MESSAGE.Translation: He lost his temper!!

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「馬鹿に馬鹿呼ばわりされる筋合いはない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Why do I have to be called stupid by an idiot...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Why do I have to be called stupid by an idiot...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「やる気か？　受けて立つぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You up for it? Bring it on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You up for it? Bring it on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人もそのテンションに合わせて受け答える。
MESSAGE.EN: The tone of Masato's reply only added to the tension.
MESSAGE.Translation: The tone of Masato's reply only added to the tension.

MESSAGE.EN: *Buzz*...
MESSAGE.Translation: *Buzz*...

MESSAGE.JP: 穏な空気に、クラス中の注目が集まってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: The air in the class became electric as everyone's attention turned toward them.
MESSAGE.Translation: The air in the class became electric as everyone's attention turned toward them.

MESSAGE.JP: 野次馬@「おい、また井ノ原と宮沢がおっぱじめそうだぞっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Onlooker@❝Hey, Inohara and Miyazawa are about to get it on!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Onlooker@❝Hey, Inohara and Miyazawa are about to get it on!❞

MESSAGE.JP: んだなんだ、と瞬く間に人垣が出来上がっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: In no time, the other classmates had formed a circle around the two.
MESSAGE.Translation: In no time, the other classmates had formed a circle around the two.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あぁ…どうしよう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh no... What should I do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh no... What should I do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: の中に恭介の姿はない。始まる前に、呼びに行かないとっ！
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't see Kyousuke among them. I'll have to call him here fast before it starts!
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't see Kyousuke among them. I'll have to call him here fast before it starts!

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「立てよ、てめえ…見る影もねえほどボコボコに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Take a stance. I'll rip you apart...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Take a stance. I'll rip you apart...❞

MESSAGE.JP: すっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *WHAM*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *WHAM*!

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うおっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Ooh!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Ooh!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: のめりになり、机に倒れ込む。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato fell onto a desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato fell onto a desk.

MESSAGE.JP: かに背中を蹴られたようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Seemed like his back had been kicked by someone.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seemed like his back had been kicked by someone.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「全く、馬鹿どもが…時と場合を考えてじゃれ合え」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'm totally amazed by you idiots... Take the situation into consideration before messing around.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'm totally amazed by you idiots... Take the situation into consideration before messing around.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の主が真人の背後に立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a female student behind Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a female student behind Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: 男子生徒@「く、来ヶ谷だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student@❝I-it's Kurugaya...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student@❝I-it's Kurugaya...❞

MESSAGE.JP: の登場に、あたりはどよめきが支配し始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her sudden appearance surprised us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her sudden appearance surprised us.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「てめえ、何しやがるっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What the hell did you do that for!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What the hell did you do that for!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「それはこっちの台詞だ。こんなとこで何してやがる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝That's my line. What the hell are you doing here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝That's my line. What the hell are you doing here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「やるなら場所を変えろ。席まで戻れん、どけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝If you wanna continue, get out of here. You're in my way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝If you wanna continue, get out of here. You're in my way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんの行く道が、モーゼの伝説のように開けていく。
MESSAGE.EN: The onlookers opened a route for Kurugaya-san. It was like in the legend of Moses.
MESSAGE.Translation: The onlookers opened a route for Kurugaya-san. It was like in the legend of Moses.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「てめぇ…女が口を挟めるようなぬるい状況じゃねぇんだよ、黙ってろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝This is not a situation a girl should get involved in, just shut up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝This is not a situation a girl should get involved in, just shut up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「それはなんだ？　私に喧嘩を売っているのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What do you mean? Trying to pick a fight with me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What do you mean? Trying to pick a fight with me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「脅してんだよ。てめえに売るにゃ喧嘩はもったいねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No, I'm just warning you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No, I'm just warning you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…興が冷めたな。ここまでだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...Okay, that cooled my temper.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...Okay, that cooled my temper.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吾はひとつ息を吐き、次の授業の準備を整えると席を立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo breathed a sigh and stood up, starting to prepare for the next class.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo breathed a sigh and stood up, starting to prepare for the next class.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「てめえ、逃げるのかよっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Wait, you running!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Wait, you running!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「来ヶ谷の顔を見たら…馬鹿げたことで熱くなりすぎと反省した。冷たいものでも買ってこよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Seeing Kurugaya made me calm down. I'll go and get something to drink.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Seeing Kurugaya made me calm down. I'll go and get something to drink.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「それと…その女を舐めないほうがいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝And you'd better not underestimate her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝And you'd better not underestimate her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あぁ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「これは忠告だ、真人」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Be careful, Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Be careful, Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: う言い残し、謙吾はその場を去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Then Kengo left the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then Kengo left the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「で、なんだ？　私を血祭るんだったか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝So, were you saying you're going to kick my ass, or what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝So, were you saying you're going to kick my ass, or what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人を斜めに見、挑発的にいう。
MESSAGE.EN: She cast Masato a sidelong glance provocatively.
MESSAGE.Translation: She cast Masato a sidelong glance provocatively.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…マジでぶっ飛ばされてぇのかよ、てめぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...You seriously need to learn a lesson.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...You seriously need to learn a lesson.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「上等だ、泣いてもしらねぇぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Great, I'll make you weep.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Great, I'll make you weep.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ほう、このおねーさんを泣かせられる男などそうはいないぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Ho, that sounds interesting. I've never met a man who could make me cry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Ho, that sounds interesting. I've never met a man who could make me cry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「果たしてキミはどうかな、真人君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I really wonder if you can, Masato-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I really wonder if you can, Masato-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちょ、ちょっと待ってよ、来ヶ谷さんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W-wait a second, Kurugaya-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W-wait a second, Kurugaya-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「真人と本気で喧嘩する気…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you sure you want to challenge him?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you sure you want to challenge him?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ルールがあったろう。それを適用してもらおう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝There are some rules, right? Apply them to our battle.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝There are some rules, right? Apply them to our battle.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんの言葉に、野次馬たちが歓声を上げ始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: Hearing her words, the audience started roaring.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hearing her words, the audience started roaring.

MESSAGE.JP: 男子生徒@「来るぜ、バトルだっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student@❝Another battle!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student@❝Another battle!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男子生徒@「てめえら、準備はいいかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student@❝You guys ready?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student@❝You guys ready?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 野次馬達@「ヒャッホーーーウッ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Onlookers@❝Yeee haaa!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Onlookers@❝Yeee haaa!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: だめだ、もう止まりそうにない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Oh my god, everybody's completely out of control.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Oh my god, everybody's completely out of control.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「心配いらんよ。キミは黙ってみてればいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Don't worry. Just watch quietly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Don't worry. Just watch quietly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そんなこと言われてもなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Even if she says that...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Even if she says that...

MESSAGE.JP: 黙って来ヶ谷さんの言葉を信じることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to believe in her words.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to believe in her words.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「てめぇ、オレをここまでコケにするってこたぁ覚悟はできてんだろうな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Are you ready to pay the consequences for making a fool of me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Are you ready to pay the consequences for making a fool of me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「オレが勝ったら、今後てめぇのこと…らいらいだにと呼ぶぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Once I win, I'll be calling you Rairaidani, okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Once I win, I'll be calling you Rairaidani, okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「なんだ、それは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What is that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What is that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クラス発表の張り出しで、来ヶ谷さんの名前を見て、素でそう読んだんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He misread your name when this year's class-member division was announced.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He misread your name when this year's class-member division was announced.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男子生徒@「さすが真人だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student@❝That's our Masato...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student@❝That's our Masato...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男子生徒@「あほだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student@❝Dimwit...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student@❝Dimwit...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うっせぇーーよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Just shut the hell up!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Just shut the hell up!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「オレは、己の間違いも、この拳で真実に変えてみせるさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm going to change even my mistakes into truths with my fists...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm going to change even my mistakes into truths with my fists...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ならば私が勝ったら昼の放送に『本日の２−Ｅ井ノ原君』という、キサマの恥ずかしいことを赤裸々に公開するコーナーを設置してくれよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Then if I win, I'll publicize all the embarrassing things you've done with the daily school broadcast. It'll be called ❛Today's 2-E Inohara-kun.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Then if I win, I'll publicize all the embarrassing things you've done with the daily school broadcast. It'll be called ❛Today's 2-E Inohara-kun.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「周囲の視線に晒され、安息の日々もない生活を送る恐怖を味わうがいい…！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Why don't you enjoy the looks everyone will give you, as your life spirals down into dread and misery...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Why don't you enjoy the looks everyone will give you, as your life spirals down into dread and misery...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: っちもある意味最悪だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Her idea was also terrifying in its own way...
MESSAGE.Translation: Her idea was also terrifying in its own way...

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「望むところだぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm looking forward to it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm looking forward to it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「望まないほうがいいと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think it's something you should be looking forward to...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think it's something you should be looking forward to...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 野次馬@「マジだぜ、こりゃあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Onlooker@❝They really mean it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Onlooker@❝They really mean it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 迫感が場を支配し始める。
MESSAGE.EN: A feeling of immediacy was forming.
MESSAGE.Translation: A feeling of immediacy was forming.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: に振り返ると、恭介が窓枠から床に降り立ったところだった。
MESSAGE.EN: When I turned around, I saw Kyousuke land on the floor from the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I turned around, I saw Kyousuke land on the floor from the window.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、遅いよ、恭介っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're late, Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're late, Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「すまんな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: りあえず、これで安心だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I was relieved.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was relieved.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…あの女子は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Who's that girl?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Who's that girl?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？　同じクラスの来ヶ谷さんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's Kurugaya-san, a classmate.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's Kurugaya-san, a classmate.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ふーん、来ヶ谷っていうのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Kurugaya...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Kurugaya...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…あいつのおかげで助かったみたいだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Seems like you avoided trouble thanks to her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Seems like you avoided trouble thanks to her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？　なんで？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, how so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, how so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「真人と謙吾の喧嘩を止めたのは、その来ヶ谷だろう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Wasn't it her who stopped Masato and Kengo?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Wasn't it her who stopped Masato and Kengo?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、ああ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ういう見方もあるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Yeah, you could certainly see it that way.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yeah, you could certainly see it that way.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、結果的にはそうなのかもしれないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, as far as the final result is concerned it might be true, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, as far as the final result is concerned it might be true, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: の人は引っ掻き回して楽しんでるだけのような気もする…。
MESSAGE.EN: I think she simply enjoys stirring up commotion...
MESSAGE.Translation: I think she simply enjoys stirring up commotion...

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「じゃあ、ここからは俺が仕切らせてもらうぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, let me manage this battle.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, let me manage this battle.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介がふたりの間に入っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke stepped between them.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke stepped between them.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「棗恭介、だったかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You're Kyousuke Natsume, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You're Kyousuke Natsume, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「お、俺を知ってるのか。話が早いな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝So you know of me? That makes things easier.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝So you know of me? That makes things easier.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「キミ達は自分が有名人だと自覚した方がいいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You guys need to take notice of the fact that you're famous.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You guys need to take notice of the fact that you're famous.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「おっしゃるとおりで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's just as you say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's just as you say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 笑する。
MESSAGE.EN: He smiled wryly.
MESSAGE.Translation: He smiled wryly.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「能書きはもういい…さっさと始めようぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Enough with the talk... Let's begin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Enough with the talk... Let's begin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「わかったよ、じゃあおまえら頼むぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, everyone get ready!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, everyone get ready!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「バトルスタート！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Battle Start!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Battle Start!❞

MESSAGE.JP: りの野次馬に合図を送る。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke sent a sign to the audience.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke sent a sign to the audience.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりの間に、野次馬たちから次々と武器が投げ込まれ始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: They started throwing weapons to the fighters.
MESSAGE.Translation: They started throwing weapons to the fighters.

MESSAGE.JP: して真人が手にしたものは…。
MESSAGE.EN: What Masato got was...
MESSAGE.Translation: What Masato got was...

MESSAGE.JP: ラスティック製の樽に、ナイフのセット。
MESSAGE.EN: A set of plastic items: a barrel and a few knives.
MESSAGE.Translation: A set of plastic items: a barrel and a few knives.

MESSAGE.JP: には海賊の人形がセットされている。
MESSAGE.EN: There was also a barrel with a pirate figure loaded in it.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was also a barrel with a pirate figure loaded in it.

MESSAGE.JP: イフを横のスリットにさしていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato inserted the knives into slits on the sides of the barrel.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato inserted the knives into slits on the sides of the barrel.

MESSAGE.JP: ちっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Ka-ching*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Ka-ching*.

MESSAGE.JP: 人形が飛び出した。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The figure jumped up from the inside of the barrel.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The figure jumped up from the inside of the barrel.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「それおまえの武器な」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That's your weapon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That's your weapon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うああああああああーーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uaaaaaaaaaaa!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uaaaaaaaaaaa!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴との戦いの敗北感が蘇ってきたらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He seemed to remember the sense of defeat he suffered in the battle with Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He seemed to remember the sense of defeat he suffered in the battle with Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: 生徒Ａ@「こりゃ今回も勝負は決まったな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student A@❝The game is already over...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student A@❝The game is already over...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 生徒Ｂ@「いや、井ノ原ならあるいは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student B@❝No, I guess Inohara would...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student B@❝No, I guess Inohara would...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「くそぅっ、ものすごい勢いで刺して、ものすごい勢いで飛び出したこいつを喰らわせてやる！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Dammit, I'll insert the knives like crazy and get the figure to pop up and hit her like crazy!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Dammit, I'll insert the knives like crazy and get the figure to pop up and hit her like crazy!❞

MESSAGE.JP: けくそ気味だった…。
MESSAGE.EN: He seemed kind of desperate...
MESSAGE.Translation: He seemed kind of desperate...

MESSAGE.JP: する来ヶ谷さんは。
MESSAGE.EN: On the other hand, Kurugaya-san's weapon was...
MESSAGE.Translation: On the other hand, Kurugaya-san's weapon was...

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「これでいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'll use this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'll use this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: らり、と$K40日本刀$K0を抜き放つ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...A $K40Japanese sword$K0. She drew it quietly.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...A $K40Japanese sword$K0. She drew it quietly.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわ、銃刀法違反!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's illegal, isn't it!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's illegal, isn't it!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「なに、模造刀だ。斬れはしない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝No problem. This is only a replica.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝No problem. This is only a replica.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ただ、殴られるととても痛いだろうがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It'll hurt very, very much, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It'll hurt very, very much, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「燃えてきたぜ…上等だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Great... I'm getting more excited!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Great... I'm getting more excited!❞

MESSAGE.JP: が、その手にあるのは$K84あおひげ$K0だ。
MESSAGE.EN: However, it was a $K84pirate figure$K0 that he was holding.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, it was a $K84pirate figure$K0 that he was holding.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「この私に殴られるのがそんなに嬉しいか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You're looking forward to being hit by me that much?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You're looking forward to being hit by me that much?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ちげぇーよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You wish!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You wish!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それと、真人は自分が持ってるものを再確認した方がいいよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato, you'd better realize what your weapon is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato, you'd better realize what your weapon is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 分、前にあった鈴戦の二の舞になるだろうなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe this battle will be a repetition of the one he had with Rin before...
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe this battle will be a repetition of the one he had with Rin before...

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「恭介氏、一つ確認願いたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Mr. Kyousuke, let me check something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Mr. Kyousuke, let me check something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ん、なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「武器で戦えばその他はルール無用だったな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝There's no other rule than to use the weapons, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝There's no other rule than to use the weapons, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ああ、とりあえずは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, that's all for now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, that's all for now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「了解した」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Understood.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Understood.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんはそう言うと、にやりと不敵な笑みを浮かべた。
MESSAGE.EN: She made a sinister smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: She made a sinister smile.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「んじゃ、オレはこれ拳に着けて殴っていいか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Can I wear the barrel on my right hand and punch her, then?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Can I wear the barrel on my right hand and punch her, then?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ダメ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「それ差別じゃねっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Isn't that discrimination!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Isn't that discrimination!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「女尊男卑が許される社会を呪うがいい。行くぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝If you want to blame something, you can curse the society that places women above men. Now here I come.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝If you want to blame something, you can curse the society that places women above men. Now here I come.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「やる前から勝負ついてるようなもんだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think this fight's already decided...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think this fight's already decided...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 生徒Ａ@「残念だぜ。井ノ原にまともな武器がいってれば、面白い事になりそうだったのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student A@❝What a pity... If Inohara got a more normal weapon, it'd be more exciting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student A@❝What a pity... If Inohara got a more normal weapon, it'd be more exciting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そしたら危ないでしょ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wouldn't that be pretty dangerous...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wouldn't that be pretty dangerous...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 生徒Ａ@「いや、強いよ来ヶ谷は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student A@❝No, she's strong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student A@❝No, she's strong.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、あれ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wh, what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wh, what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんが音もなく真人の側面に移動していた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Kurugaya-san moved to Masato's side without a sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Kurugaya-san moved to Masato's side without a sound.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「へえ、すごいな来ヶ谷」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Wow, she's amazing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Wow, she's amazing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「な…やるじゃねえか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...Not bad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...Not bad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「友人の忠告は聞くものだ。舐めないほうがいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You should heed your friend's advice. Don't underestimate me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You should heed your friend's advice. Don't underestimate me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「勝つ気ではなく闘うつもりで来るべきだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝And don't think you've already beaten me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝And don't think you've already beaten me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「てめぇこそこのオレに勝つ気かよ…その度胸だけは買ってやるぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You too, thinking you can take me down... I admire your courage...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You too, thinking you can take me down... I admire your courage...❞

MESSAGE.JP: らり、と真人がナイフを指いっぱいに構え、樽を来ヶ谷さんのほうに向ける。
MESSAGE.EN: Holding the knives in his hands, Masato slowly aimed the barrel at Kurugaya-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Holding the knives in his hands, Masato slowly aimed the barrel at Kurugaya-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「キミは今の自分の姿に疑問はないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Shouldn't you be questioning the way you look right now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Shouldn't you be questioning the way you look right now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うるせぇ…こいつで不可能を可能にする男の称号を欲しいままにしてやるぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Shut up... I'm going to claim the title of a man who makes the impossible possible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Shut up... I'm going to claim the title of a man who makes the impossible possible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ほう、どのようにしてだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Ho, do tell me how.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Ho, do tell me how.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「不可能を可能にしてだ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Just make the impossible possible!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Just make the impossible possible!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 体性はまったくない。
MESSAGE.EN: That was a very vague plan.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was a very vague plan.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「まあ、もう少し遊んでやらんでもないが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I can play with you a little bit longer...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I can play with you a little bit longer...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「…結果が追いつく前に勝った気になっている時点で、それは最早負けているのだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Once you've deluded yourself into thinking the victory is yours in advance, your defeat has already been decided.❞
