MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Once you've deluded yourself into thinking the victory is yours in advance, your defeat has already been decided.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「キミはでかくて強くて堅いが、下手だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You're huge, strong and firm, but you don't have any skill.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You're huge, strong and firm, but you don't have any skill.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んかこの人が言うとエロく聞こえるのはなぜだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Why does her way of talking sound so dirty...
MESSAGE.Translation: Why does her way of talking sound so dirty...

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「さて…理樹君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Say, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Say, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes?❞

MESSAGE.JP: っちに振り向くと、親指で何かをピン、と弾いた。取り落としそうになりながら、僕はそれを受け取る。
MESSAGE.EN: She turned around and flipped something at me. I almost didn't catch it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She turned around and flipped something at me. I almost didn't catch it.

MESSAGE.JP: 百円玉だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It was a one-hundred yen coin.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It was a one-hundred yen coin.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「こう動くと喉が渇きそうだ。なにかスポーツドリンクでも買ってきておいてくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I should be getting thirsty once this is over. Will you go and buy me a sports drink or something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I should be getting thirsty once this is over. Will you go and buy me a sports drink or something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「は、はぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝S, sure...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝S, sure...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「舐めてんじゃねえぞっ！　かかってきやがれ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Don't take me lightly! Bring it on!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Don't take me lightly! Bring it on!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「舐めているだと？　違うな、飲んでいるのだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝❛Taking you lightly❜? No. I'm overwhelming you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝❛Taking you lightly❜? No. I'm overwhelming you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「さあ、翻弄してやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Now, I'll lead you around by the nose.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Now, I'll lead you around by the nose.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゅっ、という音がリノリウムに響く。
MESSAGE.EN: The sound of her steps echoed off the walls.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sound of her steps echoed off the walls.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんがいつのまにか真人の後ろに回りこんでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Quick as a flash, Kurugaya-san stepped behind Masato before anyone could see what was happening.
MESSAGE.Translation: Quick as a flash, Kurugaya-san stepped behind Masato before anyone could see what was happening.

MESSAGE.JP: 唖然とする一同。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Everyone was struck dumb with astonishment.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Everyone was struck dumb with astonishment.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「し、瞬間移動…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Te, teleportation...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Te, teleportation...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: んでもないものに立ち会ってるみたいだ、僕は。
MESSAGE.EN: Seems like I witnessed something abnormal.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seems like I witnessed something abnormal.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…本当に運が悪かったな、真人は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...I really pity Masato and his horrible luck.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...I really pity Masato and his horrible luck.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「もうちょっとまともな格闘武器でも出てたら、いいバトルになったろうに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝If only he had gotten a more normal weapon, this battle might've been quite tight.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝If only he had gotten a more normal weapon, this battle might've been quite tight.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まあ、来ヶ谷さんの動きも普通じゃないしね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But her speed is as extraordinary as his weapon is ordinary...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But her speed is as extraordinary as his weapon is ordinary...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「それこそうちのチームに欲しい人材じゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Isn't that exactly the kind of talent we need on our team?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Isn't that exactly the kind of talent we need on our team?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…まあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ほう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Ho.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Ho.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…きかねえな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...It's useless.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...It's useless.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人は来ヶ谷さんの剣を白刃取りで受けていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato caught the blade with his naked hand when Kurugaya-san swung straight at him.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato caught the blade with his naked hand when Kurugaya-san swung straight at him.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「まあ、そういうわけだ…てめえがいくら仕掛けたところで、オレにゃあ通用しねえ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, that's how it is... No matter how many times you attack me, it won't work...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, that's how it is... No matter how many times you attack me, it won't work...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「てめえの体力とオレの体力、どっちが続くかはわかってるよな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝My stamina and yours, it's obvious which is better...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝My stamina and yours, it's obvious which is better...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…手加減できるかはわからねぇ。降参するなら今のうちだぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm not sure I can go easy on you, so just give up before it's too late.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm not sure I can go easy on you, so just give up before it's too late.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「この期に及んで手加減とは片腹痛い」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Go easy on me? Don't make me laugh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Go easy on me? Don't make me laugh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「泣いて喚いて哀願すれば、今ならまだ許してやらんことも無いが？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝If you cry and beg me for mercy now, I may still forgive you. How about it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝If you cry and beg me for mercy now, I may still forgive you. How about it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「へっ…てめえは今、このオレの最後のリミッターを外しちまったようだぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Heh... You've just completely broken my final limiter...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Heh... You've just completely broken my final limiter...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「今!!　オレの怒りが…有頂天に達したぁッ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That's it!! I've reached the ECSTASY of my anger!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That's it!! I've reached the ECSTASY of my anger!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「頂点な」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The PEAK of your anger.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The PEAK of your anger.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 違えていた!!
MESSAGE.EN: He made a mistake!!
MESSAGE.Translation: He made a mistake!!

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「頂点に達したァッッ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I've reached the PEAK of my anger!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I've reached the PEAK of my anger!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: い直した!!
MESSAGE.EN: He corrected it!!
MESSAGE.Translation: He corrected it!!

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「わかったからキミは有頂天でひゃっほうとか言っているといい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Fine fine, be euphoric and run around yelling ❛yahoo❜ all you want then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Fine fine, be euphoric and run around yelling ❛yahoo❜ all you want then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うるせぇーよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Shut up!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Shut up!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「食らいやがれ!!　このオレの怒りを込めた…あおひげの一撃をぉっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Take this!! The Pirate Attack imbued with My Anger!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Take this!! The Pirate Attack imbued with My Anger!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ってる事はカッコいいが、やってることは樽にナイフを差しているだけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: While what he said sounded strong, what he actually did was just insert the knives into the slits.
MESSAGE.Translation: While what he said sounded strong, what he actually did was just insert the knives into the slits.

MESSAGE.JP: ちっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Ka-ching*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Ka-ching*.

MESSAGE.JP: び出した。
MESSAGE.EN: The figure flew out.
MESSAGE.Translation: The figure flew out.

MESSAGE.JP: ける事もなく食らう。
MESSAGE.EN: Without even trying to dodge, she received the attack.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without even trying to dodge, she received the attack.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「…何千発当てるつもりだキミは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...How many times are you going to do that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...How many times are you going to do that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「勝つまでだ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Until I win!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Until I win!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「悪いが付き合ってられんぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Sorry, but I can't keep you company any more.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Sorry, but I can't keep you company any more.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「だが…あおひげがオレの手にある限り、どこまでもてめえを追い続けるぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝So long as I've got this pirate figure in my hands, I'm gonna follow you everywhere...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝So long as I've got this pirate figure in my hands, I'm gonna follow you everywhere...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そして最後に笑うのは、オレだぁーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝And I'll be the last one laughing!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝And I'll be the last one laughing!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おっと、回収を忘れてたぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oops, mustn't forget to pick him up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oops, mustn't forget to pick him up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人が人形を拾いにかかる。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato tried to pick up the figure.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato tried to pick up the figure.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ふん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hmph.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hmph.❞

MESSAGE.JP: っきぃーんっ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san raised her sword and
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san raised her sword and

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんは刀で人形を弾き飛ばした。
MESSAGE.EN: flicked off the figure.
MESSAGE.Translation: flicked off the figure.

MESSAGE.JP: 踏の中へ消えていくあおひげ人形…。
MESSAGE.EN: The pirate flew into the audience and disappeared.
MESSAGE.Translation: The pirate flew into the audience and disappeared.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ぎゃああぁぁああぁぁーーっ!!　なんてことしやがるーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Gyaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!! What a thing to do!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Gyaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!! What a thing to do!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あれ一個しかねえんだぞっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That's the only one!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That's the only one!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人は四つんばいになって人形を探し回る。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Masato got down on all fours and searched around for the figure.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Masato got down on all fours and searched around for the figure.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「武器以外での攻撃は禁止だったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝No attacking without weapons, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝No attacking without weapons, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんはゆったりと真人の背後に歩み寄る。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san walked up to Masato's back in a relaxed way.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san walked up to Masato's back in a relaxed way.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんがごすごすごす、と真人を攻撃しまくっていても、真人は必死にあおひげ人形を探し出そうとしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Although she attacked him over and over, he was still groping around for the doll.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Although she attacked him over and over, he was still groping around for the doll.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あおひげよぉーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝My dear, where are you!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝My dear, where are you!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おまえはこの樽以外に帰る場所はないんだぞ、かえってこぉーい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Your only home is inside this barrel! Just come back...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Your only home is inside this barrel! Just come back...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「哀れだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's so pitiful...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's so pitiful...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ていうか、タフだなあいつ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rather than that, isn't he tough...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rather than that, isn't he tough...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「どうした、降参しないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hey, why not give up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hey, why not give up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「誰がするかよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Who said anything about giving up!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Who said anything about giving up!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「いいだろう、どこまで耐えられるか試してみるとするか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Fine. Let's see how tough your body is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Fine. Let's see how tough your body is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんがゆらり、と構えを取った。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She slowly held up her sword.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She slowly held up her sword.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「あぁすまん、武器以外で戦っちゃいけないんだったな。これはうっかりしていた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Oh sorry. I was supposed to only fight with my weapon. How very careless of me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Oh sorry. I was supposed to only fight with my weapon. How very careless of me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ついヒートアップして蹴りを入れてしまった。私の負けだよ真人君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I got too excited and accidentally kicked you. It's my loss, Masato-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I got too excited and accidentally kicked you. It's my loss, Masato-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: っはっは、と笑いながら全然動かない真人を見下ろす。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Ha ha ha,❜ she was laughing it off while staring down at Masato, who wasn't moving at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Ha ha ha,❜ she was laughing it off while staring down at Masato, who wasn't moving at all.

MESSAGE.JP: 男子生徒２@「鮮やかだ…背中を向けていたとはいえ、あの井ノ原を蹴りで倒しきるとは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student 2@❝Amazing. Even if it was from behind, she finished him off by only kicking.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student 2@❝Amazing. Even if it was from behind, she finished him off by only kicking.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男子生徒１@「井ノ原も哀れだったな…武器が別のだったらもっと善戦できたろうに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student 1@❝I feel sorry for Inohara... He would've put up a better fight if only he had gotten a better weapon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student 1@❝I feel sorry for Inohara... He would've put up a better fight if only he had gotten a better weapon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ギャラリーたちが口々に今の戦闘の解説をする。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The galleries seemed unanimous on the outcome of the battle.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The galleries seemed unanimous on the outcome of the battle.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「…勝負あり、か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The match is settled...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The match is settled...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介は真人に歩み寄ると、その顔を覗き込む。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke got close to Masato and peered into his face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke got close to Masato and peered into his face.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「おい、おまえの勝ちだってさ、真人」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, it's your win, Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, it's your win, Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うおおおおおっ、チクショウッ！　オレの勝ちなわけあるかぁっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uoooooooooooo, dammit! How the hell could it be my win!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uoooooooooooo, dammit! How the hell could it be my win!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「だって本人も反則って認めてるし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝She admitted her foul play.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝She admitted her foul play.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「特訓だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I need training...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I need training...❞

MESSAGE.JP: くと、立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: He muttered and got on his feet.
MESSAGE.Translation: He muttered and got on his feet.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「山に篭る」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Must seclude myself on a mountain...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Must seclude myself on a mountain...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「今からか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Right now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Right now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あぁ…後はよろしくな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yeah... See you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yeah... See you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人は去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato took off.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato took off.

MESSAGE.JP: 彼がまともな武器を手にする日はやってくるのだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder if he's ever going to get a normal weapon...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder if he's ever going to get a normal weapon...

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まぁ、引き分けってことだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, I guess it's a draw.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, I guess it's a draw.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「しかしなかなかいい動きだったな、来ヶ谷」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, Kurugaya, your footwork was awesome.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, Kurugaya, your footwork was awesome.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「まぁ、まともに相手しちゃ一方的にやられるだけだろうがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝If we fought fair and square, he would have definitely won.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝If we fought fair and square, he would have definitely won.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「頭弱い子ならいくらでも相手できる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝But there's no way I could lose to any number of half-baked boys.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝But there's no way I could lose to any number of half-baked boys.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の人なら、闇の執行部相手でも勝てるのでは…？
MESSAGE.EN: Couldn't they win against the Darkness Executives...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Couldn't they win against the Darkness Executives...?

MESSAGE.JP: (1,0)さんとタッグを組んだら、それこそ敵なしなのでは…？
MESSAGE.EN: If she and $(1,1) form a tag team, wouldn't they be unbeatable...?
MESSAGE.Translation: If she and $(1,1) form a tag team, wouldn't they be unbeatable...?

MESSAGE.JP: ど、助太刀してもらったら、鈴を危険にさらすことになるのは変わりない…。
MESSAGE.EN: But if I bring along a helper, that won't change the fact I'm exposing Rin to danger...
MESSAGE.Translation: But if I bring along a helper, that won't change the fact I'm exposing Rin to danger...

MESSAGE.JP: あぁあぁぁ、やきもきするっ！
MESSAGE.EN: Aaaaaaah this is so frustrating!
MESSAGE.Translation: Aaaaaaah this is so frustrating!

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「どうした、やきもきして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Why are you so frustrated?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Why are you so frustrated?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 際やきもきしてるんだよぉ！
MESSAGE.EN: This is really frustrating!
MESSAGE.Translation: This is really frustrating!

MESSAGE.JP: 介と来ヶ谷さん、ふたりいれば鬼に金棒だよ！
MESSAGE.EN: With both Kyousuke and Kurugaya-san it'd be an unstoppable team!
MESSAGE.Translation: With both Kyousuke and Kurugaya-san it'd be an unstoppable team!

MESSAGE.JP: ああーっ！　やきもきやきもき！
MESSAGE.EN: Aaaaah! So frustrating!
MESSAGE.Translation: Aaaaah! So frustrating!

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そいつは頼もしいことで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That's very reliable of you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That's very reliable of you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: たりは苦笑しあう。
MESSAGE.EN: They each made a wry smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: They each made a wry smile.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「さて…じゃあ理樹、後は任せた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝So, Riki. I'll leave the rest to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝So, Riki. I'll leave the rest to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介の去り際、ぽん、と肩を叩かれる。
MESSAGE.EN: He patted my shoulder and went back to his classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: He patted my shoulder and went back to his classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ふう、さすがにああも動くと暑いな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Phew. It really did get a little hot...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Phew. It really did get a little hot...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ヶ谷さんが制服の胸元に風を扇ぎ入れる。
MESSAGE.EN: She was using her hand to fan air into her cleavage to cool herself down.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was using her hand to fan air into her cleavage to cool herself down.

MESSAGE.JP: 余裕そうに見えていたが、実際は結構ハードだったらしく、額にも汗が浮いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Although she had seemed to be fighting calmly, she had actually gotten sweaty.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although she had seemed to be fighting calmly, she had actually gotten sweaty.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「何だ少年、使いっぱしりは嫌だったか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What's wrong, young man? Didn't like to be made my runner?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What's wrong, young man? Didn't like to be made my runner?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや…なんか、目が離せなかった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No... I just couldn't take my eyes from...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No... I just couldn't take my eyes from...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「おっぱいからか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝My breasts?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝My breasts?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「違うよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「はっはっは、まあいいさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Ha ha ha, don't mind it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Ha ha ha, don't mind it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の手から百円玉を取る。
MESSAGE.EN: She took the hundred yen coin from my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took the hundred yen coin from my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「うむ、自販機へは自分で行くとしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Okay, I'll go and pick it up myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Okay, I'll go and pick it up myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: だ残る野次馬たちを掻き分け、廊下を進んでいく。
MESSAGE.EN: Pushing through the audience, she walked down the hallway.
MESSAGE.Translation: Pushing through the audience, she walked down the hallway.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何者なんだあの人…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do I even know this person at all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do I even know this person at all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男子生徒２@「俺たちは伝説の始まりを見たのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student 2@❝We just witnessed the beginning of a legend.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student 2@❝We just witnessed the beginning of a legend.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 男子生徒２@「語り継がれていくサーガの序章をな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Male Student 2@❝The prologue of a saga...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Male Student 2@❝The prologue of a saga...❞

MESSAGE.JP: こいつも何者なんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...And what about that guy?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And what about that guy?

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ただいま」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I've returned.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I've returned.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、おかえり（はや！）」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W, welcome back. (That was fast!)❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W, welcome back. (That was fast!)❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「やっぱり危ないって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's dangerous.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's dangerous.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「なんだつまらん。ノリノリで応援してくれるかと思ったのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What a bore. I thought you'd cheer me on raucously.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What a bore. I thought you'd cheer me on raucously.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「ふむ…仕方ない。面白少年の相手もここまでとするか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Okay... Can't be helped. Time to finish fooling around with a silly boy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Okay... Can't be helped. Time to finish fooling around with a silly boy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あ？　逃げる気かよてめえっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey? You're gonna run away?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey? You're gonna run away?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「キミは理樹君に感謝すべきだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You should thank Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You should thank Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「こらこら。女子相手に何の騒ぎだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hey now, what's going on here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hey now, what's going on here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、恭介…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke...❞

MESSAGE.JP: に振り返ると、恭介が窓枠から床に降り立ったところだった。
MESSAGE.EN: When I turned around, I found Kyousuke coming in through the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I turned around, I found Kyousuke coming in through the window.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「丁度良かったよ、恭介」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Good timing, Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Good timing, Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: りあえず、これで安心だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I was relieved by his arrival.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was relieved by his arrival.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「棗恭介、だったかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You're Kyousuke Natsume, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You're Kyousuke Natsume, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「お、俺を知ってるのか。話が早いな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝So you know of me? That makes things easier.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝So you know of me? That makes things easier.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「キミ達は自分が有名人だと自覚した方がいいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You guys need to take notice of the fact that you're famous.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You guys need to take notice of the fact that you're famous.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「おっしゃるとおりで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's just as you say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's just as you say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 笑する。
MESSAGE.EN: He smiled wryly.
MESSAGE.Translation: He smiled wryly.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「能書きはもういい…さっさと始めようぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Enough with the talk... Let's begin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Enough with the talk... Let's begin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ああ、バトルだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, time to get it started...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, time to get it started...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 図を待ち、一斉にみんなが恭介のほうに視線を向けた。
MESSAGE.EN: The entire audience, waiting for his signal, turned their gaze on him.
MESSAGE.Translation: The entire audience, waiting for his signal, turned their gaze on him.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: び場に目を戻すと。
MESSAGE.EN: However, as we looked back to the center of the circle.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, as we looked back to the center of the circle.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あれ、いない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's gone...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's gone...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うおおっ、どこ行きやがったらいらいだにーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uohhh, where are you, Rairaidani!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uohhh, where are you, Rairaidani!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: みんなが恭介に注目している間に、来ヶ谷さんの姿は消えていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...While everybody was paying attention to Kyousuke, Kurugaya-san had vanished.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...While everybody was paying attention to Kyousuke, Kurugaya-san had vanished.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「へえ…面白いやつだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝She's interesting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝She's interesting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What do you mean?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What do you mean?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介が真人の背中を指差す。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke pointed at Masato's back.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke pointed at Masato's back.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「な、なにィーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Wha, what!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Wha, what!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ボクバカです!!　ぐへへ』と書かれたルーズリーフが貼られていた。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a piece of paper saying [I'm stupid!! Guahaha!] on his back.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a piece of paper saying [I'm stupid!! Guahaha!] on his back.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「おまえ、全然気付かなかったのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You didn't notice it at all?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You didn't notice it at all?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「いや気付いていたとも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yes, I did.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yes, I did.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「この一枚はあえて貼らせてやったに過ぎん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I allowed her to do that on purpose...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I allowed her to do that on purpose...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「じゃ、おまえの負けだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You should admit your loss.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You should admit your loss.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人の頭の上にヒマワリが咲いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...There was a sunflower blooming on top of Masato's head.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...There was a sunflower blooming on top of Masato's head.

MESSAGE.JP: や、ヒマワリ型の玩具なんだろうけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course, it was not a real one.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course, it was not a real one.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「げぇーっ、いつの間に!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Geeee, when did she do this!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Geeee, when did she do this!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 野次馬Ａ@「あまりに似合ってるんで気付かなかったぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Onlooker A@❝That flower suits him so well that we didn't notice at all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Onlooker A@❝That flower suits him so well that we didn't notice at all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「似合わねえよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It doesn't suit me!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It doesn't suit me!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「理樹、相手の女子の名前は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, do you know her name?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, do you know her name?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？　来ヶ谷さんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, that was Kurugaya-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, that was Kurugaya-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「なるほど。あの動きはうちのチームに欲しい人材だな。盗塁王も夢じゃないぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I see. We need her for our team. I'm sure she'll be a base stealing champion.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I see. We need her for our team. I'm sure she'll be a base stealing champion.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…まあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Maybe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Maybe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 方的に真人がコケにされただけで終わった…。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyway, I was relieved that nothing violent had happened...
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyway, I was relieved that nothing violent had happened...

MESSAGE.JP: 師が休みのため、自習中だ。
MESSAGE.EN: We are doing self-study now because the teacher is away.
MESSAGE.Translation: We are doing self-study now because the teacher is away.

MESSAGE.JP: 人はふぅ…と緊張を解き、天井を仰いで、そのまま寝てしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato sighed as his tension was drained off and, leaning back to face the ceiling, fell asleep.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato sighed as his tension was drained off and, leaning back to face the ceiling, fell asleep.

MESSAGE.JP: 人かが携帯を取り出し、さぼり始めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Some of the classmates were killing time with their cellphones.
MESSAGE.Translation: Some of the classmates were killing time with their cellphones.

MESSAGE.JP: れを見て、僕は思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: That reminded me of something.
MESSAGE.Translation: That reminded me of something.

MESSAGE.JP: ういや、恭介が主催しているサイトのＱＲコードを撮ってあったんだ。すっかり忘れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Come to think of it, I've saved the QR code that should lead to Kyousuke's website.
MESSAGE.Translation: Come to think of it, I've saved the QR code that should lead to Kyousuke's website.

MESSAGE.JP: も不真面目な生徒だな…。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess this makes me a bad student as well...
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess this makes me a bad student as well...

MESSAGE.JP: う考えながら、携帯を立ち上げて、恭介の作ったサイトに飛んでみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned on my cellphone and went to the site.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned on my cellphone and went to the site.

MESSAGE.JP: イト名は張り紙にあったのと同じ『恭介の一問一答』。
MESSAGE.EN: I saw a site titled [Kyousuke's One Question - One Answer].
MESSAGE.Translation: I saw a site titled [Kyousuke's One Question - One Answer].

MESSAGE.JP: 面を下にスライドさせていくと、わんさと問答が並んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: I scrolled down on it and found a lot of questions and their answers.
MESSAGE.Translation: I scrolled down on it and found a lot of questions and their answers.

MESSAGE.JP: 生徒から疑問を集めて、それに対し恭介がひとりで答えてるのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Looks like the concept of this site is that Kyousuke is answering questions from the entire school by himself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looks like the concept of this site is that Kyousuke is answering questions from the entire school by himself.

MESSAGE.JP: 体何が彼を突き動かしてるのだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder what on earth has motivated him...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder what on earth has motivated him...

MESSAGE.JP: になに…。
MESSAGE.EN: Let's see...
MESSAGE.Translation: Let's see...

MESSAGE.JP: れ？　さっきのが最後みたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Huh? Is this the last one?
MESSAGE.Translation: Huh? Is this the last one?

MESSAGE.JP: て、しまったーーー！　ものすごい時間をかけて読みふけってしまった!!
MESSAGE.EN: Oh my god! I was completely absorbed in reading for such a long time!!
MESSAGE.Translation: Oh my god! I was completely absorbed in reading for such a long time!!

MESSAGE.JP: ながら情けない…。
MESSAGE.EN: Man, what the heck am I doing...
MESSAGE.Translation: Man, what the heck am I doing...

MESSAGE.JP: ぇ…そうなのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Wow, I didn't know this.
MESSAGE.Translation: Wow, I didn't know this.

MESSAGE.JP: かなか興味深い…。
MESSAGE.EN: This is so interesting...
MESSAGE.Translation: This is so interesting...

MESSAGE.JP: ーむ、考えさせられるなあ。
MESSAGE.EN: Hmm, what a thought-provoking answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hmm, what a thought-provoking answer.

MESSAGE.JP: すが説得力があるなあ。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm impressed by his persuasiveness.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm impressed by his persuasiveness.

MESSAGE.JP: れ本当にありそうだな。
MESSAGE.EN: That might indeed happen.
MESSAGE.Translation: That might indeed happen.

MESSAGE.JP: っと読みふけるところだった…。
MESSAGE.EN: Oops, I almost got too excited about this...
MESSAGE.Translation: Oops, I almost got too excited about this...

MESSAGE.JP: 強しなくちゃね。
MESSAGE.EN: I've got to study.
MESSAGE.Translation: I've got to study.

MESSAGE.JP: 帯を閉じて、代わりにノートを開いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I closed the cellphone and opened a notebook.
MESSAGE.Translation: I closed the cellphone and opened a notebook.

MESSAGE.JP: は真面目に勉強しよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to study seriously.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to study seriously.

MESSAGE.JP: み時間になる。
MESSAGE.EN: It's recess again.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's recess again.

MESSAGE.EN: I saw Rin stand up and walk out of the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I saw Rin stand up and walk out of the room.

MESSAGE.JP: れで思い出す。

MESSAGE.EN: The cat might possibly deliver another task to her.

MESSAGE.JP: いで後を追った。

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Lennon hasn't arrived yet.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Well, I think he's coming soon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Well, I think he's coming soon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゃ？

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Okay...❞

MESSAGE.EN: uwa!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Wait a sec! Why are you getting onto me!?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Is that your new game? Or are you saying I'll be fine even if I take on a hundred of you!?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No, Dorj, you mustn't do that! You're too heavy!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's with that look on your face! Are you laughing at me! Now's not the time for that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: し。

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Phgya!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Phgya!❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You guys... heavy! Too heavy!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You guys... heavy! Too heavy!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Don't look at me with those eyes.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I can't drive you off...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I can't drive you off...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Okay, have it your way...

MESSAGE.JP: てなんで降り始めるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: Hey, how come you guys are getting off already?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Hey, how come you guys are getting off already?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゃー。ごろごろごろ。

MESSAGE.Translation: Meow. *Rolly*rolly*roll*.

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Got bored with that already...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Got bored with that already...?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You really can't be helped...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝At least stay motivated a bit longer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝At least stay motivated a bit longer.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Rome was not built in a day, okay?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Fuka――!❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hey! You...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hey! You...❞

MESSAGE.JP: の尻尾に鈴は手を伸ばした。
MESSAGE.EN: She reached for the cat's tail.
MESSAGE.Translation: She reached for the cat's tail.

MESSAGE.JP: 紙を手に入れたようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She seemed to have gotten another letter.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seemed to have gotten another letter.

MESSAGE.JP: ろそろ話しかけよう。
MESSAGE.EN: Okay, I think I've waited long enough.
MESSAGE.Translation: Okay, I think I've waited long enough.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あ！　おまえ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hey! You...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hey! You...❞

MESSAGE.JP: の尻尾に鈴は手を伸ばした。
MESSAGE.EN: She reached for the cat's tail.
MESSAGE.Translation: She reached for the cat's tail.

MESSAGE.JP: 紙を手に入れたようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She seemed to have gotten another letter.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「次の課題はなんだって？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What is our next task?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What is our next task?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うわ、理樹だっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Uwaah! Riki!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Uwaah! Riki!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、そんな急に取り繕わなくてもいつも気づいているから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No need to try to act cool. I know what you've been doing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No need to try to act cool. I know what you've been doing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: たちを払ってから、一呼吸置き、僕を真剣な目で見つめ言った（猫たちと戯れてるのはなかったことにしたいらしい）。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin waved away her cats, took a breath and faced me. (I guess she's trying to pretend she wasn't playing with them, after all.)
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin waved away her cats, took a breath and faced me. (I guess she's trying to pretend she wasn't playing with them, after all.)

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「次の課題は…」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝The next task is...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...to save the cafeteria.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...to save the cafeteria.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「学食を…救う…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Save the cafeteria?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Save the cafeteria?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何か問題でも抱えてたっけ」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Didn't know they had any problems.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そういえば…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Come to think of it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Come to think of it...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝The $K15croquette soba$K0 is yucky.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So what?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I think if they cut it out from the menu, the cafeteria would be saved.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I agree that the croquette soba is yucky, but I think it has to be something else.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Do you have any other ideas, then?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Anyway, let's go to the cafeteria and talk with the staff.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: The small bell on her head jingled, and she took the lead.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hello.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: I addressed a female staff member who was looking bored.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Staff Lady@❝Hello. May I help you?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝The croquette soba is very yucky.❞

MESSAGE.JP: おばさん@「あー、あれは一部の生徒からリクエストがあったから入れてみたのよ。立ち食いのそば屋さんにはよくあるメニューなのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Staff Lady@❝We added it since some students requested it. It's a pretty popular food.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Staff Lady@❝We added it since some students requested it. It's a pretty popular food.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But that soup makes a croquette mushy-mushy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But that soup makes a croquette mushy-mushy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: おばさん@「通にはそれがいいらしいのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Staff Lady@❝I've heard soba lovers like it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Staff Lady@❝I've heard soba lovers like it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「いますぐやめたほうがいい、通じゃない人はコロッケのぐずぐずのは食べたくないからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You'd better take it off the menu since ordinary people don't like mushy-mushy croquettes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You'd better take it off the menu since ordinary people don't like mushy-mushy croquettes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: おばさん@「でも、あれでしょ？　$K106天ぷら$K0とかはいいわけでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Staff Lady@❝But you wouldn't care if it's $K106tempura$K0, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Staff Lady@❝But you wouldn't care if it's $K106tempura$K0, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なにがだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What do you mean?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What do you mean?❞

MESSAGE.JP: おばさん@「コロッケも天ぷらと同じ揚げ物。食べてる途中でつゆが染みて柔らかくなって崩れちゃうでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Staff Lady@❝Croquette and tempura are deep-fried foods, so both of them would become mushy if you eat them with soup, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Staff Lady@❝Croquette and tempura are deep-fried foods, so both of them would become mushy if you eat them with soup, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うん、天ぷらもすぐぐずぐずになるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yeah, tempura also becomes mushy-mushy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yeah, tempura also becomes mushy-mushy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 、ぐずぐずって言いたいだけじゃないのかな…。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin, you just like saying mushy-mushy, don't you?
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin, you just like saying mushy-mushy, don't you?

MESSAGE.JP: おばさん@「でしょ？　だから慣れよ。食べてたらおいしくなるわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Staff Lady@❝See? So once you've gotten used to it, it'll be nice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Staff Lady@❝See? So once you've gotten used to it, it'll be nice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: おばさん@「ありもので済む手間のかからないメニューだしね、とりあえずもうしばらく様子見といったところね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Staff Lady@❝Anyway, we're going to be serving the food for a while because it's easy to make.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Staff Lady@❝Anyway, we're going to be serving the food for a while because it's easy to make.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「じゃあコロッケそばが問題じゃないということか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Croquette soba isn't related to anything...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Croquette soba isn't related to anything...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうだね。僕は最初からそう思ってたけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes. I told you all along, didn't I.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes. I told you all along, didn't I.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「じゃあなんなんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What is the problem, then?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What is the problem, then?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「訊いてみようよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's ask her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's ask her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そうだな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「最近、この学食で問題は起きてないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Do you have any problem with this cafeteria?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Do you have any problem with this cafeteria?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あ、いや、それではこの食堂は救われない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Ah, no, but in that case this cafeteria won't be saved.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Ah, no, but in that case this cafeteria won't be saved.❞

MESSAGE.JP: おばさん@「え？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Staff Lady@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Staff Lady@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: の突拍子な発言にあっけにとられるおばさん。
MESSAGE.EN: The staff member was startled by Rin's wild statement.
MESSAGE.Translation: The staff member was startled by Rin's wild statement.

MESSAGE.JP: ろそろ割って入らないと話が混乱する。
MESSAGE.EN: Seems like I need to help her out.
MESSAGE.Translation: Seems like I need to help her out.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやいや、鈴、ちょっと待って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no, wait a second, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no, wait a second, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そもそも、コロッケそばが問題じゃないと思うから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think the croquette soba would be the problem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think the croquette soba would be the problem.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そうなのか？　じゃあなんなんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Is that so? What is it, then?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Is that so? What is it, then?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「訊いてみようよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's ask her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's ask her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あの、おばさん。最近、この学食で問題起きてませんか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We were wondering if you have any problem with this cafeteria.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We were wondering if you have any problem with this cafeteria.❞

MESSAGE.JP: おばさん@「問題？　問題ねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Staff Lady@❝Problem? Let's see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Staff Lady@❝Problem? Let's see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: おばさん@「あなたたちのお友達の喧嘩ぐらいなもんねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Staff Lady@❝Maybe it'd be that those friends of yours are always fighting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Staff Lady@❝Maybe it'd be that those friends of yours are always fighting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そうか、あいつらかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Now I've got it! It's those guys!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Now I've got it! It's those guys!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「いくぞ、理樹っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Let's go, Riki!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Let's go, Riki!❞

MESSAGE.JP: おばさん@「あ、でも、おばさんたちは、元気なぐらいが嬉しいからっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Staff Lady@❝Ah, but I don't care about that, I like lively boys!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Staff Lady@❝Ah, but I don't care about that, I like lively boys!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばさんの最後の言葉を聞き届けないまま、鈴は駆けていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Without listening to the rest of her answer, Rin rushed out of the cafeteria.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without listening to the rest of her answer, Rin rushed out of the cafeteria.

MESSAGE.JP: ばさんと目を見合わせる。
MESSAGE.EN: The staff lady and I looked at each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: The staff lady and I looked at each other.

MESSAGE.JP: おばさん@「何かまずいこと言っちゃったかしら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Staff Lady@❝Did I say something wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Staff Lady@❝Did I say something wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、ふたりとも体は丈夫なんで大丈夫かと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No. Kengo and Masato are quite tough, so there shouldn't be any problem, I think...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No. Kengo and Masato are quite tough, so there shouldn't be any problem, I think...❞

MESSAGE.JP: しぃん！　かしぃん！
MESSAGE.EN: When I reached the classroom, it had already begun.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I reached the classroom, it had already begun.

MESSAGE.JP: の足と謙吾の竹刀が宙で交錯していた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin's leg and Kengo's shinai were crossing in the air.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin's leg and Kengo's shinai were crossing in the air.

MESSAGE.JP: 人は不意打ちを食らったのか、壁に顔面を擦りつけるようにしてのびていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Presumably victim to Rin's surprise attack, Masato had fallen down unconscious with his face pressed against the wall.
MESSAGE.Translation: Presumably victim to Rin's surprise attack, Masato had fallen down unconscious with his face pressed against the wall.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「何事だっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What's this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What's this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「問答無用！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No discussion!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No discussion!❞

MESSAGE.JP: しぃん！　かしぃん！
MESSAGE.EN: *Ka-ching*! *Ka-ching*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Ka-ching*! *Ka-ching*!

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「すとーーーっぷ！　タイムタイム！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Stooop! Calm down, you guys!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Stooop! Calm down, you guys!❞

MESSAGE.JP: しぃん！　かしぃん！
MESSAGE.EN: *Ka-ching*! *Ka-ching*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Ka-ching*! *Ka-ching*!

MESSAGE.JP: の声はまったく届かない。
MESSAGE.EN: They weren't listening to me at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: They weren't listening to me at all.

MESSAGE.JP: 、窓から差す光が一瞬閉ざされた直後…
MESSAGE.EN: Just seconds after, the sunlight from the window was blocked off for a moment...
MESSAGE.Translation: Just seconds after, the sunlight from the window was blocked off for a moment...

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ちょい待った。ルールに則ってもらおうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Wait a sec. You two have to follow the rules.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Wait a sec. You two have to follow the rules.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介がふたりの間に跪き、竹刀と蹴りを片手ずつで受け止めてみせていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke got down on his knees and caught Rin's kick and Kengo's shinai with his hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke got down on his knees and caught Rin's kick and Kengo's shinai with his hands.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「このカード、前回と同じだから、成立しない。今すぐやめてもらおうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝This pairing is the same as the previous one, so it's not allowed. Stop it right now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝This pairing is the same as the previous one, so it's not allowed. Stop it right now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介がそう言うと、すっとざわめきが引く。
MESSAGE.EN: His words silenced the audience.
MESSAGE.Translation: His words silenced the audience.

MESSAGE.JP: 次馬たちは三々五々に散っていき、いつもの教室風景に戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: They started scattering, and in no time the atmosphere of the room was back to normal.
MESSAGE.Translation: They started scattering, and in no time the atmosphere of the room was back to normal.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ん…なんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hm... What happened...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hm... What happened...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人が起きあがっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato came to and stood up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato came to and stood up.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あ、もしかして、オレが昼寝ぶっこいてる間にてめぇら戦ってたのかっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, you guys were fighting while I was napping?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, you guys were fighting while I was napping?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「壁に顔面擦りつけて、エビぞりになってたのにも関わらず昼寝と言い張るところがすごいよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sure no one would think someone who is curled up with his face pressed into the wall is taking a nap...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sure no one would think someone who is curled up with his face pressed into the wall is taking a nap...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「へ、まぁな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Heh, kinda.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Heh, kinda.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おまえばかだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You're stupid, aren't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You're stupid, aren't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「で、結果は!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝So, what are the results?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝So, what are the results?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「無効試合、ノーゲームだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No contest.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No contest.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そっか…まあなんでもいいや。オレが戦えるんだったらな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Okay... Well, I don't care about that so long as I can get another chance to fight.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Okay... Well, I don't care about that so long as I can get another chance to fight.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「よし、謙吾、この場で試合を申し込むぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Kengo, I challenge you to a match right now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Kengo, I challenge you to a match right now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「いや、おまえ一位だろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝But you're the current number 1 of the battle ranking, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝But you're the current number 1 of the battle ranking, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「へ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだ…オレは勝っちまったのか…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You mean I'm the winner...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You mean I'm the winner...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「気づかなかったぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I didn't even realize...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I didn't even realize...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「いつの間にか、最強男児と謳われたあの謙吾も倒し…オレが一番に…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Before I knew it, I've already beaten Kengo, the strongest boy, and now I'm number one...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Before I knew it, I've already beaten Kengo, the strongest boy, and now I'm number one...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「嬉しいはずなんだが…この気持ちはなんだろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I should be glad about that... But what is this feeling...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I should be glad about that... But what is this feeling...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「まるで胸にぽっかり穴が空いたみてぇだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's like I've got a big empty hole inside of me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's like I've got a big empty hole inside of me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「な、理樹…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Say, Riki...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Say, Riki...❞

MESSAGE.JP: んだ魚のような目を僕に向ける。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato's eyes, like those of a dead fish, caught me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato's eyes, like those of a dead fish, caught me.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「オレはこれから…何を目標に生きればいい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Can you tell me... what kind of goal I should have now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Can you tell me... what kind of goal I should have now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「一位をキープしていけば？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why not defend your current rank?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why not defend your current rank?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そうだよな、防衛し続けることが大事だよなっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You're right... Defending something is important.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You're right... Defending something is important.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぅ！とその目に炎が宿る。
MESSAGE.EN: *Whoosh*! His eyes blazed up again.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Whoosh*! His eyes blazed up again.

MESSAGE.JP: れでまた元気に生きていけるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked like he bucked up.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked like he bucked up.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「鈴、この場で試合を申し込むぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Rin, I challenge you to a match right now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Rin, I challenge you to a match right now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「残念だが、そのカード、前回と同じだから成立しない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That pairing is the same one as before, so it's not allowed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That pairing is the same one as before, so it's not allowed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ちっ、命拾いしやがって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Tch, you had a narrow escape...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Tch, you had a narrow escape...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: *DING*DONG*...

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Behave like a girl.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝From now on your title will be... ❛Maiden Full Speed!❜❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Naaahhh!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sort of. Sometimes we have to take a break.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 然見つかれば戦いを挑まれるので、逃げ続けている。
MESSAGE.EN: Without a doubt, he'll challenge me if he finds me, so I'm going to avoid him.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without a doubt, he'll challenge me if he finds me, so I'm going to avoid him.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Follow me.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Here.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I've come up with a strategy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I've come up with a strategy.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝If we go down there and both attack at the same time, we can wipe them out in an instant.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうやって？　僕に正確な射撃を求められても困るんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How? I don't know how things will turn out if you are counting on my shooting to be accurate...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How? I don't know how things will turn out if you are counting on my shooting to be accurate...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「まあ、そうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Yeah, that's true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Yeah, that's true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「あたしが瞬時に相手の位置を見抜くから、理樹くんはあたしの指示する方向に撃つだけでいいの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I can assess where they are very quickly, so it should be enough if you just fire the direction I tell you to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I can assess where they are very quickly, so it should be enough if you just fire the direction I tell you to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「相手に向けてじゃなくて？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just toward them?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just toward them?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「だって、あなた見えないでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Well, you can't see them right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Well, you can't see them right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「見えるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「真っ暗闇でも？　昨日潜った穴の中でも？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Even in pitch darkness? Even in the hole we were in yesterday?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Even in pitch darkness? Even in the hole we were in yesterday?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それは無理だよ、きみだって同じでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's impossible. Even for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's impossible. Even for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「言ってなかったっけ？　あたしは暗闇でも奴らが見える。だから出し抜けるって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Didn't I just tell you? I can see them even in the dark. That means we can get the jump on them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Didn't I just tell you? I can see them even in the dark. That means we can get the jump on them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 確かに、出し抜けるという言葉には聞き覚えがある。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I definitely remember hearing ❛get the jump on❜ before.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I definitely remember hearing ❛get the jump on❜ before.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「って…あんな完全な闇でもきみには見えるの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait... you can see them even in complete darkness!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait... you can see them even in complete darkness!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「見えるっていうか、感じるのよ。なんていうか…コウモリやイルカみたいに超音波？　そういう器官があたしには植え付けられてるみたいなの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Not so much see as feel. How to put it... You know how bats and dolphins use ultrasonic waves? It's like I have that kind of sensory organ implanted in me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Not so much see as feel. How to put it... You know how bats and dolphins use ultrasonic waves? It's like I have that kind of sensory organ implanted in me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: え付けられた、というところに引っかかりを覚えたが、詳しくは訊かないことにする（訊きたいことを逐一訊いていたらいくら時間があっても足りないだろう）。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt like there was something more to that ❛implanted❜ part, but I decided not ask about it. (If I asked about every little thing, all the time in the world wouldn't be enough.)
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt like there was something more to that ❛implanted❜ part, but I decided not ask about it. (If I asked about every little thing, all the time in the world wouldn't be enough.)

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だから、奴らを出し抜けるってことか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's why you can get the jump on them...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's why you can get the jump on them...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「平凡な女の子だったら、こんな目には遭ってはいないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝If I were a normal girl, I wouldn't have to do this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝If I were a normal girl, I wouldn't have to do this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 分の境遇を哀れむように言った。
MESSAGE.EN: It sounded like she was lamenting her lot in life.
MESSAGE.Translation: It sounded like she was lamenting her lot in life.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「話を戻すわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Let's get back on topic.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Let's get back on topic.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「あなたには見えない。だから、あたしが方向の指示だけ出すから、そこへ向けてあなたは撃つ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝You can't see them. And all I can do is point out where they are, so you fire in that direction.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝You can't see them. And all I can do is point out where they are, so you fire in that direction.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんな曖昧な…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's so vague...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's so vague...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女は自分の銃を取り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: She took out her gun.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took out her gun.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「まあ、抜きなさいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Well, take out your gun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Well, take out your gun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: う促す。
MESSAGE.EN: I did as told.
MESSAGE.Translation: I did as told.

MESSAGE.JP: んなところ誰かに見られたら大変だ…そう思いながら、僕も抜く。
MESSAGE.EN: It'd be bad if someone saw this... but I took it out anyway.
MESSAGE.Translation: It'd be bad if someone saw this... but I took it out anyway.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「入り口には、階下へ降りる梯子がかかってるの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝There's a ladder down at the entrance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝There's a ladder down at the entrance.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「梯子を背にあなたは階下へ降り立つ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝You're going to go down and stand with the ladder at your back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝You're going to go down and stand with the ladder at your back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「両手でグリップを持って梯子と垂直に銃を突き出す」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Hold the gun with both hands and point it away from the ladder.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Hold the gun with both hands and point it away from the ladder.❞

MESSAGE.JP: われた通りに、構えてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried doing as I was told.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried doing as I was told.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「梯子と垂直であれば片足を前に出してもいいわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝If you shoot perpendicular to the ladder, you can put one foot forward.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝If you shoot perpendicular to the ladder, you can put one foot forward.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「それがあなたの基本フォーム。いいわね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝That'll be your basic stance. Okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝That'll be your basic stance. Okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ん、と頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: I nodded in agreement.
MESSAGE.Translation: I nodded in agreement.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「で、ようやくこれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝And finally, we have this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝And finally, we have this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: に抱えていた壁掛け時計を正面に構えて、僕のすぐ前に立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: She took the wall clock she was carrying and stood in front of me with the clock facing me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She took the wall clock she was carrying and stood in front of me with the clock facing me.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「基本フォームでは時計の中心」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Your basic form will be the center of the clock.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Your basic form will be the center of the clock.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「そこからあたしが言った時間の数字に照準を合わせる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I want you to aim at the numbers as I call them out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I want you to aim at the numbers as I call them out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「いい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Ready?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Ready?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「じゃ、いくわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Okay, let's start.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Okay, let's start.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「１時」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝1 o'clock.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝1 o'clock.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「７時」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝7 o'clock.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝7 o'clock.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「３時」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝3 o'clock.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝3 o'clock.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「１１時」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝11 o'clock.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝11 o'clock.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「理解できた？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Understand?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Understand?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「本番ではこの時計なしに、僕が暗闇の中できみのいう指示通りに照準を合わせる、ということだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We won't have a clock during the real thing, and I'll have to aim as you call out the directions in the darkness. Is that right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We won't have a clock during the real thing, and I'll have to aim as you call out the directions in the darkness. Is that right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「合わせるだけじゃないわ。合わせて、撃つ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Not just aim. Aim and fire.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Not just aim. Aim and fire.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「撃てば、反動が返ってくるから、再び時計の中心に合わせるのは相当集中力がいる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝When you fire there will be recoil, so it'll take concentration to bring your aim back to the center.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝When you fire there will be recoil, so it'll take concentration to bring your aim back to the center.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「精神面の勝負。あなたには向いてる作戦だと思わない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝It's a mental battle. Don't you think it's the perfect plan for you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝It's a mental battle. Don't you think it's the perfect plan for you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: わないけど、口には出さない。その代わり、質問をぶつける。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't think so, but decided to let it go. Instead I asked about something else.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't think so, but decided to let it go. Instead I asked about something else.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも、この時計の角度だけで敵全員をカバーできるわけじゃないよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But it's not possible to cover every angle with just that, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But it's not possible to cover every angle with just that, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「それはあたしがやるわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I'll handle everyone else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I'll handle everyone else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: るほど。指示を出しつつ、僕ひとりでカバーしきれない敵は彼女が撃つ。
MESSAGE.EN: I get it. While calling out directions, she'll shoot the enemies that I can't get to.
MESSAGE.Translation: I get it. While calling out directions, she'll shoot the enemies that I can't get to.

MESSAGE.JP: うして暗闇の中で奴らを出し抜き、一瞬にして殲滅する。
MESSAGE.EN: By doing that we can wipe out all the enemies in the darkness in an instant.
MESSAGE.Translation: By doing that we can wipe out all the enemies in the darkness in an instant.

MESSAGE.JP: 画とかだったら、痛快そうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: If this were a manga, it'd be really exciting.
MESSAGE.Translation: If this were a manga, it'd be really exciting.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「指示をだしたら、ふたりで同時に射撃」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝As I call out, we'll fire at the same time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝As I call out, we'll fire at the same time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「結果が知りたいなら、このライトを点けなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝If you want to know the result, use this light.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝If you want to know the result, use this light.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 型の筒状のライトを渡された。
MESSAGE.EN: She handed me a small flashlight.
MESSAGE.Translation: She handed me a small flashlight.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あの、もし、相手をライトで照らしたらどうなるの？　影だから消えていなくなるんじゃない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, what would happen if we hit them with the light? They're shadows, so wouldn't they disappear?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, what would happen if we hit them with the light? They're shadows, so wouldn't they disappear?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 案とばかりに訊いてみた。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought it was a good idea, so I asked.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought it was a good idea, so I asked.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「実体化した後なら、そのぐらいのライトじゃ効かないわ。お日様ぐらいの強さがあればいいんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝They've already taken shape at that point, so a flashlight wouldn't work. It'd take light as strong as the sun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝They've already taken shape at that point, so a flashlight wouldn't work. It'd take light as strong as the sun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んな簡単にはいかないか…。
MESSAGE.EN: So it won't be that easy...
MESSAGE.Translation: So it won't be that easy...

MESSAGE.JP: はライトをポケットに仕舞う。
MESSAGE.EN: I put the light in my pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: I put the light in my pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それで、敵が残っていた時は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And what if there are enemies left over?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And what if there are enemies left over?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「あなたが逃した敵は、あなたを攻撃してくるわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Any enemies you let get away will attack you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Any enemies you let get away will attack you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「助けてくれないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You won't help me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You won't help me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「助けてあげるわよ。でも一瞬では無理だから、ある程度あなたも攻撃を喰らうことは覚悟して」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I will. But I can't do it that quickly, so brace yourself for their attacks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I will. But I can't do it that quickly, so brace yourself for their attacks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それでもし僕が力尽きちゃったら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And if I run out of energy?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And if I run out of energy?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「撤退。その階のスタート地点に戻って回復するのを待ってから再度攻略にチャレンジ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Retreat. Go back to the floor's entrance and recover your strength, then we'll try and clear it again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Retreat. Go back to the floor's entrance and recover your strength, then we'll try and clear it again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「オーケー？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まあ…恐いけど…オーケー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I'm scared... but okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I'm scared... but okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「あなたが戦いに慣れさえすればいいのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝You just need to get more accustomed to fighting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝You just need to get more accustomed to fighting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「じゃあ、放課後までここで特訓ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Okay, we'll train here until school ends.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Okay, we'll train here until school ends.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「教室に戻らないで？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We're not going back to class?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We're not going back to class?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「今の自分の命より大切なものがあるっていうんなら、どうぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝If there's something more important to you than your life, by all means.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝If there's something more important to you than your life, by all means.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Never mind...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Never mind...❞

MESSAGE.JP: がけなんだから、こんなことで不平は漏らしてなんかいられないのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: My life's on the line, so I can't help feeling uneasy about this kind of thing.
MESSAGE.Translation: My life's on the line, so I can't help feeling uneasy about this kind of thing.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「せめて、放課後は解放してあげるから頑張りなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I'll let you go when classes end, so give it your best.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I'll let you go when classes end, so give it your best.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「行くわよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Let's start.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Let's start.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 練は開始された。
MESSAGE.EN: We commenced with my training.
MESSAGE.Translation: We commenced with my training.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「休憩しましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Let's take a break.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Let's take a break.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鷺戸さんの一声で、僕はグリップを構えていた手を下ろした。
MESSAGE.EN: On her suggestion, I lowered the gun in my hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: On her suggestion, I lowered the gun in my hands.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ふぅ……」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: が痛い。
MESSAGE.EN: My arms hurt.
MESSAGE.Translation: My arms hurt.

MESSAGE.JP: 場の隅へ朱鷺戸さんは移動した。
MESSAGE.EN: She was headed for the corner of the field.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was headed for the corner of the field.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「理樹くん、小枝拾って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Riki-kun, pick up some twigs.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Riki-kun, pick up some twigs.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、どうして？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「いいから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Just do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Just do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, I will.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, I will.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 手で握ることができるぐらい小枝を拾ってくると、朱鷺戸さんに渡した。
MESSAGE.EN: I picked up as many twigs as I could hold in one hand and gave them to Tokido-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I picked up as many twigs as I could hold in one hand and gave them to Tokido-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「これぐらいでいいかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is this enough?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is this enough?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「ええ。いいわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Yeah. It'll do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Yeah. It'll do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 後を木陰に預けながら、朱鷺戸さんは小枝を折っている。
MESSAGE.EN: She leaned against a shady tree and started snapping the twigs.
MESSAGE.Translation: She leaned against a shady tree and started snapping the twigs.

MESSAGE.JP: き、ぺき。
MESSAGE.EN: *Snap* *snap*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Snap* *snap*.

MESSAGE.JP: った小枝を背後に放っている。
MESSAGE.EN: She threw them behind her as she snapped them.
MESSAGE.Translation: She threw them behind her as she snapped them.

MESSAGE.JP: の作業をやってしまうと、彼女は黙って足を抱え込んで座り込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: When she was done, she quietly sat down and hugged her legs.
MESSAGE.Translation: When she was done, she quietly sat down and hugged her legs.

MESSAGE.JP: に顔をうずめて目を閉じた。
MESSAGE.EN: She put her face in her lap and closed her eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: She put her face in her lap and closed her eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「…どうしたの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝...What's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝...What's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、どうしたらいいのか、と思って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nothing, I was just wondering what I should do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nothing, I was just wondering what I should do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「座ればいいじゃない。休憩なんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Why don't you sit? We're on a break.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Why don't you sit? We're on a break.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ったけれど、隣に座った。
MESSAGE.EN: I hesitated, then sat next to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hesitated, then sat next to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「小枝は何で撒いたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why did you scatter twigs?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why did you scatter twigs?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「敵がきて、小枝を踏めばわかるでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝If an enemy comes, we'll hear them step on them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝If an enemy comes, we'll hear them step on them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あぁ、なるほど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, I get it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, I get it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「気休めだけどね。影に効果は多分ない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝It's just for peace of mind. It probably won't work on shadows.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝It's just for peace of mind. It probably won't work on shadows.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「習慣みたいなものよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝It's kind of a habit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝It's kind of a habit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「何よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: が黙っているのが気になったのか、片眼だけ開けて訊いてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: She opened one eye and asked me like maybe she was worried about my silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: She opened one eye and asked me like maybe she was worried about my silence.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「言いたいことがあったら言うといいわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝If there's something you want to say, just say it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝If there's something you want to say, just say it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「すごいな、と思って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I was thinking how incredible you are.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I was thinking how incredible you are.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れは陳腐な台詞だっただろう。
MESSAGE.EN: That was probably kinda cliche.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was probably kinda cliche.

MESSAGE.JP: 実離れしたこんな出来事に、僕が言えるのはそんな台詞だった。
MESSAGE.EN: That was all I could say in this unreal situation.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was all I could say in this unreal situation.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「…すごい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝...Incredible?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝...Incredible?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「理樹くん、あなたは期末試験のとき、シャープペンの芯や消しゴムがあるかどうか、確認するでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Riki-kun, you're probably the type that makes sure he has plenty of sharp pencils and an eraser when taking finals.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Riki-kun, you're probably the type that makes sure he has plenty of sharp pencils and an eraser when taking finals.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…？　するけど、それがどうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...? I do, but why do you bring it up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...? I do, but why do you bring it up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「それと同じことよ。準備をする、という意味では同じこと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝It's the same. They're both ways of being prepared.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝It's the same. They're both ways of being prepared.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「当たり前のこと、か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So it's natural for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So it's natural for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「そうよ。だから、すごいなんて言わないで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Right. So you don't need to say I'm incredible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Right. So you don't need to say I'm incredible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「あたりまえのことなんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Because it's natural.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Because it's natural.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…ごめんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「なんで謝るの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Why are you apologizing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Why are you apologizing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「わかんないよ。なんでか、わかんない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't know. I'm not sure why.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't know. I'm not sure why.❞

MESSAGE.JP: も謝りたくなったんだ。わからないけれど。
MESSAGE.EN: But I wanted to apologize. I didn't know why.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I wanted to apologize. I didn't know why.

MESSAGE.JP: 鷺戸さんの言い方が、ちょっとぶっきらぼうだったから。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe because she was kinda blunt.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe because she was kinda blunt.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「…バカね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝...Idiot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝...Idiot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: う言ったきり、彼女は再び目を閉じた。
MESSAGE.EN: She closed her eyes again.
MESSAGE.Translation: She closed her eyes again.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「…短い休憩でも、疲労を取れるようにしておきなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝...It's only a small break, but make sure you rest.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝...It's only a small break, but make sure you rest.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸@「迷宮探索の中では、立ったまま眠ることだってあるんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝While we're exploring the labyrinth, you might have to sleep standing up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝While we're exploring the labyrinth, you might have to sleep standing up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, I understand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, I understand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は素直に彼女の忠告に従い、同じように目を閉じたのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I obediently followed her advice and closed my eyes too.
MESSAGE.Translation: I obediently followed her advice and closed my eyes too.

MESSAGE.JP: 休み。
MESSAGE.EN: It's lunch time.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's lunch time.

MESSAGE.JP: 買で買ったビニール袋を手に、廊下を歩く。
MESSAGE.EN: I bought my lunch at the school store.
MESSAGE.Translation: I bought my lunch at the school store.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（…そういえば）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Come to think of it...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Come to think of it...)

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんはまた屋上で食べてるんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I wondered if I could find Komari-san at the rooftop again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wondered if I could find Komari-san at the rooftop again.

MESSAGE.JP: ライバーまでもらっちゃったし、行ってみるのもいいかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: It might be nice to have lunch with her.
MESSAGE.Translation: It might be nice to have lunch with her.

MESSAGE.JP: し、じゃあ屋上に行こうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to go to the rooftop.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to go to the rooftop.

MESSAGE.JP: は胸ポケットのドライバーを確認すると、階段を目指して歩き始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt my breast pocket for the screwdriver, and headed to the stairs leading to the rooftop.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt my breast pocket for the screwdriver, and headed to the stairs leading to the rooftop.

MESSAGE.JP: ここを通るたびに覚える違和感。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Every time I passed by here, I felt an odd sense of incompatibility.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Every time I passed by here, I felt an odd sense of incompatibility.

MESSAGE.JP: 弾きにされている机と椅子たち。
MESSAGE.EN: There were so many unused desks and chairs.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were so many unused desks and chairs.

MESSAGE.JP: して、ある種それに封印されている、風の気持ちいい場所。
MESSAGE.EN: They seemed to be sealing off entry to the rooftop, where a comfortable breeze could be felt.
MESSAGE.Translation: They seemed to be sealing off entry to the rooftop, where a comfortable breeze could be felt.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（…なんで出入り禁止になんてするんだろうなぁ）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...Why would they forbid us from entering this place?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...Why would they forbid us from entering this place?)

MESSAGE.JP: んとなく、その事自体に疑問を覚え始める。
MESSAGE.EN: That question came up in my mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: That question came up in my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: 段を上りきると。
MESSAGE.EN: Once I finished climbing...
MESSAGE.Translation: Once I finished climbing...

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「あーん、理樹君、待ってたよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Uwaah, Riki-kun, I've been waiting for you～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Uwaah, Riki-kun, I've been waiting for you～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 情けない声で小毬さんが小走りで寄ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I found Komari-san trotting toward me.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I found Komari-san trotting toward me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうしたのさ、外に出ないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's wrong? Why aren't you going outside?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's wrong? Why aren't you going outside?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「あ、えーとね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ahh, well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ahh, well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「…それ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It's that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It's that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: が手にしたドライバーを指差す。
MESSAGE.EN: She pointed at the screwdriver I was holding.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pointed at the screwdriver I was holding.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まさかと思うけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, let me guess...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, let me guess...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「これを僕に渡しちゃったから窓開けられないとか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You couldn't open the window because you'd given this to me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You couldn't open the window because you'd given this to me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うえーん、まあそうなんだけど～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ueeeh, that's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ueeeh, that's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「困ったよ…もう一本あったからそれを持ってくるだけだったのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I was in a pinch... I was supposed to bring another one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I was in a pinch... I was supposed to bring another one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「…寮の机の上においてきちゃった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝But I left it on the desk in my room...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝But I left it on the desk in my room...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「割とそそっかしいよね、小毬さんって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're so absent-minded, Komari-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're so absent-minded, Komari-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「が、がーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ga, gahhhn...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ga, gahhhn...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「そうじゃないかと前から思ってたんだけど…やっぱりそそっかしいのか～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I've been wondering about it for a while, but... just as I thought, I really am absent-minded～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I've been wondering about it for a while, but... just as I thought, I really am absent-minded～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: や、今まで気づいてなかったという事実のほうがすごい。
MESSAGE.EN: She never realized it until now? That's surprising.
MESSAGE.Translation: She never realized it until now? That's surprising.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まあ、でもそういうのは心がけで直せるものなんじゃないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I guess you can fix it if you try to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I guess you can fix it if you try to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん…まあ、そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yup... maybe you're right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yup... maybe you're right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「そっか、私はそそっかしいのか…ようしっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I see, so I'm absent-minded... All right!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I see, so I'm absent-minded... All right!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ん、と強く頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded wholeheartedly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded wholeheartedly.

MESSAGE.JP: んか、よくわからない行動。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no idea what that reaction was supposed to mean.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no idea what that reaction was supposed to mean.

MESSAGE.JP: りあえず、持ってきたドライバーで窓のネジをはずし、外に出る。
MESSAGE.EN: I removed the screws, and we went outside.
MESSAGE.Translation: I removed the screws, and we went outside.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…何度来ても、いい風だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What a nice breeze.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What a nice breeze.❞

MESSAGE.JP: をくすぐる風を感じながら、そう思う。
MESSAGE.EN: Feeling the wind brush gently against my cheek, I spoke my thoughts.
MESSAGE.Translation: Feeling the wind brush gently against my cheek, I spoke my thoughts.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「天気予報外れてよかったね～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I'm really glad that the weather forecast was wrong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I'm really glad that the weather forecast was wrong.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「そういえば…さっき、小毬さんって私のこと呼んだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝By the way... you just called me Komari-san, didn't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝By the way... you just called me Komari-san, didn't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？　うん、いや、理樹って名前で呼ばれるようになったから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? Ah, yeah, you did call me by my first name as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? Ah, yeah, you did call me by my first name as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「こっちもそう呼んだ方がいいのかと思って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So I thought I'd address you in the same way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So I thought I'd address you in the same way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん、私は名前で呼ばれるほうが好き」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I like being called by the first name.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I like being called by the first name.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「…名前で呼び合うほうが、なんか温かいよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...Because I think it feels comforting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...Because I think it feels comforting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「温かい、か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Comforting...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Comforting...❞

MESSAGE.JP: んかそういう実感はないけど、確かにそう呼び合うほうが親しげではある気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I was not sure if I could agree with her, but I certainly felt calling each other by the first name was very friendly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was not sure if I could agree with her, but I certainly felt calling each other by the first name was very friendly.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「でも、それならさん付けはちょっとなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝But I don't want you to add ❛san❜...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝But I don't want you to add ❛san❜...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「そうだ、小毬でいいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Okay, just call me Komari.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Okay, just call me Komari.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕にはそっちのほうが抵抗あるんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That wouldn't feel quite right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That wouldn't feel quite right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「そう？　じゃあ、小毬ちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Really? Then, how about Komari-chan?❞
