MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Really? Then, how about Komari-chan?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もっとまずい気がするんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's even harder to swallow...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's even harder to swallow...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「私は気にしないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I'm fine with it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I'm fine with it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: っこりと笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: She grinned.
MESSAGE.Translation: She grinned.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「名前は私だけのもの。名字は家族のものだからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝The first name belongs to me, but the last name is my family's.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝The first name belongs to me, but the last name is my family's.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ふうん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: んか自分にそんなこだわりがないものだから、変に感心してしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Since I'd never look at it like that, I was impressed by her thoughts.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since I'd never look at it like that, I was impressed by her thoughts.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「あっ…それとも、名前で呼ぶのに抵抗があるって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ah... maybe you're hesitating because...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ah... maybe you're hesitating because...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「そういえば、理樹君はりんちゃんのこと、名前で呼び捨てにするね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Come to think of it, you call Rin-chan by the first name without -chan or -san, don't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Come to think of it, you call Rin-chan by the first name without -chan or -san, don't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「が、がーん、そうだったのか～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Gahhhn, now I get it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Gahhhn, now I get it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんかひとりで思考を進めてひとりでショックを受けている。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She reached a shocking conclusion by herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She reached a shocking conclusion by herself.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「よくわかんないんだけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't know what exactly it is you're suggesting...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't know what exactly it is you're suggesting...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんなこと言ったら、真人と謙吾も僕は名前で呼ぶよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I also call Masato and Kengo by the first name, you know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I also call Masato and Kengo by the first name, you know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「はっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Oh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Oh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: く息を飲む。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked surprised.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked surprised.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「今一瞬とてもいけないものを想像しちゃったよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝A really bad thought just went through my mind...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝A really bad thought just went through my mind...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「頼むからやめよう、そういう話は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Please stop with that train of thought.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Please stop with that train of thought.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「別に、友達だったらどういう呼び方でもするでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I just call them in my own way since they're friends of mine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I just call them in my own way since they're friends of mine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…特別とかそういうのじゃ、ないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's no special meaning...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's no special meaning...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん、そっか、そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ok, I see, that's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ok, I see, that's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「じゃ、理樹君と私もお友達」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝We are friends as well, then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝We are friends as well, then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いながら、またにっこりと笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: Saying so, she grinned again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saying so, she grinned again.

MESSAGE.JP: たりで並んで給水タンクの段差に腰掛ける。
MESSAGE.EN: We sat down side by side.
MESSAGE.Translation: We sat down side by side.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「らららーん～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Lalala～n～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Lalala～n～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ンドイッチを頬張る僕の前に、小毬さんは嬉しそうに大量のお菓子を広げていく。
MESSAGE.EN: While I was having my sandwich, Komari-san happily took out a bunch of sweets from her bag.
MESSAGE.Translation: While I was having my sandwich, Komari-san happily took out a bunch of sweets from her bag.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「またいっぱい持ってきたねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You brought a bunch of sweets yet again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You brought a bunch of sweets yet again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん、ふたり分ー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep, for me and you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, for me and you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: どう見ても５、６人分はある。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I think we'll need 3 or 4 more people to finish them.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I think we'll need 3 or 4 more people to finish them.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「好きなだけ食べてねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Eat a lot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Eat a lot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやまあ、とりあえずサンドイッチ食べてからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, yeah, but I'll finish my sandwich before that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, yeah, but I'll finish my sandwich before that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: っと見ても、見事に甘そうなお菓子ばかりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Even at a glance, most of them looked very sweet.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even at a glance, most of them looked very sweet.

MESSAGE.JP: これ全部食べたら、確実に胸焼けするな。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I'm sure I'd get an upset stomach if I ate them all.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I'm sure I'd get an upset stomach if I ate them all.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「今は春だからいいけど、夏はチョコとか大変だよね～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It's spring now, so there's no problem bringing chocolates here. But in summer, it'll be difficult.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It's spring now, so there's no problem bringing chocolates here. But in summer, it'll be difficult.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「前に一口チョコをたくさん持ってきたことがあるんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Last year, I brought plenty of small chocolates here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Last year, I brought plenty of small chocolates here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「暑くて日差しもあたってたから、全部溶けちゃって、カバンの中がチョコまみれになっちゃったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝But that day was so warm they all melted in my bag.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝But that day was so warm they all melted in my bag.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そりゃあ難儀だったね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That was too bad...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That was too bad...❞

MESSAGE.JP: てふためく小毬さんの姿が目に浮かんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The image of a panicked Komari-san passed before my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: The image of a panicked Komari-san passed before my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「…カバンの中身が見えてればね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...If only my bag had been see-through.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...If only my bag had been see-through.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「溶けちゃう前に出しておくことも出来たと思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I would've taken them out before they melted.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I would've taken them out before they melted.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「その時は見えなくても、後で絶対見えちゃうものなんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Even if I don't see it now, I'll definitely find out about it later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Even if I don't see it now, I'll definitely find out about it later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…未来視の目でも有ればいいのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...It'd be good if you had the second sight.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...It'd be good if you had the second sight.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ううん、逆かな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝No, the opposite...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝No, the opposite...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「先のことより前にあったことが全部見えればいいな、って思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Rather than the future, I think I'd like very much to see the past.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Rather than the future, I think I'd like very much to see the past.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「忘れたいことはもちろん忘れたいんだけど、忘れたくないことや、忘れちゃいけないものまで忘れちゃうって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝There are a lot of things I wanna forget about, but I forget even the things I don't want to lose.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝There are a lot of things I wanna forget about, but I forget even the things I don't want to lose.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「きっとそれはすごく悲しいことなんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝That's really sad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝That's really sad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「…それが見えてたら、なくなるよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...I think I wouldn't feel sad if I could see the past.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...I think I wouldn't feel sad if I could see the past.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いながら、いつもとは少し違う、どこか線の細い笑みを浮かべる。
MESSAGE.EN: The smile she made was somehow fainter than usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: The smile she made was somehow fainter than usual.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「好きな絵本があるんだ。昔読んだ本」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝There is a picture book I like. I read it long ago.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝There is a picture book I like. I read it long ago.❞

MESSAGE.JP: た話題が切り替わる。なんだか、聞いていて退屈しない。
MESSAGE.EN: Our conversation moved to another topic again. I've come to enjoy her unpredictability.
MESSAGE.Translation: Our conversation moved to another topic again. I've come to enjoy her unpredictability.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「にわとりさんとひよこさん、それにたまごのお話」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It was a story about hens, chicks and eggs.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It was a story about hens, chicks and eggs.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「たまごからひよこさんが孵って、ひよこはにわとりさんになるの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝A chick hatches from an egg and becomes a hen.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝A chick hatches from an egg and becomes a hen.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「にわとりさんがたまごを産んで、たまごがまたひよこさんになる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝That hen lays an egg, and another chick hatches from that egg.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝That hen lays an egg, and another chick hatches from that egg.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「でも、にわとりさんもひよこさんも三歩歩くと全部忘れちゃう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝But both the hen and the chick forget everything after three steps.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝But both the hen and the chick forget everything after three steps.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「にわとりさんはひよこさんのことを忘れちゃうし、ひよこさんはたまごのことを忘れちゃう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝The hen forgets about the chick, and the chick forgets about the egg.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝The hen forgets about the chick, and the chick forgets about the egg.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「にわとりさんについて歩くひよこの絵がすごいかわいくてね、すごく好きだったんだ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝There was a picture in the book where the chick was following the hen. I loved it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝There was a picture in the book where the chick was following the hen. I loved it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でもなんか、内容はえらく哲学的というか…子供向けの絵本だよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But it somehow feels very philosophical... That book was for children, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But it somehow feels very philosophical... That book was for children, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ずーっと繰り返してくんだ、忘れちゃうこと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝They keep forgetting.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝They keep forgetting.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「それがなんだかすごく悲しかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It made me very sad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It made me very sad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「でも、最後ににわとりさんがたまごを見て思い出すの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝But in the end, the hen saw an egg and remembered.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝But in the end, the hen saw an egg and remembered.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「『ぼくはこれだったんだ』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝❛I used to be an egg.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝❛I used to be an egg.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「それで、最後はそのたまごからひよこが顔を出して、終わり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Then finally, a chick brought its head out from the egg. The end.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Then finally, a chick brought its head out from the egg. The end.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「へえ…絵本ってそんな深い内容のもあるんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm, I didn't know there were such profound picture books...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm, I didn't know there were such profound picture books...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ふかい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Profound?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Profound?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕にはホントにそれが哲学を語ってるように思えるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I feel as though that book was talking philosophy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I feel as though that book was talking philosophy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「そんなに難しいものじゃないよ、きっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Surely it wasn't anything that difficult.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Surely it wasn't anything that difficult.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「…でも、ひよこはかわいかったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...But, the chicks were cute.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...But, the chicks were cute.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「理樹君は、絵本はお好き？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Riki-kun, do you like picture books?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Riki-kun, do you like picture books?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、好きとか嫌いって言うか、そもそもあんまり読んだことないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm not sure since I have only ever read a few of them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm not sure since I have only ever read a few of them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: も、小毬さんの言う絵本はなんだか気になるというか、面白そうというか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Even so, I thought the one Komari-san told me about sounded interesting...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even so, I thought the one Komari-san told me about sounded interesting...

MESSAGE.JP: 度、どこかで探して読んでみようか、という気になった。
MESSAGE.EN: I should see if I can find it somewhere.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should see if I can find it somewhere.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ふうん、そっかー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hmm, have you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hmm, have you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「あ、じゃあ面白くない話しちゃったね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ah, I seem to have made a bad choice for the conversation topic, then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ah, I seem to have made a bad choice for the conversation topic, then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そう？　結構面白かったけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I don't think so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I don't think so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うーん、まあお詫びにフルーツグミをどうぞ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hmm. Please try this fruit flavored gummy candy, instead.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hmm. Please try this fruit flavored gummy candy, instead.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の開いた袋を差し出される。
MESSAGE.EN: She held out a bag filled with candies before me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She held out a bag filled with candies before me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ、もらうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は中からオレンジ色のグミを取り出すと、口に放り込んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I picked up an orange one and popped it in my mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: I picked up an orange one and popped it in my mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「じゃ、私は先に戻るよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I'll be going back to the classroom, then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I'll be going back to the classroom, then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いながら、お菓子のゴミをビニール袋に詰めていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Whilst saying that, she picked up the trash we had produced.
MESSAGE.Translation: Whilst saying that, she picked up the trash we had produced.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、じゃあ、また」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, see you later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, see you later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「１０分後には教室で会うけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It's just ten minutes until we meet again in the classroom, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It's just ten minutes until we meet again in the classroom, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まあ、そりゃそうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, you're right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, you're right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「とりあえず、１０分間のさようならです。戻るとき、ネジと椅子を元に戻すの忘れないでね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Anyway, this is a ten-minute goodbye. And be sure to fix the window.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Anyway, this is a ten-minute goodbye. And be sure to fix the window.❞

MESSAGE.JP: う言い残して、小毬さんは去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Leaving me with those words, she left.
MESSAGE.Translation: Leaving me with those words, she left.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（絵本、か）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Picture books...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Picture books...)

MESSAGE.JP: んかちょっと気になる内容の本だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd become kind of curious about the book she mentioned.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd become kind of curious about the book she mentioned.

MESSAGE.JP: 度図書館でも行って、探してみようかな…。
MESSAGE.EN: I now wanted to read it...
MESSAGE.Translation: I now wanted to read it...

MESSAGE.JP: ルーツグミの袋を空にすると、僕も教室に戻ることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: After finishing off all the fruit gummy candies, I went back to the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: After finishing off all the fruit gummy candies, I went back to the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、お気に入りの場所らしいし、あんまり顔出し過ぎて邪魔しても悪いかな。
MESSAGE.EN: She's relaxing at her favorite place, so I'd feel bad about disturbing her too much.
MESSAGE.Translation: She's relaxing at her favorite place, so I'd feel bad about disturbing her too much.

MESSAGE.JP: は教室に戻って食べることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: So I decided to have my lunch in the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: So I decided to have my lunch in the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 課後、僕はこれまで通り、グラウンドにいた。
MESSAGE.EN: After school, I was on the grounds as usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: After school, I was on the grounds as usual.

MESSAGE.JP: めて休んでおけばいいものの…
MESSAGE.EN: It'd be nice if I could at least rest a little...
MESSAGE.Translation: It'd be nice if I could at least rest a little...

MESSAGE.JP: はまたバッターボックスに立たされていたのだった…。
MESSAGE.EN: I was put in the batter's box again...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was put in the batter's box again...

MESSAGE.JP: 課後、今日も練習の時間になる。
MESSAGE.EN: After school, we started practice.
MESSAGE.Translation: After school, we started practice.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「今日は、実戦を意識させるためにカウントを取ろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝To let everyone get a feel for the real matches, today we'll be keeping score.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝To let everyone get a feel for the real matches, today we'll be keeping score.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まだ三球に一球しかストライクこないのにぃ？　フォアボールばかりになるよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But she barely hits the strike zone once every three balls? She'll end up walking me every time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But she barely hits the strike zone once every three balls? She'll end up walking me every time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「４つボールが溜まるとダメなのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Throwing 4 balls makes a walk...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Throwing 4 balls makes a walk...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Uuhn...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Uuhn...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「じゃあ倍の８個までＯＫにしてくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Make it OK up till 8 balls then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Make it OK up till 8 balls then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そんな無茶な」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think that's a bit...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think that's a bit...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「じゃあその代わり、バッターアウトは三振じゃなく、四振な」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, but in exchange the batter is only out after 4 strikes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Okay, but in exchange the batter is only out after 4 strikes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ええぇぇー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝ARE YOU SURE!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝ARE YOU SURE!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「エイトボール！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Ball 8!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Ball 8!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「四振！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Out!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Out!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「どうだ？　鈴の球の感想は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What do you think about her pitches?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What do you think about her pitches?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「とりあえずルールが斬新すぎて、よくわからないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't get it, with all these new rules...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't get it, with all these new rules...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「練習じゃ、こらー！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Keep practicing!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Keep practicing!❞

MESSAGE.JP: んな頑張って練習した。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone did their best during practice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone did their best during practice.

MESSAGE.JP: ィン！
MESSAGE.EN: *Slam*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Slam*!

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「大ファールだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Quite a foul.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Quite a foul.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 球は校舎を高々と越えていく。
MESSAGE.EN: The ball I hit flew over the school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: The ball I hit flew over the school building.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「しかしまあ、細い体でよくあそこまで飛ばしたなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝But really, you're a big hitter even though you're so thin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝But really, you're a big hitter even though you're so thin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「和製イチローの称号をやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'll give you a new title, Japanese Ichiro.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'll give you a new title, Japanese Ichiro.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「やめてよ、馬鹿に思われるよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No thanks, it sounds stupid.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No thanks, it sounds stupid.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ボールが切れた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We're out of balls.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We're out of balls.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ローブを下ろして、恭介が立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke put his glove on the ground and stood up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke put his glove on the ground and stood up.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「集めようか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Time to collect?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Time to collect?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ああ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は最後に打った、校舎を越えたボールを探しにでる。
MESSAGE.EN: I headed toward the direction I had hit the last ball to.
MESSAGE.Translation: I headed toward the direction I had hit the last ball to.

MESSAGE.JP: ラウンドの喧噪も、中庭までは届かない。
MESSAGE.EN: I went to the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went to the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: 校する生徒もまばらな時間、無機質な校舎に囲まれた中庭はとても静かだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was quiet and empty.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was quiet and empty.

MESSAGE.JP: 丈夫かな…こんな人気のないところにきちゃって…。
MESSAGE.EN: Am I gonna be okay... there aren't many people out here...
MESSAGE.Translation: Am I gonna be okay... there aren't many people out here...

MESSAGE.JP: りを気にしながら、ボールを探す。
MESSAGE.EN: I kept an eye on my surroundings while I looked for the ball.
MESSAGE.Translation: I kept an eye on my surroundings while I looked for the ball.

MESSAGE.JP: 々と真人たちから遠ざかりながら、気がつけば僕はここまで来ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I slowly moved further away from the fields and before I knew it, I was here.
MESSAGE.Translation: I slowly moved further away from the fields and before I knew it, I was here.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（こっちの方までは飛んでこないと思うんだけど…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(I wonder if the ball fell somewhere in here...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(I wonder if the ball fell somewhere in here...)

MESSAGE.JP: ぐれ当たりにしても、よく飛んだものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if it was only a fluke, I still couldn't believe I had hit it so far.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if it was only a fluke, I still couldn't believe I had hit it so far.

MESSAGE.JP: 分が打ったのに、びっくりしてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: I surprise even myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I surprise even myself.

MESSAGE.JP: ラウンドの端から一回り見て来たが、ボールが落ちている様子がない。
MESSAGE.EN: Although I searched the grounds from one end to the other, I couldn't find the ball.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although I searched the grounds from one end to the other, I couldn't find the ball.

MESSAGE.JP: 々と真人たちから遠ざかりながら、気がつけば僕はここまで来ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I slowly moved further away from the fields and before I knew it, I was here.
MESSAGE.Translation: I slowly moved further away from the fields and before I knew it, I was here.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（さすがに、ないだろうな）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(As I thought, it's not here either.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(As I thought, it's not here either.)

MESSAGE.JP: 間も随分経ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: It had been a while since we started gathering the balls.
MESSAGE.Translation: It had been a while since we started gathering the balls.

MESSAGE.JP: 度戻った方が良さそうだ、そう思った時。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd better be getting back soon.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd better be getting back soon.

MESSAGE.JP: 庭の端、大きなケヤキの木の下に白いものがあった。
MESSAGE.EN: I saw something white under the big zelkova tree, which was located at the end of the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: I saw something white under the big zelkova tree, which was located at the end of the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: がいるみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: There seemed to be somebody there.
MESSAGE.Translation: There seemed to be somebody there.

MESSAGE.JP: メもとで訊いてみようか。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to ask if she knew about the ball.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to ask if she knew about the ball.

MESSAGE.EN: The white thing I first mistook for a person was...
MESSAGE.Translation: The white thing I first mistook for a person was...

MESSAGE.JP: かと思った白い影は、木の下に広げられた日傘だった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...a parasol.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...a parasol.

MESSAGE.JP: こかで見たことがあるような。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt that it looked familiar.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt that it looked familiar.

MESSAGE.JP: の傘って、もしかして…。
MESSAGE.EN: This parasol belonged to...
MESSAGE.Translation: This parasol belonged to...

MESSAGE.JP: に気を取られていたから、気づいた時にはすでに遅かった。
MESSAGE.EN: Since all my attention was focused on the parasol, it was already too late when I noticed it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since all my attention was focused on the parasol, it was already too late when I noticed it.

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「ひゃぅっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Hyau!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Hyau!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ごしにも分かる。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt something through my shoe.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt something through my shoe.

MESSAGE.JP: ま先に、やわらかな感触。
MESSAGE.EN: My toe was touching something soft.
MESSAGE.Translation: My toe was touching something soft.

MESSAGE.JP: して、変な声が聞こえた。
MESSAGE.EN: And also, I'd heard a strange voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: And also, I'd heard a strange voice.

MESSAGE.JP: がしゃべったっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: The parasol spoke!!
MESSAGE.Translation: The parasol spoke!!

MESSAGE.JP: ってそんな訳はない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...No way. What on earth am I thinking?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...No way. What on earth am I thinking?

MESSAGE.JP: の視線の先には女の子がいた。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a girl in front of my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a girl in front of my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: を見上げていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was looking up at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was looking up at me.

MESSAGE.JP: して――。
MESSAGE.EN: Then,
MESSAGE.Translation: Then,

MESSAGE.JP: の後ろに広がる青い空を――見ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: she looked up to the blue sky above me.
MESSAGE.Translation: she looked up to the blue sky above me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…西園さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ラスメイトの西園美魚（みお）さんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was Mio Nishizono-san, a classmate.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Mio Nishizono-san, a classmate.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ご、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I, I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I, I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の彼女を蹴ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: I apologized for kicking her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I apologized for kicking her.

MESSAGE.JP: に気を取られていた僕が、悪い。
MESSAGE.EN: That was all my fault.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was all my fault.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「痛かったよね…本当にごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I must've hurt you. I'm so sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I must've hurt you. I'm so sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: を下げる。
MESSAGE.EN: I bowed my head.
MESSAGE.Translation: I bowed my head.

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんは黙ったまま、こちらを見ている。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't say anything and just looked at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't say anything and just looked at me.

MESSAGE.JP: っと僕を睨んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: She was staring at me in silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was staring at me in silence.

MESSAGE.JP: もしかして、怒ってる？
MESSAGE.EN: ...Could it be that she was angry?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Could it be that she was angry?

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「直枝さん、…傘を」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san... my parasol.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san... my parasol.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「傘を取っていただけますか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Could you let me have my parasol?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Could you let me have my parasol?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、う、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝S, sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝S, sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: がつまずいた拍子に、位置がずれてしまったのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I had accidentally knocked the parasol over when I stumbled.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had accidentally knocked the parasol over when I stumbled.

MESSAGE.JP: に転がる白い傘を、僕は返す。
MESSAGE.EN: I handed the white parasol back to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I handed the white parasol back to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…ありがとうございます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Thank you very much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Thank you very much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ううん、飛ばしちゃったのは僕の方だしね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, that was my fault.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, that was my fault.❞

MESSAGE.JP: っと微妙な光の加減とかあったんだろうな。
MESSAGE.EN: The parasol had probably been shielding her from the rays of the sun.
MESSAGE.Translation: The parasol had probably been shielding her from the rays of the sun.

MESSAGE.JP: んでいたのは眩しかったからだ、と思いたい。
MESSAGE.EN: I hoped the reason she was gazing at me like that was just that she was dazzled by the sun.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hoped the reason she was gazing at me like that was just that she was dazzled by the sun.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「…確かにそうですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Yes, you're right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Yes, you're right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「では、おあいこということで、ひとつ手打ちにしましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Now we're even, so this was payback.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Now we're even, so this was payback.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「ちなみに…斬り殺す方の意味です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝By the way, in this case ❛payback❜ means ❛prepare to face your maker,❜ not remuneration.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝By the way, in this case ❛payback❜ means ❛prepare to face your maker,❜ not remuneration.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 情を変えないまま、ぽつりと言った。
MESSAGE.EN: Without changing her facial expression, she muttered.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without changing her facial expression, she muttered.

MESSAGE.JP: 、やっぱり、怒ってるっ。
MESSAGE.EN: Yeah, she really must be angry.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yeah, she really must be angry.

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「冗談です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's just a joke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's just a joke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「う、うん。それならよかったよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh... That's a relief...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh... That's a relief...❞

MESSAGE.JP: かってはいるけど、心臓に悪い。
MESSAGE.EN: I knew it was a joke, but it was still bad for my heart.
MESSAGE.Translation: I knew it was a joke, but it was still bad for my heart.

MESSAGE.JP: はさっき手渡した日傘に目を向ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at the parasol I handed over to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at the parasol I handed over to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 分の手元に木洩れ日が当たらないように置いてあったのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess she was using it to keep the sunlight filtering through the trees off of her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess she was using it to keep the sunlight filtering through the trees off of her.

MESSAGE.JP: い日傘。
MESSAGE.EN: A white parasol.
MESSAGE.Translation: A white parasol.

MESSAGE.JP: れは珍しくもない日用品だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was nothing new and just an everyday item.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was nothing new and just an everyday item.

MESSAGE.JP: も、その日用品のせいで、西園さんはクラスから少し浮いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: But that was what set Nishizono-san apart from her peers.
MESSAGE.Translation: But that was what set Nishizono-san apart from her peers.

MESSAGE.JP: も、同じクラスだけど話をしたことはほとんどない。
MESSAGE.EN: I've had only a few opportunities to chat with her even though we are classmates.
MESSAGE.Translation: I've had only a few opportunities to chat with her even though we are classmates.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「西園さん、怪我はなかった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, are you really alright?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, are you really alright?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「はい、触れた程度ですから大丈夫です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes, I'm all right. It wasn't enough to hurt me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes, I'm all right. It wasn't enough to hurt me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「よかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thank goodness.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thank goodness.❞

MESSAGE.JP: っとして、改めて西園さんを見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I sighed in relief and looked at her once again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sighed in relief and looked at her once again.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「本を読んでいたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're reading a book.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're reading a book.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんの右手には文庫本がある。
MESSAGE.EN: She was holding a paperback book in her right hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was holding a paperback book in her right hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 紙の字は細かくて、題名を確認することはできない。
MESSAGE.EN: The title was printed in too small a font to read.
MESSAGE.Translation: The title was printed in too small a font to read.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 緑の季節のケヤキは目にも鮮やかな青葉を繁らせる。
MESSAGE.EN: It was the season for the zelkova tree to put out fresh leaves, and it was bristling with liveliness.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the season for the zelkova tree to put out fresh leaves, and it was bristling with liveliness.

MESSAGE.JP: やかな陽光がその葉をくぐって、僕らの元に届く。
MESSAGE.EN: Sunlight was sifting in on us through the gaps in the leaves.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sunlight was sifting in on us through the gaps in the leaves.

MESSAGE.JP: らちら、と揺れる木洩れ日に初夏を知る。
MESSAGE.EN: The tree's fluttering reminded me of the beginning of summer.
MESSAGE.Translation: The tree's fluttering reminded me of the beginning of summer.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「本を読むには、とても気持ち良いところだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This is a good place for reading, I think.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This is a good place for reading, I think.❞

MESSAGE.JP: り抜ける風が頬を撫でた。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt a breeze caress my cheeks.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt a breeze caress my cheeks.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「はい。わたしもそう思います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes, I think so, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes, I think so, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: かに頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded calmly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded calmly.

MESSAGE.JP: んな所で、のんびりと本を読むのも確かに悪くないな。
MESSAGE.EN: It certainly isn't a bad place to read a book.
MESSAGE.Translation: It certainly isn't a bad place to read a book.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「あ、でも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝But...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝But...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ょっと困った顔になる。
MESSAGE.EN: She had a troubled look.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had a troubled look.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「本を読むのに最適なのは確かなのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I won't deny this is usually the best place for reading.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I won't deny this is usually the best place for reading.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「今日は、いきなりボールが飛んできたんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝A ball flew by me just today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝A ball flew by me just today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ボール…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A ball...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A ball...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: まった。
MESSAGE.EN: Oh my god.
MESSAGE.Translation: Oh my god.

MESSAGE.JP: はそもそも、ボールを探しに来たんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I had totally forgotten that I was here to find the ball.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had totally forgotten that I was here to find the ball.

MESSAGE.JP: の探し物は確かに、ここに飛んできた。
MESSAGE.EN: And she just mentioned she got interrupted by a ball.
MESSAGE.Translation: And she just mentioned she got interrupted by a ball.

MESSAGE.JP: たんだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: In other words, that meant...
MESSAGE.Translation: In other words, that meant...

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「はい、野球のボールです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes, it was a baseball.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes, it was a baseball.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 中の後ろから白球を取り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: She picked up a baseball from behind her.
MESSAGE.Translation: She picked up a baseball from behind her.

MESSAGE.JP: の小さな手のひらは、野球のボールを握るのさえ精一杯だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed nearly impossible for her to hold it with her small hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed nearly impossible for her to hold it with her small hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 人の手がグローブなら、西園さんの手のひらは楓の葉だった。
MESSAGE.EN: If you were to describe Masato's hand as a baseball glove, you'd have to say her hand is like a maple leaf.
MESSAGE.Translation: If you were to describe Masato's hand as a baseball glove, you'd have to say her hand is like a maple leaf.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「いきなり飛んできたので、びっくりしました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It was so sudden, it really surprised me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It was so sudden, it really surprised me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「ソフトボールではないですね。野球部は休部状態のはずですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝This doesn't look like a softball. But the baseball club is inactive now if I'm correct.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝This doesn't look like a softball. But the baseball club is inactive now if I'm correct.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「どこの誰がやっているんでしょうか。安全に、もっと気を配って欲しいものです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I wonder who was playing. I would like them to be more careful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I wonder who was playing. I would like them to be more careful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ま、ま、まったくだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ye, yeah, indeed!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ye, yeah, indeed!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 更、自分たちだとは言えない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't tell her I was one of them, now.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't tell her I was one of them, now.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ボールはぶつからなかった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Did it hurt you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Did it hurt you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: れで当たっていたら、さっき以上に謝らなくてはいけない。
MESSAGE.EN: If the ball had hit her, I'd have to apologize much more than when I'd kicked her earlier.
MESSAGE.Translation: If the ball had hit her, I'd have to apologize much more than when I'd kicked her earlier.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「それは…大丈夫ですけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝No, it didn't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝No, it didn't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なら、よかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: つかっていないのなら一安心だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I was really relieved.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was really relieved.

MESSAGE.JP: て、どうやって返してもらおうか。
MESSAGE.EN: But how am I going to get the ball back from her?
MESSAGE.Translation: But how am I going to get the ball back from her?

MESSAGE.JP: 直に言うのが、一番だけど。なんか言い出しにくい。
MESSAGE.EN: I know the best way is to be honest. But I'm a bit hesitant.
MESSAGE.Translation: I know the best way is to be honest. But I'm a bit hesitant.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あの、そのボールなんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, that ball is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, that ball is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「はい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes?❞

MESSAGE.JP: れでも勇気を出そうとした。
MESSAGE.EN: Even so, I gathered my courage to tell her the truth.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even so, I gathered my courage to tell her the truth.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おーい、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, Riki!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, Riki!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ょうど、その時に大きな声がかかる。
MESSAGE.EN: Just as I was trying to do so, I heard a loud voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just as I was trying to do so, I heard a loud voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「まだ、ボール見つかんねぇのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Still haven't found the ball?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Still haven't found the ball?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「手伝いにきてやったぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝We'll give you a hand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝We'll give you a hand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: タイミングがいいのやら、悪いのやら。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I'm not sure if their timing was good or bad.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I'm not sure if their timing was good or bad.

MESSAGE.JP: が野球をしてたことが、ふたりのうちどちらかの口からぽろっと出てしまいそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm afraid one of them may let their tongue slip.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm afraid one of them may let their tongue slip.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ん…西園と話してたのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You were chatting with Nishizono?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You were chatting with Nishizono?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おっ、手に持ってんの、さっきのホームランボールじゃねぇか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh, isn't that your home run ball from before?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh, isn't that your home run ball from before?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだよ、理樹、見つけたんなら、さっさと戻ってこいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey now, Riki, if you'd already found it you should've come back sooner.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey now, Riki, if you'd already found it you should've come back sooner.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ただでさえボール少ねぇんだからよぉ、とろとろしてんじゃねぇよったく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝We don't have that many balls, so don't waste time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝We don't have that many balls, so don't waste time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おまえそれでもやる気あんのか、ああ、もちろん野球のことだとも、おまえは野球を一体
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I can tell you haven't got enough passion. Of course, I mean passion for bas
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I can tell you haven't got enough passion. Of course, I mean passion for bas

MESSAGE.JP: ぶっ」
MESSAGE.EN: oomph!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: oomph!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ろぽろですぎだ!!
MESSAGE.EN: He said too much!!
MESSAGE.Translation: He said too much!!

MESSAGE.JP: の口を慌てて手で塞ぐ。
MESSAGE.EN: I hurriedly slammed my hand over his mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hurriedly slammed my hand over his mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…西園さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あの…ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「その、黙ってたわけじゃなくて。言い出せなかったって言うか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wasn't trying to hide it... I just...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wasn't trying to hide it... I just...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんの様子を窺う。
MESSAGE.EN: I waited for her reply.
MESSAGE.Translation: I waited for her reply.

MESSAGE.JP: ったままだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But she stayed silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: But she stayed silent.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あの、西園さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, Nishizono-san...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, Nishizono-san...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「責任、取ってくださいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Take responsibility for it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Take responsibility for it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いながら、ボールを差し出してくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Saying so, she held out the ball to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saying so, she held out the ball to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「責任っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Responsibility...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Responsibility...❞

MESSAGE.JP: たりの白い目がこちらに向く。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato and Rin turned their icy eyes on me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato and Rin turned their icy eyes on me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやいや、ヘンな想像しないで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no, don't be getting any weird ideas.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no, don't be getting any weird ideas.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「あざになってたりしたら…困ります」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I think I might have got a bruise... How troubling.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I think I might have got a bruise... How troubling.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「やっぱり、どこかぶつかったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Did the ball hit you, after all?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Did the ball hit you, after all?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「本当にごめん…大丈夫？　見せてみてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm really sorry... Are you okay? Show me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm really sorry... Are you okay? Show me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「いえ、平気ですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝No, I'm fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝No, I'm fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なにがなんだかさっぱりだが、理樹が悪い。謝っておけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I don't know what's going on, but I'm sure that it's your fault, Riki. Apologize to her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I don't know what's going on, but I'm sure that it's your fault, Riki. Apologize to her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん…ごめんね。湿布持ってくるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah... I'm sorry. I'll bring you some compresses.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah... I'm sorry. I'll bring you some compresses.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「いえ、本当に大丈夫ですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝No, you don't have to. I'm just fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝No, you don't have to. I'm just fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…そんなわけにもいかないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「さっ、続きだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Now, time to get back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Now, time to get back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おら、いくぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Come on, let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Come on, let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: と鈴の肩を叩き、真人が戻っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: After patting Rin's shoulder and mine, Masato headed back for the grounds.
MESSAGE.Translation: After patting Rin's shoulder and mine, Masato headed back for the grounds.

MESSAGE.JP: と一緒に、僕もケヤキの下を後にした。
MESSAGE.EN: Leaving the shade of the zelkova tree, I followed after him with Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: Leaving the shade of the zelkova tree, I followed after him with Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃ、じゃあ、西園さん。またね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, see you, Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, see you, Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: が鈴と親しくない人と話しているのを見てか、鈴は後ずさる。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin stood back. It was probably because I was talking with a girl she didn't know.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin stood back. It was probably because I was talking with a girl she didn't know.

MESSAGE.JP: るは真人だが…。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato was then the only liability...
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato was then the only liability...

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ん…西園と話してたのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You were chatting with Nishizono?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You were chatting with Nishizono?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おっ、手に持ってんの、さっきのホームランボールじゃねぇか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh, isn't that your home run ball from before?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh, isn't that your home run ball from before?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだよ、理樹、見つけたんなら、さっさと戻ってこいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey now, Riki, if you'd already found it you should've come back sooner.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey now, Riki, if you'd already found it you should've come back sooner.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ただでさえボール少ねぇんだからよぉ、とろとろしてんじゃねぇよったく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝We don't have that many balls, so don't waste time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝We don't have that many balls, so don't waste time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おまえそれでもやる気あんのか、ああ、もちろん野球のことだとも、おまえは野球を一体
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I can tell you haven't got enough passion. Of course, I mean passion for bas
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I can tell you haven't got enough passion. Of course, I mean passion for bas

MESSAGE.JP: ぶっ」
MESSAGE.EN: oomph!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: oomph!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ろぽろですぎだ!!
MESSAGE.EN: He said too much!!
MESSAGE.Translation: He said too much!!

MESSAGE.JP: の口を慌てて手で塞ぐ。
MESSAGE.EN: I hurriedly slammed my hand over his mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hurriedly slammed my hand over his mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…西園さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あの…ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「その、黙ってたわけじゃなくて。言い出せなかったって言うか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wasn't trying to hide it... I just...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wasn't trying to hide it... I just...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんの様子を窺う。
MESSAGE.EN: I waited for her reply.
MESSAGE.Translation: I waited for her reply.

MESSAGE.JP: ったままだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But she stayed silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: But she stayed silent.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あの、西園さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san..?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san..?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「責任、取ってくださいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Take responsibility for it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Take responsibility for it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いながら、ボールを差し出してくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Saying so, she held out the ball to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saying so, she held out the ball to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「責任っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Responsibility...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Responsibility...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人の白い目がこちらに向く。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato turned his icy eyes on me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato turned his icy eyes on me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやいや、ヘンな想像しないで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no, don't be getting any weird ideas.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no, don't be getting any weird ideas.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「あざになってたりしたら…困ります」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I think I might have got a bruise... How troubling.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I think I might have got a bruise... How troubling.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「やっぱり、どこかぶつかったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Did the ball hit you, after all?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Did the ball hit you, after all?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「本当にごめん…大丈夫？　見せてみてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm really sorry... Are you okay? Show me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm really sorry... Are you okay? Show me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「いえ、平気ですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝No, I'm fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝No, I'm fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ま、なんにしても理樹が悪いな。謝っとけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Seems like you're totally at fault here, Riki. Apologize to her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Seems like you're totally at fault here, Riki. Apologize to her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん…ごめんね。湿布持ってくるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah... I'm sorry. I'll bring you some compresses.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah... I'm sorry. I'll bring you some compresses.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園@「いえ、本当に大丈夫ですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝No, you don't have to. I'm just fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝No, you don't have to. I'm just fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…そんなわけにもいかないし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「さっ、続きだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Now, time to get back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Now, time to get back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おら、いくぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Come on, let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Come on, let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ろにぽつんと立っていた鈴の肩を叩き、真人が戻っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Giving Rin, who was standing behind us, a pat on the shoulder, Masato headed back to the grounds with her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Giving Rin, who was standing behind us, a pat on the shoulder, Masato headed back to the grounds with her.

MESSAGE.JP: を行く彼らに遅れないように、僕もケヤキの下を後にした。
MESSAGE.EN: I left the shade of the zelkova tree and followed after them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I left the shade of the zelkova tree and followed after them.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃ、じゃあ、西園さん。またね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, see you, Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, see you, Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 後に、振り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned back to look at her one last time.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned back to look at her one last time.

MESSAGE.JP: の陰に埋もれるようにして、西園さんは本を読んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was reading her book under the shade of the tree.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was reading her book under the shade of the tree.

MESSAGE.JP: の声に応えることもない。
MESSAGE.EN: It didn't look like she was going to answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: It didn't look like she was going to answer.

MESSAGE.JP: いさっきまでのことなんて、もう忘れてしまったみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed as though she had already forgotten all about what had just happened.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed as though she had already forgotten all about what had just happened.

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんの視界には、僕らのことは入っていない。
MESSAGE.EN: To her, we no longer existed.
MESSAGE.Translation: To her, we no longer existed.

MESSAGE.JP: の姿は、とても孤独に見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked very solitary.
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked very solitary.

MESSAGE.JP: ざされて――完成された世界だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Like she was shut in her own, closed world.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like she was shut in her own, closed world.

MESSAGE.JP: るで名画のように、静止していた。
MESSAGE.EN: In her serenity it looked as though she were part of some famous illustration.
MESSAGE.Translation: In her serenity it looked as though she were part of some famous illustration.

MESSAGE.JP: らの乱入は、彼女にとってはほんの一瞬のことに過ぎず。
MESSAGE.EN: Our sudden appearance had been of no significance to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Our sudden appearance had been of no significance to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 園さんの世界は、崩れることはなかったようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It didn't affect her world at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: It didn't affect her world at all.

MESSAGE.JP: の本を読んでいるんだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: I wondered what it was that she was reading.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wondered what it was that she was reading.

MESSAGE.JP: は、それを訊いてみようと思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to ask her next time.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to ask her next time.

MESSAGE.JP: んな頑張って練習した。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone did their best during practice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone did their best during practice.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なんだおまえら、うっとい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You guys are annoying.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You guys are annoying.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ッチャーマウンドに立つ鈴の周りにはわらわらと猫が集まってきている。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin's cats were getting together around her as she stood on the pitching mound.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin's cats were getting together around her as she stood on the pitching mound.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そこにいると踏む。ぺちゃんこになるぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Get away from me, otherwise I might crush you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Get away from me, otherwise I might crush you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んでは投げるが、すぐ戻ってきてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: She tried throwing them all away, but they kept rolling back up to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: She tried throwing them all away, but they kept rolling back up to her.

MESSAGE.JP: いぽいとそれを繰り返す。
MESSAGE.EN: They continued it over and over.
MESSAGE.Translation: They continued it over and over.

MESSAGE.JP: の背後に迫る、ひとりの女生徒の影。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a shadow of a female student approaching Rin from behind.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a shadow of a female student approaching Rin from behind.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「神聖なるグラウンドを猫の足で汚さないでくださる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Could you please stop your cats from trampling on our holy ground?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Could you please stop your cats from trampling on our holy ground?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「笹瀬川佐々美っ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Sasami Sasasegawa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Sasami Sasasegawa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: が飛び退く。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin jumped back.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin jumped back.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「またでやがった！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝She's appeared again!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝She's appeared again!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ああ…あれが鈴のライバルか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Ah, so that's Rin's rival?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Ah, so that's Rin's rival?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介はのんきにスピードメーターをいじりながら言った。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke commented while carefully fiddling with a speed gun.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke commented while carefully fiddling with a speed gun.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あの人、ほら、反対側で練習してるソフトボール部の人だし…ややこしいことになりそうだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She's a member of the softball club that's practicing on the opposite side. This may mean trouble.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She's a member of the softball club that's practicing on the opposite side. This may mean trouble.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ちゃんとあとであのトンボみたいな棒でならしておく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Don't worry. We're properly leveling the field with that pole that's like a rake when we're done.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Don't worry. We're properly leveling the field with that pole that's like a rake when we're done.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「そういう問題じゃありませんことよ？　あと、みたいじゃなくてトンボで合ってます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝That's not my point. Besides, it's not 'like a rake,' it IS a rake.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝That's not my point. Besides, it's not 'like a rake,' it IS a rake.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「グラウンドとは、高みを目指し、汗を流すスポーツマンのためのトレーニングの場所」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝This ground exists as a haven for sports lovers like us to train.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝This ground exists as a haven for sports lovers like us to train.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あなたたちのように目標もなく、猫とじゃれあっているような人たちのためにある場所じゃありませんの。おわかり？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝People like you, who are just playing with cats without a goal in mind, are unworthy of using this place. Got that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝People like you, who are just playing with cats without a goal in mind, are unworthy of using this place. Got that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「一応試合を目指しているらしい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But it seems we are going to be having a match.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But it seems we are going to be having a match.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「らしい？　まるで、どうでもいい話みたいですわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝'Seems'? Why are you talking as though it's none of your concern?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝'Seems'? Why are you talking as though it's none of your concern?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「正直どーでもいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝To be honest, I'm not interested in it at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝To be honest, I'm not interested in it at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 直すぎる！
MESSAGE.EN: She's too honest!
MESSAGE.Translation: She's too honest!

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「なら、我がソフトボール部がのびのび練習できるよう、明け渡すべきではなくて？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Then shouldn't you move out of the way and let the softball team practice?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Then shouldn't you move out of the way and let the softball team practice?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「その発想はないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I have no such intention.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I have no such intention.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「くっ…棗鈴…我がソフトボール部までをも侮辱しましたわね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Kuh... Rin Natsume, you even insult my club...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Kuh... Rin Natsume, you even insult my club...❞

MESSAGE.JP: を固め、ぷるぷると怒りで震わせる。
MESSAGE.EN: She clenched her fists and trembled with anger.
MESSAGE.Translation: She clenched her fists and trembled with anger.

MESSAGE.JP: の足下には、まったく空気を把握していない猫が一匹。シューズに頬ずりをしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a cat who didn't understand what was going on at her feet. He was brushing his cheek against her shoe.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a cat who didn't understand what was going on at her feet. He was brushing his cheek against her shoe.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「こいつまでわたくしを馬鹿に!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Even a cat is making a fool of me!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Even a cat is making a fool of me!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女生徒@「先輩に対して、無礼なっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@❝Stop being rude, cat!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@❝Stop being rude, cat!❞

MESSAGE.JP: むっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Wham*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Wham*.

MESSAGE.JP: から現れた別のソフトボール部員がそれを蹴っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Another softball club member kicked the cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Another softball club member kicked the cat.

MESSAGE.JP: が宙を舞う。
MESSAGE.EN: The kick sent the cat into the air.
MESSAGE.Translation: The kick sent the cat into the air.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「テヅカ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Tezuka!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Tezuka!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Ah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Ah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: るんと回転し無事足から着地した。
MESSAGE.EN: The cat spun around and safely landed on his feet.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cat spun around and safely landed on his feet.

MESSAGE.JP: が、その後、んなあと弱々しく鳴いて、うずくまった。
MESSAGE.EN: However, he cried weakly and lay low.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, he cried weakly and lay low.

MESSAGE.JP: れを見ていた鈴の顔に影が落ちる。
MESSAGE.EN: A shadow fell over Rin's face.
MESSAGE.Translation: A shadow fell over Rin's face.

MESSAGE.JP: らりと笹瀬川佐々美のほうを向く。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin slowly turned toward Sasami Sasasegawa.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin slowly turned toward Sasami Sasasegawa.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「な、なんですの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Wha, what is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Wha, what is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: の目に笹瀬川佐々美は怖じ気づく。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin's eyes were scaring her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin's eyes were scaring her.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「勝負だ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Let's battle!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Let's battle!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え、いや、なんで、恭介が…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think that's your line, Kyousuke...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think that's your line, Kyousuke...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「聞けば、あんた、２年でソフトボール部のピッチャーと４番を張ってるらしいじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I heard you're the cleanup hitter and pitcher of your club in spite of only being a second year.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I heard you're the cleanup hitter and pitcher of your club in spite of only being a second year.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「え、ええ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Ye, yes, I am...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Ye, yes, I am...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「鈴と一打席勝負しろ。あんたが勝ったら、グラウンドから去ってやる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Battle with Rin. If you win, the ground is yours.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Battle with Rin. If you win, the ground is yours.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「だが、鈴が勝ったら、あんたの後輩が猫を蹴っちまったことを詫びて、大人しく自分の練習に戻るこったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But if Rin wins, apologize for your junior's bad behavior and get back to your own practice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But if Rin wins, apologize for your junior's bad behavior and get back to your own practice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ふ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Ha...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Ha...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ほほ…おーーーほっほっほっほ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Hoho... Ohhhh～hoohhohohoho!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Hoho... Ohhhh～hoohhohohoho!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「受けてたちましょう。このわたくしが、草野球に興じてる連中に負けるはずがありませんわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Of course I accept. There is no way someone like you could beat me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Of course I accept. There is no way someone like you could beat me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ボールは軟式。バットは好きに持ってきてくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Use a rubber ball, but any bat is okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Use a rubber ball, but any bat is okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんが一度、反対側のグラウンドに戻っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasasegawa-san returned to the opposite side of the field.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasasegawa-san returned to the opposite side of the field.

MESSAGE.JP: はマウンド上でうつむいたまま、幽霊のように突っ立っている。
MESSAGE.EN: With her eyes to the ground, Rin was standing still on the mound like a ghost.
MESSAGE.Translation: With her eyes to the ground, Rin was standing still on the mound like a ghost.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ちょっと待てよ、恭介っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Wait a sec, Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Wait a sec, Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ットを放り出して真人が駆け寄ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Throwing away his bat, Masato dashed off to Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: Throwing away his bat, Masato dashed off to Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「今の鈴が、ソフトボール部の４番に勝てるわけねぇじゃねぇか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Sasasegawa is the ace of the softball club, there's no way Rin can beat her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Sasasegawa is the ace of the softball club, there's no way Rin can beat her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まぁな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「けど、俺は賭けてみたいんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But I want to test her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But I want to test her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なににだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝For what...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝For what...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「何か…新たな力が鈴から引き出せそうな…そんな気がしてるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I think... we can find Rin's hidden talent... and draw it out with this match.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I think... we can find Rin's hidden talent... and draw it out with this match.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「んな漫画みたいにいくかよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That would only happen in a manga.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That would only happen in a manga.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そもそもストライクゾーンにくることすら怪しいってのによ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝She has enough trouble getting the ball into the strike zone...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝She has enough trouble getting the ball into the strike zone...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「俺はスピードメーターの動作確認してるから、真人、ジャッジ頼む」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'll be checking the speed, so can I ask you to be the umpire, Masato?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'll be checking the speed, so can I ask you to be the umpire, Masato?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川佐々美が戻ってくる。数人の取り巻きを引き連れて。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasami Sasasegawa came back with a few of her cronies.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasami Sasasegawa came back with a few of her cronies.

MESSAGE.JP: 女生徒@「素人が佐々美先輩とさしで勝負してもらえるなんて、それだけでもうらやましいですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@❝Rin Natsume, be proud that you can have a match with Sasami-senpai!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@❝Rin Natsume, be proud that you can have a match with Sasami-senpai!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女生徒@「大きいのかっ飛ばして、格の違いってものを見せつけてやってくださいっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@❝Sasami-sama! Hit a homerun and win the match!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@❝Sasami-sama! Hit a homerun and win the match!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女なりのテンションの上げ方なんだろうなあ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess their cheers will be good motivation for Sasasegawa-san...
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess their cheers will be good motivation for Sasasegawa-san...

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「準備はＯＫですわよ。とっとと始めるとしましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Okay, I'm ready. Let's get this started, already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Okay, I'm ready. Let's get this started, already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「うわぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uwaaa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uwaaa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 員が呆気に取られている。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone was completely flabbergasted at what had happened.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone was completely flabbergasted at what had happened.

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川佐々美は、ぴくりとも動かずバッターボックスに立ちつくす。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasami Sasasegawa had stepped into the batter's box and not even moved.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasami Sasasegawa had stepped into the batter's box and not even moved.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「今の…なんですの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Just now... what was...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Just now... what was...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝1... 130 kph...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝1... 130 kph...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ええぇ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ピードメーターの数値をそう恭介が読み上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke read the numeric value on his speed gun.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke read the numeric value on his speed gun.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ま、漫画だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Are we in a manga...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Are we in a manga...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ストライクコールは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Call.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Call.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あ、ああ、ストライク！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh, yeah. STRIKE!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh, yeah. STRIKE!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 全な振り遅れ。
MESSAGE.EN: She completely failed to hit Rin's pitch.
MESSAGE.Translation: She completely failed to hit Rin's pitch.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ちょ…今の、さっきよりも速かったんじゃねぇか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What the... That pitch was even faster than before, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What the... That pitch was even faster than before, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: は恭介の持つスピードメーターを覗き見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I peered at the speed gun Kyousuke was holding.
MESSAGE.Translation: I peered at the speed gun Kyousuke was holding.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「１３５キロ…さらに速くなってる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝135 kph... It got even faster...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝135 kph... It got even faster...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「真人、ストライクコール」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Masato, call.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Masato, call.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ああっ、ストライク！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Alright. STRIKE!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Alright. STRIKE!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「こいつは…次で１４０超えるぞ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Her next pitch could be faster than 140 kph...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Her next pitch could be faster than 140 kph...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「俺たちは…奇跡の目撃者になる…！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We are about to become witnesses to a miracle...!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We are about to become witnesses to a miracle...!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「このわたくしがっ…かすりもせずに終われるものですかっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Why can't I hit such an amateur's pitch...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Why can't I hit such an amateur's pitch...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ットを短く持ち直す。
MESSAGE.EN: She shortened her grip.
MESSAGE.Translation: She shortened her grip.

MESSAGE.JP: 女生徒@「ファイトですっ、佐々美先輩！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@❝Go for it, Sasami-senpai!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@❝Go for it, Sasami-senpai!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女生徒@「先輩が負けるはずありません！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@❝There's no way you would lose!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@❝There's no way you would lose!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 援の声も悲痛だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Even their cheers sounded mournful.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even their cheers sounded mournful.

MESSAGE.JP: ットは止めきれなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: She couldn't stop her swing.
MESSAGE.Translation: She couldn't stop her swing.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「チェ…チェンジアップ…しかも、馬鹿にしたようなすっとんきょうな暴投…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Ch... changeup... And it was an idiotically wild pitch...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Ch... changeup... And it was an idiotically wild pitch...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「このわたくしをここまで愚弄するとは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝How dare you treat me with such derision...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝How dare you treat me with such derision...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「いや、集中力が切れただけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No, I just lost my concentration.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No, I just lost my concentration.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「なあぁっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Nahhh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Nahhh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川佐々美は絶句。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasami Sasasegawa got choked up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasami Sasasegawa got choked up.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「おい、鈴、もっかい集中力出して投げてみろっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, Rin, concentrate and pitch one more time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, Rin, concentrate and pitch one more time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人が呆然と立ちつくす笹瀬川佐々美をバッターボックスから押し出して、バットを持って構える。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato pushed the stunned Sasami Sasasegawa out of the way and stepped to the batter's box.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato pushed the stunned Sasami Sasasegawa out of the way and stepped to the batter's box.

MESSAGE.JP: の後何球も投じるも、１００キロ台は出ることはなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Although Rin threw many balls, in the end none of them passed the 100 kph boundary.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although Rin threw many balls, in the end none of them passed the 100 kph boundary.

MESSAGE.JP: ０キロを越えるのが精々だった（それでもすごいけど…）。
MESSAGE.EN: Her best throws were between 80 and 88 kph. (Which is amazing enough, though...)
MESSAGE.Translation: Her best throws were between 80 and 88 kph. (Which is amazing enough, though...)

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「もっかい猫蹴ってみよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'll kick a cat again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'll kick a cat again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: きぃ！
MESSAGE.EN: *WHAM*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *WHAM*!

MESSAGE.JP: 人が蹴られた。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato got kicked instead.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato got kicked instead.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「これってなんなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How was she able to do it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How was she able to do it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まあ、火事場のくそ力みたいなもんだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I guess it's because of the power she has hidden within.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I guess it's because of the power she has hidden within.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「意識しては出せない力だってことだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝She couldn't use it consciously.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝She couldn't use it consciously.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「無意識にか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A subconscious power...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A subconscious power...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あの猫たちがさ…それだけ大事ってことだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It just means those cats are really that important to her, doesn't it...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It just means those cats are really that important to her, doesn't it...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「うん？　だろうな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, I guess so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, I guess so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: よりも特別なものなんだ、鈴にとってはきっと。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure that for Rin, the cats are a special existence above anything else.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure that for Rin, the cats are a special existence above anything else.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「とりあえず、さっきの魔球に名前を付けようぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Anyways, let's name that diabolical pitch of hers.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Anyways, let's name that diabolical pitch of hers.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の言葉に僕は脱力する。
MESSAGE.EN: My strength left me at those words.
MESSAGE.Translation: My strength left me at those words.

MESSAGE.JP: の人は気付いてるんだろうか…。それぐらい思われてるってことに。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke, I wonder... does he realize his worth among us?
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke, I wonder... does he realize his worth among us?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「単なるストレートじゃないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wasn't that just a fastball?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wasn't that just a fastball?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「いや、猫の魂が宿ってるからな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No, her ball contains the spirit of her cats.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No, her ball contains the spirit of her cats.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ライジングニャットボール…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝❛Raging Meow Ball❜...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝❛Raging Meow Ball❜...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「どうだっ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What do you think of the name?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What do you think of the name?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、そんなキラキラした目で言われても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why are your eyes sparkling...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why are your eyes sparkling...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「もう一球。最後に投げた緩い球はチェンジアップという。正確には違うがバッターに対して似た効果が得られたからそう呼ぶことにする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Although it wasn't intentional, I consider the last ball she threw a changeup as well, because it served the function of one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Although it wasn't intentional, I consider the last ball she threw a changeup as well, because it served the function of one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 習後、クドをつれて、鈴に話を訊くことにした。
MESSAGE.EN: After the practice ended, Kud and I spoke with Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: After the practice ended, Kud and I spoke with Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「合部屋？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Sharing a room?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Sharing a room?❞

MESSAGE.JP: が女子寮での合部屋探しについて聞くと、鈴は眉根を寄せた。
MESSAGE.EN: She lowered her brows when I told her that we were looking for a roommate.
MESSAGE.Translation: She lowered her brows when I told her that we were looking for a roommate.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ふたりで？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You and her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You and her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: とクドを指さす。
MESSAGE.EN: She pointed at me and Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pointed at me and Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやいやいや…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no, no...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no, no...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「来ヶ谷さんに聞かなかった？　僕が探してる、というわけじゃなくて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san hasn't told you yet? It's not me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san hasn't told you yet? It's not me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もちろん、こっち。クドが探してるんだ、ルームシェアの相手」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's Kud who's looking for a roommate.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's Kud who's looking for a roommate.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「女子寮ではどうなってるかわかんなくて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't know how things work in the girls' dorm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't know how things work in the girls' dorm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あたしにもわからない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Me neither.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Me neither.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ありゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹のときはどうしたんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝How did it happen with you, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝How did it happen with you, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕の場合？　んー、いつの間にか真人となってたなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Me? Hmm, well, before I knew it, Masato had already become my roommate.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Me? Hmm, well, before I knew it, Masato had already become my roommate.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「最悪だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's worst luck.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's worst luck.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「まあ、幼なじみだって、わかってて一緒にしてくれたのかもね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess the boys' dorm head did it on purpose knowing that Masato and I were childhood friends.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess the boys' dorm head did it on purpose knowing that Masato and I were childhood friends.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「寮長はどうしてか僕たちの間柄知ってたし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I don't know how he found that out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I don't know how he found that out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: れは知ってたというか推測した、というべきかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: It was probably a lucky guess.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was probably a lucky guess.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「春先のときはどうだったっけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How did it work out for you last spring?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How did it work out for you last spring?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「工事のせいで適当に割り振られた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Due to the building construction, they decided it at random.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Due to the building construction, they decided it at random.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「春のときは緊急措置だったみたいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝They said that it was an emergency measure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝They said that it was an emergency measure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瞬クドと居たときはどうだったの、と聞こうとして止めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I stopped short of asking Rin how she and Kud had been living when they were sharing a room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stopped short of asking Rin how she and Kud had been living when they were sharing a room.

MESSAGE.JP: の不器用さのことを思い出したのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Considering Rin's bashfulness,
MESSAGE.Translation: Considering Rin's bashfulness,

MESSAGE.JP: と、友達づきあいに関しては不器用が三乗ぐらいになるし。
MESSAGE.EN: she wouldn't be very good at getting along with someone she isn't familiar with.
MESSAGE.Translation: she wouldn't be very good at getting along with someone she isn't familiar with.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ、特に決まった手続きとかはないのかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, aren't there some particular rules for room sharing...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, aren't there some particular rules for room sharing...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹、あたしにそんなことを訊かれてもわからない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, I'm not the right person to answer that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, I'm not the right person to answer that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「寮長に訊け」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Ask the dorm head.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Ask the dorm head.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そっか。ありがとう。そうしてみる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, thanks. I'll do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, thanks. I'll do that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は鈴にお礼を言って立ち去ろうとした。
MESSAGE.EN: I thanked Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thanked Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…そういえば、鈴、寮長さんとどうして知り合いなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝By the way, how come you and the dorm head know each other?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝By the way, how come you and the dorm head know each other?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: は素っ気無く答えた。
MESSAGE.EN: She answered simply.
MESSAGE.Translation: She answered simply.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「猫」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Cats.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Cats.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「猫？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Cats?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Cats?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それだけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's all?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's all?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「それだけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…なるほど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ありがと、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: き出した僕を鈴が呼び止めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I started walking, but she stopped me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I started walking, but she stopped me.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ん？　何、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm? What's up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm? What's up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「寮長に伝言を」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I want you to tell her something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I want you to tell her something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いいけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「モンペチに味噌煮込み味がでた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Miso stew flavored Mon Petit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Miso stew flavored Mon Petit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「発売日は来週月曜日だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝The release date is next Monday.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝The release date is next Monday.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「よろしく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Keep it in your mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Keep it in your mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…わかった、伝えておくよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Got it. I'll tell her that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Got it. I'll tell her that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いて、僕は鈴と別れた。
MESSAGE.EN: I nodded and said good bye.
MESSAGE.Translation: I nodded and said good bye.

MESSAGE.JP: は、ひとりで先に寮長に話を聞きに行くことにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I went to visit the dorm head alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went to visit the dorm head alone.

MESSAGE.JP: 長は寮生全員が加入する互助団体『寮会』のまとめ役だ。
MESSAGE.EN: The role of the dorm head is to coordinate the group called the ❛Dormitory Council,❜ which all dorm members belong to.
MESSAGE.Translation: The role of the dorm head is to coordinate the group called the ❛Dormitory Council,❜ which all dorm members belong to.

MESSAGE.JP: れど、選挙で選ばれるというわけではないらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: However, there's no election for that position.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, there's no election for that position.

MESSAGE.JP: んでも基本的には前の寮長からの指名なのだそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Instead, the previous head appoints someone as their successor.
MESSAGE.Translation: Instead, the previous head appoints someone as their successor.

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「合部屋するときの規則？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝The rules of room sharing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝The rules of room sharing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 徒会室の隣に、男子寮長と女子寮長が使っている部屋がある。
MESSAGE.EN: The room which the dorm heads are using is next to the student council room.
MESSAGE.Translation: The room which the dorm heads are using is next to the student council room.

MESSAGE.JP: こを訪ねた僕は、女子寮長さんに話をした。
MESSAGE.EN: I had stepped in and asked the head of the girls' dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had stepped in and asked the head of the girls' dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: 屋には何人か生徒がいて、仕事をしているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: There were also a few other students working there.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were also a few other students working there.

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「んー、特にはないわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Hmm, there aren't really any.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Hmm, there aren't really any.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「やっぱりそうなんですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is that so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is that so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「あ、風紀委員長？　書類はその棚の一番右。そう、そこ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Ah, head prefect. The papers are on the extreme right of that shelf. Yes, there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Ah, head prefect. The papers are on the extreme right of that shelf. Yes, there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「持っていって頂戴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Please take them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Please take them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: の前にいた女子生徒は一礼して部屋を出て行く。
