MESSAGE.EN: The female student, who was at the front of the shelf, bowed her head and left the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: The female student, who was at the front of the shelf, bowed her head and left the room.

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「部屋のベッドが空いていて、人数が揃えば問題なし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝There's no problem if your room has enough beds and you've already found a roommate.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝There's no problem if your room has enough beds and you've already found a roommate.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「ただ、しょっちゅうやられると大変だからやって良い時期というのはあるけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝But I would prefer if you don't change your partner so often.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝But I would prefer if you don't change your partner so often.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「そういう意味ではわたしがＯＫって言えばＯＫ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝So, if I say it's fine, there's no problem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝So, if I say it's fine, there's no problem.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 長は書類に書き込みをしながら答えた。
MESSAGE.EN: She answered while writing a document.
MESSAGE.Translation: She answered while writing a document.

MESSAGE.JP: 構大変そうだなぁ、寮長の仕事。
MESSAGE.EN: Her job looked pretty tough.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her job looked pretty tough.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今は、ダメですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So will you give the permission?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So will you give the permission?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「新学期始まったばかりでしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝This semester just started, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝This semester just started, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「変えて欲しい、という子もいるかもしれないけれど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝I guess there might be a few people who want to change their room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝I guess there might be a few people who want to change their room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「さすがにね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝That's to be expected.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝That's to be expected.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「何、あなた探してるの？　ならわたしに聞いても管轄外よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝By the way, are you the one who wants to share a room? If so, it's outside my jurisdiction.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝By the way, are you the one who wants to share a room? If so, it's outside my jurisdiction.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、僕じゃないんです。知り合いの女の子で」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I'm not. It's for a girl I know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I'm not. It's for a girl I know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「ちなみに、男女同室ってのはダメだからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝We won't accept any offer of room sharing between boys and girls.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝We won't accept any offer of room sharing between boys and girls.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「わ、わかってますって！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I know!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I know!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「冗談よ、冗談」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Just kidding.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Just kidding.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 長は顔を上げると、頬に手をおいて笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: She lifted her face and laughed with one hand on her cheek.
MESSAGE.Translation: She lifted her face and laughed with one hand on her cheek.

MESSAGE.JP: とつしか違わないはずなのにずいぶん年上に見える笑い方だな…。
MESSAGE.EN: Her laugh made it feel like she was much older than me, though she was just one year older.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her laugh made it feel like she was much older than me, though she was just one year older.

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「…ひょっとして、工事の影響を受けた子？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Why is she looking for a roommate? Is it because of the building construction?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Why is she looking for a roommate? Is it because of the building construction?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、はい。そうなんです。クドリャフカ…能美クドリャフカっていう子です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, yes. That's right. Kudryavka... Kudryavka Noumi.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, yes. That's right. Kudryavka... Kudryavka Noumi.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「あぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Ah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Ah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 長は頷いて、机のキャビネットから名簿を取り出し、ぱらぱらめくっている。
MESSAGE.EN: Nodding, she took out a list of dorm members from a cabinet and started turning the pages.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nodding, she took out a list of dorm members from a cabinet and started turning the pages.

MESSAGE.JP: ドのページを開いて呟く。
MESSAGE.EN: She soon found Kud's details and murmured.
MESSAGE.Translation: She soon found Kud's details and murmured.

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「あの子か。なるほど。ずっと海外にいたんだったわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝I see. She was living abroad, wasn't she?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝I see. She was living abroad, wasn't she?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「海外ではルームメイトはデフォルトなのかしら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝I wonder if room sharing is natural in other countries.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝I wonder if room sharing is natural in other countries.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 今のご時世、一人部屋だと喜ぶ子も少なくはないんだけどね、と寮長は言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She told me that most girls nowadays prefer a single room to a shared one.
MESSAGE.Translation: She told me that most girls nowadays prefer a single room to a shared one.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「さぁ…僕はよくわからないんですけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm, I don't know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm, I don't know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「希望はしてるみたいです。でも部屋の引越しも忙しいみたいだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's what she wants. But she's still busy with moving into her room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's what she wants. But she's still busy with moving into her room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「規則とかあったら手続きのことを調べておこうかと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So I thought I could help her by asking about the technicalities.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So I thought I could help her by asking about the technicalities.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「なるほどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「仲のいい子に頼むっていうのが一番かな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Wouldn't it be better to ask one of her close friends?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Wouldn't it be better to ask one of her close friends?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「でも来たばっかりでそれは難しいか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝But she hasn't been here long, so I take it that's making it difficult.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝But she hasn't been here long, so I take it that's making it difficult.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「わかったわ。相手探しと相手の部屋移動を許可しましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Okay, I allow her to look for a roommate to share with.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Okay, I allow her to look for a roommate to share with.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ありがとうございます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「あと、この紙を能美さんに渡して欲しいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Also, I'd like you to give this to Noumi-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Also, I'd like you to give this to Noumi-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は紙を受け取った。
MESSAGE.EN: I received a sheet of paper.
MESSAGE.Translation: I received a sheet of paper.

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「書いたらわたしのところまで持ってきてくれない？　勿論能美さんがね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Can you tell her to bring it to me after filling it out?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Can you tell her to bring it to me after filling it out?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「はい。わかりました…これはなんです？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Understood. By the way, what is this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Understood. By the way, what is this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「寮内のメーリングリストへの掲載依頼書」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝A request for joining the dorm mailing list.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝A request for joining the dorm mailing list.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「女子寮ニュースみたいなものかしら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝It's something like the girls' dorm's news.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝It's something like the girls' dorm's news.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「登録されてる携帯にメールが届く、ってわけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝We send emails to the registered cellphones.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝We send emails to the registered cellphones.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「掲示板だと見ない子が居るから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Because some of them don't check the board.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Because some of them don't check the board.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、なるほど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「掲示板の使用許可も出しておくわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝I'll also allow her to use the bulletin board.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝I'll also allow her to use the bulletin board.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「わかりました、どうもすみません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thank you very much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thank you very much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「相手見つかったら教えてね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Let me know once she finds her partner.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Let me know once she finds her partner.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クドから報告させればいいんですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You mean you want her to inform you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You mean you want her to inform you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「そうなるわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「はい…あ、そういえば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay... Oh, by the way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay... Oh, by the way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴…あ、いや、棗さんから伝言が」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I have a message from Rin... er, I mean, Natsume-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I have a message from Rin... er, I mean, Natsume-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「ひょっとしてモンペチの新味のこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Is that about the new Mon Petit?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Is that about the new Mon Petit?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ご存知でしたか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「昨日ＣＭ見たから。棗さんに教えてあげようと思ってたんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝I saw its commercial yesterday, so I thought I should tell her about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝I saw its commercial yesterday, so I thought I should tell her about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「発売日は月曜だそうです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She said the release date is next Monday.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She said the release date is next Monday.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんで知ってるのか知らないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm not sure why she knows it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm not sure why she knows it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「正確には入荷日かな。そのあたりはどこから仕入れてくるのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝That must be the date when the stores get them. I wonder, how did she get this information...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝That must be the date when the stores get them. I wonder, how did she get this information...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 長は一瞬考え込んだが、すぐ腕組みを解いて笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: She pondered for an instant, but soon crossed her arms and smiled.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pondered for an instant, but soon crossed her arms and smiled.

MESSAGE.JP: 寮長@「まぁいいわ。ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorm Head@❝Anyway, thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorm Head@❝Anyway, thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どういたしまして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're welcome.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're welcome.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は寮長室を出た。
MESSAGE.EN: I left the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I left the room.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「直枝さん～っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Naoe-sa～n.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Naoe-sa～n.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 舎を出た途端、僕を呼ぶ声がした。
MESSAGE.EN: As soon as I got out of the school building, I heard someone call for me.
MESSAGE.Translation: As soon as I got out of the school building, I heard someone call for me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned around.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned around.

MESSAGE.JP: 舎のほうからだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She came from the school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: She came from the school building.

MESSAGE.JP: 手に紙袋を持っている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was carrying paper bags in both hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was carrying paper bags in both hands.

MESSAGE.JP: んだか重たそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: They looked quite heavy.
MESSAGE.Translation: They looked quite heavy.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クードーっ！　だいじょーぶー？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kuu-doo! Aree youuu ooo-kaaay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kuu-doo! Aree youuu ooo-kaaay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はいー？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yeee～ees?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yeee～ees?❞

MESSAGE.JP: たよた歩いているクドは僕を見つけて急いで来ようとしている…ようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She seemed to be staggering toward me in a hurry.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seemed to be staggering toward me in a hurry.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんか危なっかしいなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That looks dangerous...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That looks dangerous...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ろよろしてる。
MESSAGE.EN: She was waddling along.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was waddling along.

MESSAGE.JP: くてちっこい体は紙袋に操られているようにも見える。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked like her petite body was controlled by the bags she was holding.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked like her petite body was controlled by the bags she was holding.

MESSAGE.JP: らふら。
MESSAGE.EN: *Totter*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Totter*.

MESSAGE.JP: ろよろ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Waddle*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Waddle*.

MESSAGE.JP: らふら。
MESSAGE.EN: *Totter*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Totter*.

MESSAGE.JP: ろよろ……べち。
MESSAGE.EN: And eventually...
MESSAGE.Translation: And eventually...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、転んだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh no, she fell down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh no, she fell down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「しょうがないな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: は下校口まで少し戻った。
MESSAGE.EN: I went back to the entrance.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went back to the entrance.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…いたた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...It hurts.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...It hurts.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド、大丈夫？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud, you alright?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud, you alright?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドが立ち上がるのに手を貸しながら、僕は紙袋のひとつを持った。
MESSAGE.EN: I helped her up and took one of her bags.
MESSAGE.Translation: I helped her up and took one of her bags.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「すみません、直枝さん…はぁ、はぁ、はぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Thank you, Naoe-san... haa, haa, haa.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Thank you, Naoe-san... haa, haa, haa.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは息を切らしている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was panting.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was panting.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ちょっと重たいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝These are quite heavy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝These are quite heavy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…食器？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are they plates?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are they plates?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 聞紙のようなものに包まれた何かが詰まっている。
MESSAGE.EN: Some items in the bags were wrapped in newspaper.
MESSAGE.Translation: Some items in the bags were wrapped in newspaper.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「倒れたときに割れてないかなー。うーん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wonder if the fall broke any of them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wonder if the fall broke any of them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はぁ、はぁ…あ、大丈夫です…アルミ製なので」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Haa, haa... No problem... They're all made of aluminium.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Haa, haa... No problem... They're all made of aluminium.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is that so?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is that so?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「下のほうは衣類ですし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Besides, I put my clothes under them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Besides, I put my clothes under them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうしたの、クド？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's wrong, Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's wrong, Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あー・ゆー・はぴー？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝A～ yu～ happi～?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝A～ yu～ happi～?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…あいむ・ふぁいん・さんきゅー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Aimu fain sankyu～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Aimu fain sankyu～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はぴー、さんきゅー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Happi～ sankyu～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Happi～ sankyu～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: っぱり棒読みだが挨拶が通じて嬉しそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though she was speaking stiffly, she looked delighted that I had understood her greeting.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though she was speaking stiffly, she looked delighted that I had understood her greeting.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「めい・あい・へるぷゆー？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Mei ai herupu yu～?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Mei ai herupu yu～?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、それ僕の台詞だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think that's my line.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think that's my line.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「この場合はなんでしょうか。ええと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝What should I say then? Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝What should I say then? Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「へるぷ・みー！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Herupu mi～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Herupu mi～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「それじゃ僕が危ないひとみたいだよ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Doesn't that sound like I'm a dangerous stranger!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Doesn't that sound like I'm a dangerous stranger!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ま、間違えました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Oh, I made a mistake.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Oh, I made a mistake.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「へるぷゆー！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Herupu yu～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Herupu yu～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「助けられてるよ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're going to help me after all!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're going to help me after all!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「えと、えと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Well, well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Well, well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドはしばらく次の単語を頭の中で巡らせているようだったが、思い浮かばなかったらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud racked her brain for a phrase to use for a while, but failed to find one.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud racked her brain for a phrase to use for a while, but failed to find one.

MESSAGE.JP: れの照れ隠しかえへへと笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: Then she made an embarrassed smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then she made an embarrassed smile.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…そういうわけで、こんにちは、直枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...So, good afternoon to you, Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...So, good afternoon to you, Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「こんにちは、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Good afternoon, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Good afternoon, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「引越しは大体終わった、とか言ってなかった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I thought you said that you were finished moving in?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I thought you said that you were finished moving in?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうなんですけど、おじい様が学校にきてくださったんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, but my grandfather came to the school to see me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, but my grandfather came to the school to see me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「それで色々といただいてしまって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And he gave me some things.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And he gave me some things.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「色々って？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What did you get?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What did you get?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「マグカップとか時計とか万年筆とか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Some mugs, an alarm clock, some pens...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Some mugs, an alarm clock, some pens...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あとは色々な辞典を」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And a couple of dictionaries.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And a couple of dictionaries.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんで辞典なんか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why dictionaries?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why dictionaries?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「もっと熟語とか言い回しとか洗練しなさい、って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Because he'd like me to build up my vocabulary.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Because he'd like me to build up my vocabulary.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…当然日本語？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You mean Japanese?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You mean Japanese?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「…はい、日本語の辞典とか辞書とか集めるのおじい様の趣味みたいなもので」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...Yes, collecting Japanese dictionaries is something like his hobby.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...Yes, collecting Japanese dictionaries is something like his hobby.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「版が改訂されると買ってるみたいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝He picks up a new one every time when a revision is made.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝He picks up a new one every time when a revision is made.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「結構無茶な趣味だなぁそれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It sounds a bit crazy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It sounds a bit crazy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「日本語好きなんですよ、おじい様」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝My grandfather really likes the Japanese language.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝My grandfather really likes the Japanese language.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ重たいのもしょうがないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's why this bag's so heavy, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's why this bag's so heavy, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: は紙袋を持ち上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: I lifted up one of the bags.
MESSAGE.Translation: I lifted up one of the bags.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あ、直枝さん、い、いえ、いいです、そんな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Oh, no, Naoe-san, you don't have to do that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Oh, no, Naoe-san, you don't have to do that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「また転んで怪我とかしたら大変だしね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I won't be happy if you have a fall and get injured.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I won't be happy if you have a fall and get injured.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「うゅ、す、すみません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Uyu, thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Uyu, thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうそう、合部屋のことだけど、寮長から話を聞いてきたよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, I asked the dorm head about sharing rooms.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, I asked the dorm head about sharing rooms.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドにポケットから出した申請用紙を渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: I handed Kud the papers the dorm head had given me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I handed Kud the papers the dorm head had given me.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「お手数お掛けしました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Thank you for your trouble.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Thank you for your trouble.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドはぺこんと頭を下げた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud bowed her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud bowed her head.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、話を聞いてきただけだからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No problem. I just asked her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No problem. I just asked her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんでも特に規則はないって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She said there aren't any special rules.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She said there aren't any special rules.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「とりあえずクドが募集すればいいみたいだ。はい、これ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All you have to do is to find a roommate. And, here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All you have to do is to find a roommate. And, here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「これは何ですか？　申請書？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝What is this? An application form?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝What is this? An application form?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「寮内のメーリングリスト…連絡網みたいなものに流すらしい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's for the dorm mailing list... It seems you can get information about the dorm from that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's for the dorm mailing list... It seems you can get information about the dorm from that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「内容を書いて寮長に渡してくれ、だってさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝She wants you to fill it in and return it to her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝She wants you to fill it in and return it to her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「なるほど、わかりました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Okay, I've got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Okay, I've got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは用紙をしげしげと見ている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud started reading the paper carefully.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud started reading the paper carefully.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「とりあえず、行こうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Anyway, let's move.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Anyway, let's move.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドを促して歩き始める。
MESSAGE.EN: I started walking.
MESSAGE.Translation: I started walking.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「あ、はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「見つかるといいね、相手」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I hope you'll find a partner.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I hope you'll find a partner.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい、見つかるといいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yeah, I hope so too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yeah, I hope so too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「卒業までお世話になると思いますし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝She'll probably be my partner until graduation.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝She'll probably be my partner until graduation.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…そうだね。長いつきあいになる相手だからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yeah. It's a long-term relationship.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yeah. It's a long-term relationship.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「直枝さんのルームメイトさんはどなたでしたか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Who is your roommate, Naoe-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Who is your roommate, Naoe-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「前も話したけど、真人だよ。井ノ原真人」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Like I said earlier, it's Masato. Masato Inohara.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Like I said earlier, it's Masato. Masato Inohara.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「いつも一緒にいる人たちの一人ですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Is he one of the other two you're always with?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Is he one of the other two you're always with?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん。そうだね、…まぁ、三馬鹿トリオとか言われてるけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yep, that's right. Everybody calls us the ❛idiot trio.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yep, that's right. Everybody calls us the ❛idiot trio.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: 介も入れるとカルテットか。
MESSAGE.EN: If Kyousuke is added, it's a quartet.
MESSAGE.Translation: If Kyousuke is added, it's a quartet.

MESSAGE.JP: 鹿カルテット。
MESSAGE.EN: The quartet of idiots.
MESSAGE.Translation: The quartet of idiots.

MESSAGE.JP: すごく嫌な響きだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Sounds awful...
MESSAGE.Translation: Sounds awful...

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「仲がいいのはとてもいいことです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Having such close friends is nice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Having such close friends is nice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうかな。真人と謙吾はよくわからない理由でバトルしてるし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You think so? But Masato and Kengo are always fighting for silly reasons.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You think so? But Masato and Kengo are always fighting for silly reasons.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…ま、あれは喧嘩というよりはじゃれてるのかもしれないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, to be accurate, they might be playing with each other.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, to be accurate, they might be playing with each other.❞

MESSAGE.JP: き込まれるほうは大変だよ、と僕は続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: But getting involved in it is real trouble, I added.
MESSAGE.Translation: But getting involved in it is real trouble, I added.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「仲が悪ければ『トリオ』なんて呼ばれませんよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝They wouldn't call you boys a ❛trio❜ unless you were close friends.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝They wouldn't call you boys a ❛trio❜ unless you were close friends.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドはぽん、と手を打ってそんなことを言った。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud clapped her hands and said.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud clapped her hands and said.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そういうものかもしれないけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Maybe you're right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Maybe you're right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「昔からのお知り合いでしたか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝How long have you guys known each other?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝How long have you guys known each other?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…幼なじみっていうやつかな。昔から」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I think you could say we're childhood friends.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I think you could say we're childhood friends.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は少し自分の記憶を遡り…そして呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I murmured, retracing my past.
MESSAGE.Translation: I murmured, retracing my past.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕のそばにいてくれる、みんなだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝They have always been with me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝They have always been with me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: がふと隣のクドを見やると、クドは何故だかにこにこしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at Kud and found she was smiling.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at Kud and found she was smiling.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…どうかした？　なんか変なこと言ったかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What's wrong? Did I say something funny?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What's wrong? Did I say something funny?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「いえ、全然」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝No, not at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝No, not at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ったまま首を振るクド。
MESSAGE.EN: She kept on smiling while she shook her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She kept on smiling while she shook her head.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「直枝さんが嬉しそうだったので私も嬉しくなっただけです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You looked so happy, it made me happy as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You looked so happy, it made me happy as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 舎からグラウンドの脇を通って寮へと続く道を歩く。
MESSAGE.EN: We were walking along the walkway leading to the dormitory.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were walking along the walkway leading to the dormitory.

MESSAGE.JP: きかけた夕日が僕らの影を地面に映す。
MESSAGE.EN: The evening sun projected our shadows on the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: The evening sun projected our shadows on the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「っと、っとと、っとっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝One, two, three.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝One, two, three.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドは夕日によってできたいろいろな影をステップして踏み歩いている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud was enjoying herself, stepping from one shadow onto another.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud was enjoying herself, stepping from one shadow onto another.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「影踏み遊び？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're playing with shadows?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're playing with shadows?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい、影踏み遊び。飛べなくなったら負けなんですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes. You lose if you fail to step on them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes. You lose if you fail to step on them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「よっと、えいっ、っとっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Four, five, six.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Four, five, six.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドのステップは軽やかとは言い難い。
MESSAGE.EN: It's hard to describe Kud's footwork as light.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's hard to describe Kud's footwork as light.

MESSAGE.JP: こか危なっかしい。
MESSAGE.EN: She was making unsure steps.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was making unsure steps.

MESSAGE.JP: さくて細い体が影踏み遊びを続けている。
MESSAGE.EN: The petite girl continued her play with the shadows.
MESSAGE.Translation: The petite girl continued her play with the shadows.

MESSAGE.JP: 明灯の影。
MESSAGE.EN: A street lamp.
MESSAGE.Translation: A street lamp.

MESSAGE.JP: ロック塀の端っこの影。
MESSAGE.EN: The edge of a fence.
MESSAGE.Translation: The edge of a fence.

MESSAGE.JP: 々の影。
MESSAGE.EN: Or trees.
MESSAGE.Translation: Or trees.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「むー、直枝さん、影踏んでいいですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Hmm, Naoe-san, may I use your shadow?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Hmm, Naoe-san, may I use your shadow?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…うん、いいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Sure, go ahead.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Sure, go ahead.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「よっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Alright.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Alright.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ょん、とクドが飛ぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud jumped up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud jumped up.

MESSAGE.JP: わりと亜麻色をした髪が僕の前を舞う。
MESSAGE.EN: Her tow-colored hair danced by me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her tow-colored hair danced by me.

MESSAGE.JP: んの一瞬、少しだけ甘い香りを感じた。
MESSAGE.EN: For a brief moment, I caught a sweet scent from her.
MESSAGE.Translation: For a brief moment, I caught a sweet scent from her.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「影、踏ーんだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I've got your shadow!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I've got your shadow!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドが僕のほうを向きながら無邪気に笑う。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud looked at me and smiled innocently.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud looked at me and smiled innocently.

MESSAGE.JP: の笑顔を見て、ふと小さな傷が疼いた気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: That smile suddenly reminded me of my small trauma.
MESSAGE.Translation: That smile suddenly reminded me of my small trauma.

MESSAGE.JP: い日の孤独を――思い出して。
MESSAGE.EN: The loneliness I had felt a long time ago.
MESSAGE.Translation: The loneliness I had felt a long time ago.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「直枝さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Naoe-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Naoe-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…あ、うん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Ah, yeah?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Ah, yeah?❞

MESSAGE.JP: はクドの声で現実に引き戻された。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud's voice brought me back to reality.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud's voice brought me back to reality.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「次、階段です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝There are stairs.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝There are stairs.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「おっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: のまま進んでいたらつんのめるところだった。
MESSAGE.EN: If Kud didn't stop me, I might have fallen.
MESSAGE.Translation: If Kud didn't stop me, I might have fallen.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ありがと、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「いえ、どういたしまして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝You're welcome.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝You're welcome.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 子寮の入り口への階段を上る。
MESSAGE.EN: We went up the stairs leading to the entrance of the girls' dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: We went up the stairs leading to the entrance of the girls' dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: 関の前で、紙袋をクドに渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: At the entrance, I handed the bag to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: At the entrance, I handed the bag to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「重たいよ、大丈夫？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This is heavy. Can you manage?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This is heavy. Can you manage?❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ここからなら大丈夫です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, this is far enough.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, this is far enough.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「ありがとうございました、直枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Thank you very much, Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Thank you very much, Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドはぺこん、と頭を下げる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud bowed her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud bowed her head.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「気をつけてお帰りください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Watch your step going home.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Watch your step going home.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん。クドも廊下とか階段、気をつけてね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yep. You too, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yep. You too, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい、ありがとうございます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, thank you very much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, thank you very much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあまた明日」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝See you tomorrow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝See you tomorrow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「また明日です、直枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝See you tomorrow, Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝See you tomorrow, Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 段を下りかけてふと首を巡らすと――やっぱりクドは手を振っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Just before going down the stairs, I turned around and saw Kud still waving her hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just before going down the stairs, I turned around and saw Kud still waving her hand.

MESSAGE.JP: れに手を振り返して、僕は再び下り始める。
MESSAGE.EN: After waving back I descended the stairs.
MESSAGE.Translation: After waving back I descended the stairs.

MESSAGE.JP: 踏み遊び、恭介たちとやったのはいつぐらいまでだっただろうか、なんて考えながら。
MESSAGE.EN: Shadows, huh... I tried to remember the last time I had been playing shadow-tag with Kyousuke and the others.
MESSAGE.Translation: Shadows, huh... I tried to remember the last time I had been playing shadow-tag with Kyousuke and the others.

MESSAGE.JP: て、ひとりになったわけだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, I'm all alone now.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, I'm all alone now.

MESSAGE.JP: 習が終わり、道具を部室に戻す。
MESSAGE.EN: Today's practice is finished.
MESSAGE.Translation: Today's practice is finished.

MESSAGE.JP: て、夕飯までまだ時間はあるけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: There was still time until dinner...
MESSAGE.Translation: There was still time until dinner...

MESSAGE.JP: 屋に戻って休んでおこう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Okay, I'll get back and take a rest...
MESSAGE.Translation: Okay, I'll get back and take a rest...

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「じゃあ、今日も始めるとするか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Then, let's get started.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Then, let's get started.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ラジャ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Roger.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Roger.❞

MESSAGE.JP: は無線機を着け、女子寮へと向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin prepared her ear piece and headed for the dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin prepared her ear piece and headed for the dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今日はちゃんとしてあげないとね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We have to give her proper backup this time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We have to give her proper backup this time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『潜入成功』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Got inside.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Got inside.]

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「よし、じゃあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Great, now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Great, now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『おい、なんか言え』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Hey, say something.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Hey, say something.]

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「いや、言ってる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Speaking.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Speaking.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『なんだ？　なんでおまえら黙ってるんだ？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[What's going on? Why aren't you guys talking?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[What's going on? Why aren't you guys talking?]

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「言ってるだろうがっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No, I'm speaking!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No, I'm speaking!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『おーい、もしもーし!!』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Hello? HELLO!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Hello? HELLO!]

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「もしもーし!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝HELLO HELLO!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝HELLO HELLO!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「…届いてないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...She can't hear us?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...She can't hear us?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『もしもーし!!』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Hello hello!!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Hello hello!!]

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「かめよー!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Anybody home!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Anybody home!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『かめさんよ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[No one home!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[No one home!]

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「届いてるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Did she hear it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Did she hear it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「いや、あいつには届いてない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No, she didn't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No, she didn't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『なんだ嫌がらせか、みんなで無視して楽しいかっ、なんかいえーっ!!』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Hey, what's the meaning of this? Do you guys enjoy ignoring me? Say something!!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Hey, what's the meaning of this? Do you guys enjoy ignoring me? Say something!!]

MESSAGE.JP: っきのは何かが噛み合った、奇跡的な瞬間だったのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed to be a complete coincidence that Rin and Masato had carried out their dialogue.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed to be a complete coincidence that Rin and Masato had carried out their dialogue.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「無線機の故障か…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Is her ear piece broken?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Is her ear piece broken?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「今日は一切のフォローなしでやらせてみようと思ってな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I've decided not to give her a hand today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I've decided not to give her a hand today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まあ、そういうわけさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That's the reason.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That's the reason.❞

MESSAGE.JP: うするに、これは恭介のお膳立てってことか。
MESSAGE.EN: In other words, this was his doing.
MESSAGE.Translation: In other words, this was his doing.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「よくわかんねぇが、オレたちは聞いてるだけってことか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm not sure, but today we'll be just listening?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm not sure, but today we'll be just listening?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そうなるな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴に説明しなくてよかったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Shouldn't you have told her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Shouldn't you have told her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「そうしたら、あいつは間違いなく行かないだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝If I had, she definitely wouldn't have cooperated.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝If I had, she definitely wouldn't have cooperated.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、でもさ…それだとすぐに帰ってくるんじゃない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But in this case, won't she just give up and come back at once?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But in this case, won't she just give up and come back at once?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『こんばんは』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Good evening.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Good evening.]

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「お、経験が生きてるじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Wow, she's learned by experience.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Wow, she's learned by experience.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ああ…でも昨日みたいになったら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But what if she acts like she did yesterday...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But what if she acts like she did yesterday...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん、大丈夫かな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm, will she be okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm, will she be okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まあ、見守ってやろうぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, let's wait and see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, let's wait and see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『こんばんは』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Good evening.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Good evening.]

MESSAGE.JP: 声@『ありゃ、鈴ちゃん』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@[Oh, Rin-chan.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@[Oh, Rin-chan.]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、この声は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, that voice...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, that voice...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ふぅ…あの騒々しい女か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Yeah... that noisy girl.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Yeah... that noisy girl.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@『なにやってんの？　なんか面白いこと見つけた？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@[What are you up to? Found something fun?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@[What are you up to? Found something fun?]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『かんゅ…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Can...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Can...]

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@『まったっ、当ててみせようっ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@[Wait, let me guess.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@[Wait, let me guess.]

MESSAGE.JP: しい、『勧誘』と言う前に遮られてしまった…。
MESSAGE.EN: So close! Rin almost asked ❛Can you play baseball?❜ by herself...
MESSAGE.Translation: So close! Rin almost asked ❛Can you play baseball?❜ by herself...

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@『えーと、かん…かんねぇ…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@[Okay... Let me see... Can...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@[Okay... Let me see... Can...]

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@『缶ケリのルーツを探る旅？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@[You're searching for the roots of Kick-the-can?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@[You're searching for the roots of Kick-the-can?]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『違う』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[No.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[No.]

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@『カンカンダンス？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@[Cancan dance?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@[Cancan dance?]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『違う』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[No.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[No.]

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@『乾季…サバナ地方に住む人々にとって、乾季は辛い季節。だがその苛酷な環境の中にも、大地には小さな生命たちが逞しく生き、僅かな恵みを頼りに…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@[The tropic of Cancer... The dry season in the savanna is fearsome. However, in even that harsh environment, they strongly live with a little...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@[The tropic of Cancer... The dry season in the savanna is fearsome. However, in even that harsh environment, they strongly live with a little...]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『それはするものなのか？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Think that has anything to do with me!?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Think that has anything to do with me!?]

MESSAGE.JP: ッコミまで入れていた！
MESSAGE.EN: Nice riposte!
MESSAGE.Translation: Nice riposte!

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@『うーむ、謎は深まる一方ですね』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@[Hmm, the mystery's getting even deeper.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@[Hmm, the mystery's getting even deeper.]

MESSAGE.JP: ケ側はものすごい発想の貧困な人だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Sounds like she needs a better imagination if she wants to become a comedian.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sounds like she needs a better imagination if she wants to become a comedian.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@『まあこれをあげよう』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@[Ah well, take this.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@[Ah well, take this.]

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「お、何かアイテムをゲットしたようだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, she's got a new item.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, she's got a new item.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『なんだそれ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[What is that?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[What is that?]

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@『タンバリンですヨ。シャカシャカヘイっ!!』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@[It's a tambourine. SHAKA-SHAKA-HEY!!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@[It's a tambourine. SHAKA-SHAKA-HEY!!]

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@『このように使用すると宜しいですヨっ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@[This is how you use it.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@[This is how you use it.]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『………（しゃかしゃか）』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[.........(SHAKA-SHAKA)]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[.........(SHAKA-SHAKA)]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「また何の脈絡もないものを渡すなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why such a thing all of a sudden...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why such a thing all of a sudden...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@『じゃあ、なんかよくわからないけどがんばってねー。あでゅ～』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@[I have no idea what's going on, but keep it up! Adieu～.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@[I have no idea what's going on, but keep it up! Adieu～.]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『まてっ、勧誘…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Wait, can you...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Wait, can you...]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『しまった、逃げられた…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Shucks, she's gone...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Shucks, she's gone...]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、でもすごく頑張ったと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I think Rin did really well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I think Rin did really well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『しゃかしゃかへいっ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[SHAKA-SHAKA-HEY!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[SHAKA-SHAKA-HEY!]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、でもさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But...❞

MESSAGE.JP: らららっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Crreeak*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Crreeak*!

MESSAGE.JP: を立ててベランダのサッシが開いた。
MESSAGE.EN: The door of the veranda opened up.
MESSAGE.Translation: The door of the veranda opened up.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おまえらなあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You guys...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You guys...❞

MESSAGE.JP: の向こうには目を光らせる鈴の影が…。
MESSAGE.EN: A girl was standing there with a glow in her eyes...
MESSAGE.Translation: A girl was standing there with a glow in her eyes...

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「真人、電話だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Masato, you've got a phone call.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Masato, you've got a phone call.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吾が改造携帯を真人に投げ渡す。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo threw the cellphone to Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo threw the cellphone to Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「え？　オレに？　でればいいのか？　はいもしもし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Eh? Me? Got it. Hello?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Eh? Me? Got it. Hello?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「おまえの仕業かあぁぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝So it was you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝So it was you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: っきいいーーーーーっ!!
真人@「うぎゃあぁぁああぁぁぁーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Ugyaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Ugyaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴がそのまま中に飛び込んできて、改造携帯を耳に押し当てる真人の首を狩っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Rin jumped into the room and kicked Masato's head while he was pressing the cellphone against his ear.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Rin jumped into the room and kicked Masato's head while he was pressing the cellphone against his ear.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…こうなると思ったんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I knew this would happen.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I knew this would happen.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「さすがにそこまで望むのは早かったか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝She seems to need more time to prepare...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝She seems to need more time to prepare...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「どーいうことだ、説明してもらおーか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's going on? Explain.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's going on? Explain.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「ジャミングだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's being jammed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's being jammed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「じゃみんぐ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Jammed?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Jammed?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「何者かからの妨害電波だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Someone's interfering with the radio communications.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Someone's interfering with the radio communications.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しれっと言う。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He said without hesitation.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He said without hesitation.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なにぃ…何者かめ、やってくれる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Whaat... who dares... just you wait...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Whaat... who dares... just you wait...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 信じていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She bought it.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She bought it.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「それはどうにかならないのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Can't you do something about that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Can't you do something about that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「すぐには無理だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I need time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I need time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「じゃあ中止だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Well, let's stop for the day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Well, let's stop for the day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「いや、勧誘は続ける。おまえがひとりで何とかするんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No, we'll continue. Make it by yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No, we'll continue. Make it by yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「いやだ…それは楽しくない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No... That's not fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No... That's not fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕もそれはちょっとかわいそうだと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I also think that's a little hard...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I also think that's a little hard...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「スパイだったらな、鈴。そういうときもあるもんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Spies are sometimes required to manage these kinds of situations by themselves.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Spies are sometimes required to manage these kinds of situations by themselves.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「なにぃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Whaat...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Whaat...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「…じゃあ、今日だけだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...But I'm never doing this again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...But I'm never doing this again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「よし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: すが兄と言うべきか、鈴は恭介の口車に見事に乗せられていた。
MESSAGE.EN: That's our Kyousuke. She splendidly fell for his persuasion.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's our Kyousuke. She splendidly fell for his persuasion.

MESSAGE.JP: というわけで再開。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Anyway, she resumed her mission.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Anyway, she resumed her mission.

MESSAGE.JP: なみに真人は後ろで伸びたままだった。
MESSAGE.EN: By the way, Masato was still lying unconscious behind us.
MESSAGE.Translation: By the way, Masato was still lying unconscious behind us.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『えーと…まずはこんばんはか』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Well... First I have to greet somebody.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Well... First I have to greet somebody.]

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「お、経験が生きてるじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Wow, she's learned by experience.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Wow, she's learned by experience.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ああ…でも昨日みたいになったら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But what if she acts like she did yesterday...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But what if she acts like she did yesterday...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うーん、大丈夫かな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm, will she be okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm, will she be okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「まあ、見守ってやろうぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, let's wait and see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, let's wait and see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『こんばんは』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Good evening.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Good evening.]

MESSAGE.JP: 声@『ありゃ、鈴ちゃん』
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@[Oh, Rin-chan.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@[Oh, Rin-chan.]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、この声は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, that voice...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, that voice...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「ふぅ…あの騒々しい女か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Yeah... that noisy girl.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Yeah... that noisy girl.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@『なにやってんの？　なんか面白いこと見つけた？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@[What are you up to? Found something fun?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@[What are you up to? Found something fun?]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『す、すぱ…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[S, spa...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[S, spa...]

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@『待ってっ、当ててみせようっ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@[Wait, let me guess.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@[Wait, let me guess.]

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@『えーと、すぱ…（スパゲッティのルーツを探る旅？　いや、スパーリングっ!?）』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@[Well, spa... You're searching for the roots of spaghetti? Or sparring!?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@[Well, spa... You're searching for the roots of spaghetti? Or sparring!?]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 段々と三枝さんの声が遠ざかっていく。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Her voice gradually grew fainter.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Her voice gradually grew fainter.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「空気に耐えられなくなって逃げ出したな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝The situation must've been too much for her and she ran away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝The situation must've been too much for her and she ran away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: かに鈴は、馴れ馴れしい人とは相性が悪そうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin sure isn't good at getting along with people who are acting too friendly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin sure isn't good at getting along with people who are acting too friendly.

MESSAGE.JP: イクからは、取り残された三枝さんの声だけがかすかに響いてきていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Through the microphone, we could hear Saigusa-san's quiet voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Through the microphone, we could hear Saigusa-san's quiet voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@『………（す、スパ…すぱ？　すっぱい感じ？）』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@[......S, spa... spa? Suppai (sour) flavor, right?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@[......S, spa... spa? Suppai (sour) flavor, right?]

MESSAGE.JP: ついに何も聞こえなくなった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Finally, she couldn't be heard any longer.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Finally, she couldn't be heard any longer.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@『って、おいおいおーいっ!!　そこで放置プレイはヤだよぉっ!!』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@[Hey hey hey! Wait a second! Don't leave me behind!!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@[Hey hey hey! Wait a second! Don't leave me behind!!]

MESSAGE.JP: いかけてきたようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It sounds like she's trying to catch up with Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: It sounds like she's trying to catch up with Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『…忙しい』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[...I'm busy.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[...I'm busy.]

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@『ありゃ、それは失敬』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@[Really? My apologies.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@[Really? My apologies.]

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@『じゃあお詫びにこれをあげよう』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@[Keep this, then.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@[Keep this, then.]

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「お、何かアイテムをゲットしたようだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, she's got a new item.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Hey, she's got a new item.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『なんだそれ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[What is that?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[What is that?]

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@『タンバリンですヨ。シャカシャカヘイっ!!』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@[It's a tambourine. SHAKA-SHAKA-HEY!!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@[It's a tambourine. SHAKA-SHAKA-HEY!!]

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@『このように使用すると宜しいですヨっ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@[This is how you use it.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@[This is how you use it.]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『………（しゃかしゃか）』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[.........(SHAKA-SHAKA)]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[.........(SHAKA-SHAKA)]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「また何の脈絡もないものを渡すなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why such a thing all of a sudden...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why such a thing all of a sudden...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝@『じゃあ、なんかよくわからないけどがんばってねー。あでゅ～』
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@[I have no idea what's going on, but keep it up! Adieu～.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@[I have no idea what's going on, but keep it up! Adieu～.]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『しゃかしゃかへいっ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[SHAKA-SHAKA-HEY!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[SHAKA-SHAKA-HEY!]

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「気に入ったようだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝She seems to like it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝She seems to like it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 無線からの音声にタンバリンの音が混じるようになった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...After that, we would often hear the sound of the tambourine.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...After that, we would often hear the sound of the tambourine.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも全然勧誘にはなってないね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But that has nothing to do with her mission at all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But that has nothing to do with her mission at all...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@[Oh...?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@[Oh...?]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『おまえは…（しゃかしゃか）』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[You are... (SHAKA-SHAKA)]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[You are... (SHAKA-SHAKA)]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ああ、また出くわしたのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It happened again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It happened again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: んかここまで来ると偶然とも思えないっていうか、笹瀬川さんがわざわざ会いにきてるんじゃないかな…。
MESSAGE.EN: I started to wonder if Sasasegawa-san was going out of her way to come and meet Rin...
MESSAGE.Translation: I started to wonder if Sasasegawa-san was going out of her way to come and meet Rin...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『さす…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Sasu...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Sasu...]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『さささがわささみ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Sasami Sasasagawa.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Sasami Sasasagawa.]

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『ささせさっ…笹瀬川佐々美ですわっ!!』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[My name is Sasami Sasasesa... Sasasegawa!!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[My name is Sasami Sasasesa... Sasasegawa!!]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『自分も噛んでるじゃないか』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[You failed as well.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[You failed as well.]

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『くっ…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Hmph...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Hmph...]

MESSAGE.JP: そこは反論できないらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She couldn't deny it.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She couldn't deny it.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『で…なにを妙なものを持ち出して騒いでらっしゃるの？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[So, what are you doing making noise with such a thing?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[So, what are you doing making noise with such a thing?]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『これはタンバリンだ。知らないのか？（しゃかしゃか）』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[This is a tambourine. Can't you tell? (SHAKA-SHAKA)]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[This is a tambourine. Can't you tell? (SHAKA-SHAKA)]

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『それくらい知っていますわっ!!』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[I know that!!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[I know that!!]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『しゃかしゃかへいっ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[SHAKA-SHAKA-HEY!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[SHAKA-SHAKA-HEY!]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『こう使う』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[You use it like this.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[You use it like this.]

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『気に障る音ですわね…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[What an unpleasant sound...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[What an unpleasant sound...]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『なんだ…なにかタンバリンに嫌な思い出でもあるのか？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Why? Do tambourines remind you of something bad?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Why? Do tambourines remind you of something bad?]

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『小学校の６年間、なぜか一度もタンバリンに触れることが出来なかったとか、そんな事はどうでもいいんですのよっ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[I really wanted to play it in elementary school, but I never got a chance to... Hey! What are you making me say!?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[I really wanted to play it in elementary school, but I never got a chance to... Hey! What are you making me say!?]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『それは哀れだな…貸してやろうか（しゃかしゃか）』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Poor thing... I'll lend you mine. (SHAKA-SHAKA)]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Poor thing... I'll lend you mine. (SHAKA-SHAKA)]

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『きーっ！　わたくしの過去に土足で踏み込まないでくださらないっ!?』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[Kyee! Please stop invading my memories!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[Kyee! Please stop invading my memories!]

MESSAGE.JP: 女生徒@『なんですか佐々美様っ!!』
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@[What happened, Sasami-sama!?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@[What happened, Sasami-sama!?]

MESSAGE.JP: 女生徒@『また棗ですかっ!!』
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@[Natsume again!?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@[Natsume again!?]

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@『おまえたち、やっておしまいなさいっ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@[You, take care of her!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@[You, take care of her!]

MESSAGE.JP: んか笹瀬川さんも微妙に親しみやすいキャラになってきたなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt like Sasasegawa-san had gotten a little friendlier with Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt like Sasasegawa-san had gotten a little friendlier with Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: しっ！　ばしっ！　ばきっ！　どぐっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Punch*! *Kick*! *Wham*! *Bam*!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Punch*! *Kick*! *Wham*! *Bam*!

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うわぁ、またどつきあいに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝They're fighting again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝They're fighting again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 然でしょ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Somehow I wasn't surprised...
MESSAGE.Translation: Somehow I wasn't surprised...

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「どれも等しくミッションさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、まだ訊いてもいないし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I didn't say anything yet...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I didn't say anything yet...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ようやく辿りつきましたのね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You finally made it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You finally made it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ではわたくし自ら受けてたちましょう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Well then, I shall take you on myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Well then, I shall take you on myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「今度こそ地面に這いつくばらしてやりますわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I'll definitely make you eat dirt this time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I'll definitely make you eat dirt this time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「今度は本気で参りますわよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Don't expect me to hold back this time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Don't expect me to hold back this time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「あら意外にやりますのね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You are holding up unexpectedly well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You are holding up unexpectedly well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ではわたくし自ら受けてたちましょう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Well then, I shall take you on myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Well then, I shall take you on myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「こんな尻の青い下級生にすら勝てないなんて、話にもならないですわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝To think you can't even beat these novice underclassmen. This isn't even worth talking about.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝To think you can't even beat these novice underclassmen. This isn't even worth talking about.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「って、そもそもミッションが別のものにすり替わっていない!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, wasn't that different from the original mission!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, wasn't that different from the original mission!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「どれも等しくミッションさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 対騙されてる気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@『ミッションコンプリート』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[❛Mission Complete.❜]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[❛Mission Complete.❜]

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやいや、してないしてない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no, no way it is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no, no way it is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「理樹、戦利品だ。やる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, here's the spoils. You can have it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, here's the spoils. You can have it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え…ありがと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh... thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh... thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「本気になれば、よっっゆーーっですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝It's a PIECE OF CAKE when I get serious!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It's a PIECE OF CAKE when I get serious!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ざっとこんなものですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝That's about right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝That's about right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ソフト部員@「さすがは、佐々美様っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Club Member@❝As expected from Sasami-sama!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Club Member@❝As expected from Sasami-sama!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ソフト部員@「華麗でございましたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Club Member@❝Your fighting style is really elegant!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Club Member@❝Your fighting style is really elegant!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「いきますわよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝We shall take our leave.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝We shall take our leave.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「って、そもそもミッションが別のものにすり替わっていない!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, wasn't that different from the original mission!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, wasn't that different from the original mission!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介@「どれも等しくミッションさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We should treat everything as a mission.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 対騙されてる気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure I'm just getting tricked...

MESSAGE.JP: うして今夜も更けていく…。
MESSAGE.EN: And so the night went on...
MESSAGE.Translation: And so the night went on...
